description.hltext_display: Santa Cruz y Las Palmas contarán desde 2011 con un plan de riesgos químicos
description.content:
La implantación del Plan de Emergencias Químicas exterior de la Comunidad autónoma ya está en proceso de implantación. El proyecto, que se encuentra en fase de coordinación con la Autoridad Portuaria, la Refinería y los ayuntamientos de Santa Cruz de Tenerife y Las Palmas, comenzará a difundirse en 2011.
Edición impresa
G.J., S/C de Tenerife
El Plan de Emergencias Químicas del Gobierno de Canarias ya se encuentra en su periodo de implantación. El proyecto, que fue aprobado el pasado mes de noviembre, en la actualidad está en fase de coordinación con las empresas que poseen riesgos químicos, la Autoridad Portuaria y la Refinería, y con los ayuntamientos de los municipios que pudieran verse afectados, Santa Cruz de Tenerife y Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.
La obligatoriedad de este plan de emergencias específico surgió en 1999 a raíz de un primer Real Decreto europeo que definía que empresas o industrias que tengan determinados compuestos químicos o sustancias peligrosas en determinadas cantidades tienen la obligación de hacer una serie de planes, explicó Humberto Gutiérrez, jefe de servicio de Protección Civil y atención de emergencias del Gobierno de Canarias.
El decreto contemplaba que si existe riesgo para la población, la comunidad autónoma afectada también debe hacer un plan de emergencias exterior. "Hay tres planes distintos: el plan de la empresa de autoprotección; un plan interior de las instalaciones, en el caso de que esa empresa esté en un polígono, como el puerto o la refinería, y un plan exterior que debe realizar la comunidad autónoma por si cualquier accidente pudiera afectar a la población".
El retraso de la aprobación de este plan específico exterior se debió a que "en 2005, cuando ya estaba hecho el plan de la Refinería, salió una nueva directriz europea que rebaja las cantidades mínimas para exigir este tipo de plan. En ese momento entraron más empresas, como las petroleras, que en Canarias se encuentran en los puertos de Santa Cruz de Tenerife y Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, que se homologaron hace un mes. Ahora mismo en Canarias todas las empresas con riesgo químico tienen su plan homologado y estamos en la fase de implantación del plan", señaló el jefe de Protección Civil.
Cabe señalar que, en el marco de esta implantación del plan, se desarrollará en el primer semestre de 2011 una campaña de difusión pública por los diferentes barrios de los municipios afectados, en este caso Santa Cruz de Tenerife y Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, pues es necesario que el ciudadano conozca cómo actuar ante una situación de riesgo", explicó Gutiérrez.
Plan de Santa Cruz
En referencia a las informaciones recientes en las que se decía que el concejal de Seguridad Ciudadana de Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Hilario Rodríguez, anunciaba que el ayuntamiento presentaría un plan de emergencias químicas de la capital tinerfeña, Humberto Gutiérrez aclaró que seguramente se trató de una confusión de términos, pues este riesgo "ya aparece contemplado en el Plan de Emergencias Municipal de Santa Cruz", y este documento específico es del Ejecutivo canario.
"En el PEMU de la capital tinerfeña ya aparece valorado el riesgo químico por la Refinería y el puerto, pero el plan que regula todas las acciones en torno a estos dos lugares es el de la Comunidad autónoma. Lo que ha podido ocurrir es que como el protocolo del ayuntamiento se ha de cohesionar con el del nuevo plan del Ejecutivo canario se han confundido los términos", explicó.
Gutiérrez también señaló que esta confusión también pudo deberse a que, con motivo de la implantación de este plan, el Ayuntamiento de Santa Cruz, la Autoridad Portuaria, la Refinería y el Gobierno de Canarias coordinarán sus protocolos de actuación, para lo cual ya se han mantenido algunas reuniones. Se trata de una coordinación entre todos los planes territoriales y específicos.
Cabe señalar que ningún municipio puede tener un plan de emergencias municipal, general o específico sin que esté en conocimiento de la Dirección General de Emergencias, que es el órgano competente legalmente para hacer ese plan. De hecho, varios Cabildos intentaron implantar planes específicos y se les dijo que no tenía sentido, que lo correcto era implantar el autonómico y coordinarlo con los insulares.

description.author: Bruce Young
description.content:

description.content:
[来源：洛阳网] 收藏 电邮 打印 评论0条
移动用户：发送短信 LYD 到 10658300
联通用户：发送短信 712 到 10655885
洛阳网12月21日讯 今日上午，市委常委、统战部部长胡广坤带领市宗教、文物、城建、园林及洛龙区等相关单位负责人，对全面提升白马寺景区整体水平进行调研和督查。
胡广坤一行在调研中详细了解了白马寺的发展规划，并现场协调解决影响发展的具体问题。胡广坤强调，要深入开展提升白马寺景区整体水平“百日行动”，抓好落实，务求实效，确保明年牡丹花会前使景区面貌焕然一新。相关部门和城区要进一步提高服务意识，及时帮助协调解决白马寺景区发展中遇到的困难和问题。（洛阳日报报业集团全媒体记者 李燕锋 通讯员 胡轩岩）

description.hltext_display: Theorin kontraktslös: "GIF Sundsvall känns intressant"
description.content:
Gefle, som besegrade GIF Sundsvall i kvalet och därmed klarade sig kvar i Allsvenskan med nöd och näppe i år, har en ansträngd ekonomi. Därför har man nu meddelat mittbacken Daniel Theorin att man inte har råd att skriva ett nytt kontrakt med honom.
Nu har den 27-årige mittbacken börjat att titta efter andra alternativ, trots att han nåtts av nyheten att Gefle försöker hitta externa finansiärer för att få råd att ha kvar honom.
– Det är skitkul att Gefle gör allting för att ha mig kvar, men samtidigt så måste jag ju se om mitt hus nu när jag inte vet hur det blir, säger han.
• Är det några andra klubbar som varit i kontakt med dig?
– Jag har under hösten hört via agenter att flera klubbar har varit intresserade av mig. Men vilka det är vill jag hålla för mig själv tills det blivit något konkret.
• Tillhör GIF Sundsvall de klubbarna?
– Det vill jag inte kommentera. Det blir bara fel om jag börjar prata om olika klubbar.
• Hur intressant känns GIF?
– Jag håller alla dörrar öppna. Och jag är ju från Härnösand, känner till stan och känner flera i klubben, så rent allmänt känns det väl som ett intressant alternativ, om det skulle bli aktuellt. Jag stänger inga dörrar.
Men intresset från GIF-håll verkar svalt för tillfället.
– "Theo" är en intressant spelare, men i dagsläget är det inte mittbackar vi jagar i första hand, säger GIF:s sportchef Cain Dotson.

description.hltext_display: Danskar rekordnegativa till euron
description.author: Corren.se
description.content:
Danskarna har aldrig varit så negativa till euron som nu, enligt Danske Banks kvartalsvisa opinionsmätningar. På ett kvartal har gapet mellan nej och ja vuxit från 5 till 13 procentenheter.
Nu säger 42 procent av danskarna ja eller kanske ja till att införa EU-valutan, medan 55 procent säger nej.
Mätningen gjordes under de två första veckorna i december.

description.hltext_display: 海遊館に国内初展示のクラゲ
"Lidas" kan bli ensam blågul i all star-match
description.author: Gunnar Nordström
description.content: LOS ANGELES. Hur har ni det med populariteten, svenskar? Omröstningen inför NHL:s All Starmatch i Carolina den 30 januari är i full gång. Bara Nicklas Lidström ser ut att ha en chans att ta en plats i den startfemma som fansen röstar fram."Lidas" ligger på fjärde plats bland backarna den här veckan med 241 922 röster. Han har 30 000 röster upp till tvåan Duncan Keith, Chicago. Ledande Kris Letang, Pittsburgh, blir svår att knuffa bort från förstaplatsen, då han har 342 118 röster. Bland forwards dominerar som väntat Sidney Crosby. Penguins lagkapten toppar både mål- och poängligan i NHL och fansen tackar för underhållningen genom att rösta på honom. 464 832 röster ger en överlägsen ledning före Chicagos lagkapten Jonathan Toews. Bäste svensk hittar vi först på 15:e plats: Detroits Henrik Zetterberg. Henrik Lundqvist, NY Rangers, återfinns på nionde plats bland målvakterna med 63 880 röster. Listan toppas av Carey Price, Montreal (286 602) och Marc-Andre Fleury, Pittsburgh (259 596). Källa: TSN Network

description.hltext_display: Your HCG Informs Customers on What to Do After Their Weight Loss Goals Have Been Met On the HCG Diet
description.content:
The homeopathic alternative has been made popular by YourHCG.com, and their customers see an average weight reduction of 1 – 2 pounds per day. But the question remains, what can a person do once their initial weight loss goals have been met?
Salt Lake City, UT (Vocus/PRWEB) December 21, 2010
Many people who begin the HCG diet see weight drop rapidly. The homeopathic alternative has been made popular by YourHCG.com, and their customers see an average weight reduction of 1 – 2 pounds per day. But the question remains, what can a person do once their initial weight loss goals have been met?
President, Dan Edmund walks us through a typical scenario, “While on the hCG diet, customers take the hCG drops a minimum of 23 days (2 days loading and 21 days on the low calorie diet). This gives their body enough time to initiate the reset of their hypothalamus gland. They can take the hCG drops for up to 60 days at a time before moving to maintenance. If they hit their weight loss goal between day 23 and day 60, they may stop the hCG drops immediately, continue the low calorie diet for 72 hours, then move onto maintenance. If a customer hits their weight loss goal before the 23 days, they’ll want to continue the hCG drops but increase their calorie intake to 800-1000 calories for the rest of the treatment. The best way to increase calories is to add 1 - 2 extra servings of approved protein, vegetables and fruit.”
“After a person has completed the diet with the hCG drops, they will move onto maintenance. This phase will complete the reset of the hypothalamus gland. If this is their first round of hCG , they will do 6 weeks of maintenance. The first 3 weeks will give them a lot of new choices for food, but a person should avoid all sugars, artificial sweeteners and starches. They should increase their calorie intake during this time, but not focus too much on the calorie intake. They should continue to weigh themselves daily to ensure they are still on track. The last dose weight will be a person’s morning weight the last day of the hCG drops. After the first 3 weeks are over, they’ll move to the second half of maintenance. During this half, they will slowly reintroduce sugars and starches. Start with whole grains by adding a new one each day. If a person’s weight goes up, then they will discontinue the most current grain until their weight stabilizes, then re-introduce the next starch or sugar.”
For more information on maintaining your target weight after the HCG diet has reached its conclusion, read the Your HCG blog .
When a customer purchases an HCG diet plan from YourHCG.com, they receive a supply of homeopathic HCG drops, industry specific information on HCG weight loss, meal plans, recipes, email and phone support from health coaches who walk them through the process and a lot more.
YourHCG.com also has over 53,000 facebook fans and 12,000 twitter followers that participate in lively discussions, contests, and get support and encouragement from the YourHCG.com health coaches.
About Your HCG: YourHCG.com utilizes the highest standards to compliance protocols as well as manufacturing Kosher and Organic products. In addition, they provide homeopathic remedies that are made with individual care using traditional methods complying with current Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP). They implement high quality standards for the manufacturing of the remedies in strict accordance with the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and the Homeopathic Pharmacopoeia of the United States (HPUS). Utilizing a time tested process; YourHCG.com rely on over 20 years of experience in the nutritional supplements to produce top quality products.
Visit http://www.YourHCG.com or call 877-748-2709 for more information.

吉利区首批廉租房交付使用(图)
description.content:
[来源：洛阳网] 收藏 电邮 打印 评论0条
移动用户：发送短信 LYD 到 10658300
联通用户：发送短信 712 到 10655885
“搬新家啦！”21日上午，在吉利区首批廉租房实物配租仪式上，下岗职工张彦艳一家与其他82户低收入家庭一起，如愿以偿地领到了新房钥匙。
据了解，吉利区廉租房建设去年10月正式启动，现已建成2栋， 共120套。该区计划明年再建设同等规格的廉租房250余套，解决城区低收入群体的住房问题。
新建成的这120套廉租房面积从30平方米到49平方米不等，符合条件的低收入者，每月只需交纳每平方米0.7元的费用即可入住。（洛阳日报报业集团全媒体记者 曾宪平 通讯员 刘蕊 摄）

description.hltext_display: [・伊洛派出所正在筹建]
description.content:
洛阳网12月20日讯 今日从市公安局获悉，为进一步提高我市公安机关整体工作水平，实现警力下沉，便于公安机关及时快速打击各类违法犯罪活动，市公安局将原城市区派出所整合为18个派出所。目前，这些派出所运转良好。
这18个派出所分别为：长春派出所、天津派出所、长安派出所、重庆派出所、南昌派出所、西工派出所、车站派出所、金谷派出所、老城派出所、邙山派出所、东关派出所、?河派出所、洛龙派出所、古城派出所、安乐派出所、高新派出所、龙门派出所和伊洛派出所。
市公安局有关负责人今日介绍，为方便办理户证手续，目前市民仍可在原辖区派出所办理户政业务。如有变动，公安部门将提前发布相关信息。

description.hltext_display: Finanziaria, lesercizio provvisorio arriva in Auladi Raffaella PessinaCome previsto l'Ars ha deciso l'impossibilità di esitare i conti entro il 2010. Armao: "Colpa dei ritardi del Governo sul patto di stabilità"
Good food story continues for consumers and Red Tractor logo
description.content:
More than 90% of consumers have said they will look out for the Red Tractor logo when they go shopping.
People were quizzed at this year’s BBC Good Food Show when they visited the Red Tractor stand ‘A Good Food Story’, watched TV chef Aaron Craze in action and sampled some great British produce.
A record 80% of consumers asked had already heard of the Red Tractor logo and over half of all those questioned recognised that the logo exceeded legal requirements of animal welfare and environmental protection. Over 85% of those questioned already associated the mark with traceability and a guarantee of farm of origin.
NFU Head of Food Chain Lee Woodger said: “With such a large number of people understanding that traceability back to the farm gate is such an important element of the logo it is of no surprise that country of origin was consistently a top priority when it came to what influenced shoppers decisions. This came second only to animal welfare. Price was also a consistent factor that influenced decision making, whereas choosing organic was the least influential factor when choosing food.
“This was the first time that the industry had joined forces for a consumer show; we have such an important story to tell. Farmers and growers are rightly proud of what they do and this was a great opportunity to tell share this message and encourage them to support British farmers by looking out the for Red Tractor logo carrying the Union Jack flag when they shop.”
David Clarke, CEO of Red Tractor Assurance, said: “It’s great to see an overwhelming majority of respondents stating that they will now look out for the logo.
“The findings highlight the importance of the Red Tractor logo; it aids consumer confidence in animal welfare and environmental protection as well as reaffirming the mark as a trusted symbol of quality food.
“We will take this forward and use these findings to help shape the future of our work in communicating Red Tractor and all it stands for.”

event_or_fact.property: ?It?s great to see an overwhelming majority of respondents stating that they will now look out for the logo

description.hltext_display: Fördergeld für Zweckverband - Krautheim
description.content:
Umweltministerin Tanja Gönner und Regierungspräsident Johannes Schmalzl haben jetzt Landesmittel in Höhe rund 800.000 Euro für den weiteren Ausbau der Abwasserbeseitigung des Abwasserzweckverbandes Mittleres Jagsttal mit Sitz in Krautheim freigegeben. "Ich freue mich sehr, die Gemeinden Dörzbach, Krautheim und Mulfingen weiterhin beim Ausbau der Abwasserbeseitigung unterstützen zu können", so die Umweltministerin.
Bereits 2006 hatte das Land mit einer Gesamtförder-summe von rund 5,66 Millionen Euro den Ausbau der zentralen Kläranlage in Krautheim und die Zuleitung der Abwässer aus den bisherigen Kläranlagen Ailringen, Hohebach, Dörzbach und Gommersdorf bezuschusst.

description.hltext_display: Greece Gets Fresh Ratings Warning
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Crisis-stricken Greece received a fresh warning to its credit rating on Tuesday in another blow to Athens' efforts to claw its way back to solvency.
Fitch Ratings placed Greece's BBB- rating on Rating Watch Negative, meaning a downgrade to "junk" status is likely.
The move adds to a series of warnings to eurozone countries from ratings agencies in the past few days. The Republic of Ireland suffered a five-notch downgrade last week, while Spain, Portugal and Belgium were all warned of rating cuts in the past week.
The review "will focus on an assessment of Greece's fiscal sustainability in the wake of the measures that the authorities have taken this year under the EU-IMF program," Fitch said.
It will also focus on the outlook for the Greek economy and the political will and capacity of the Greek government to implement austerity measures to bring down the nation's debt and deficit levels, the agency stated.
The warning makes Fitch the third major rating agency this month to put Greece's rating on review for a possible downgrade.
Moody's and Standard & Poor's, both of whom rate Greek bonds as junk, warned Athens of potential downgrades, citing uncertainty over the nation's ability to bring down its debt levels.
Greece was the first eurozone country to request for aid from the EU, after its borrowing costs rose to prohibitive highs in the summer.

description.hltext_display: Charity receives funding to support Alberta medical trips for sick kids
description.content:
The Northern BC Friends of Children Society received $25,000 from the provincial government to help families with children needing medical care in Alberta with accommodation, food and other related expenses.
Since the societys inception 12 years ago, just over 1,000 clients in the north have received assistance from the childrens charity.
Of that, about 60 families in the Dawson Creek area have benefited, said Kelly Sharp, General Manager of the society, stressing that the money received goes straight to the families in need.
He said that the donation comes in recognition that not all families can access the provincial residency program that helps families who have children at BC Childrens Hospital.
Its big, said Sharp of the donation. Particularly for those people that have to go to Alberta. I know up north theres quite a few who go to Edmonton instead [of Vancouver].
Sharp explained the society helps with the small things, such as gas, accommodation, and food. Whatever we can do, he said.
Most of the fundraising happens in Prince George, but the donations go straight to the families across northern B.C., he said.
Sharp told a story about a family from Chetwynd who are currently seeking help.
The family has a young child who is deaf and blind. They received funding to buy a van so they could travel to Dawson Creek for services, but they dont have winter tires.
A social worker referred the family to the society to see if winter tires could be purchased so the family can travel safely.
Of course, we dont have that deep of pockets, said Sharp. So Ive been trying to find out what type of tires they need. Ive already phoned Kal-Tire in Chetwynd to see whether they could do anything.
He said the case is a work in progress.
Funding from the society is conditional. To be eligible families must live in northern B.C. and have a form filled out by a medical or community service professional. Families in need can also call the society toll free at 1-866-564-2217.
The Friends of Children started up in 1998 in Prince George, when a family needed some help and the community rallied to raise funds.
People thought, A lot of people fall through the cracks, wouldnt this be a good idea to start a society? said Sharp. So they formed the society and since then theyve been serving northern B.C. for over 10 years now.
He added that an additional fundraising body that started out in Prince George, and now runs out of Cranbrook, helps East Kootenay families who travel to Calgary.
Friends of Children also partners with the Variety Childrens Charity out of Vancouver.
Its quite remarkable really, a little charity like this, said Sharp.
Donations are the lifeline of the societys service, and Sharp hopes that more people will consider the organization when wanting to contribute to a charity.
For more information or to donate contact Sharp at 1-866-564-2217.

description.hltext_display: Ponte sullo Stretto, il contraente generale consegna gli elaborati del progetto definitivoEurolink ha redatto 8 mila tavole di elaborati che comprendono l'opera in sé, i raccordi stradali e ferroviari. Matteoli: "Tappa fondamentale nei tempi previsti".
EBLEX iBBQ beats Nigella and Gordon Ramsay in the popularity stakes
description.content:
The EBLEX iBBQ has beaten apps by a host of celebrity chefs to become the second most popular recipe application of 2010.
The app, which is the ideal barbecue planning tool for smartphone users, has been downloaded 137,000 times since its launch in the summer, and was only beaten to the number one spot by Jamie Oliver.
The 2010 barbecue season saw bumper volumes of burgers and grills being sold, with sales peaking at their highest level since 2006.
iBBQ, which has also been featured by Apple in its review of the year’s best cooking apps, brings together all the essential elements for the perfect barbecue, including a selection of recipe ideas and a database of butchers that sell Quality Standard beef and lamb. It also includes downloadable videos and an interactive Grillocations map showing safe and legal sites for outdoor cooking.
The iBBQ app can be downloaded from www.simplybeefandlamb.co.uk

description.hltext_display: Séoul lance de nouvelles manoeuvres militaires
description.content:
SEOUL, 22 décembre (Xinhua) -- La Corée du Sud lancera à partir de mercredi des manoeuvres maritimes de quatre jours au large de la côte est de la péninsule coréenne, et procèdera jeudi à un grand exercice militaire terrestre et aérien, quelques jours après son exercice à tirs réels mené près d'une frontière maritime contestée avec la République populaire démocratique de Corée (RPDC), ont respectivement annoncé le ministère sud-coréen de la Défense et l'armée sud-coréenne.
Ces manoeuvres militaires s'inscrivent, selon les autorités sud-coréennes, dans le cadre d'exercices de routine.
Les exercices maritimes se dérouleront en mer orientale à environ 100 km au sud de la ligne de démarcation maritime avec la RPDC, auxquels participeront des navires de la marine et des hélicoptères Lynx, alors que l'exercice terrestre et aérien aura lieu dans un champ de tir à Pocheon, situé à 40 km au nord-est de Séoul et à 25 km au sud de la frontière terrestre fortifiée entre les deux pays.
Séoul annonce cette décision au lendemain de son exercice à tirs réels dans les eaux proches de l'île de Yeonpyeong, théâtre d'un échange de tirs d'artillerie le mois dernier entre la Corée du Sud et la RPDC.
La RPDC, qui s'est engagée à plusieurs reprises à des représailles contre les manoeuvres militaires de la Corée du Sud, n'a pas réagi pour le moment.
Les forces sud-coréennes seront placées en état d'alerte maximale lors des manoeuvres maritimes, un bâtiment de guerre équipé du système Aegis et des chasseurs étant prêts à intervenir.

description.hltext_display: Moderaten Lars Mikkelä anmäls för bedrägeri
description.author: Andreas Mårtensson
description.content:
Tre personer har polisanmält M-politikern Lars Mikkelä för bedrägeri.
– De som anmäler menar att han tagit ut för mycket ersättning, och att han borde ha känt till vilka regler som gäller, säger Johan Sundkvist på Trelleborgspolisen som lämnat över anmälningarna till åklagarmyndigheten.
Lars Mikkelä, efter årsskiftet ordförande i bildningsnämnden, vill inte kommentera polisanmälan. Men liksom i TA den 16 december hävdar Mikkelä att han inte gjort något medvetet fel. Detta trots att han själv varit med och beslutat att politiker med eget företag måste tjäna 18 000 kronor i månaden för att ha rätt till ersättning för förlorad arbetsinkomst. Mikkelä satt i både kommunstyrelsen och kommunfullmäktige och fattade beslut om det nya reglementet i början av 2007.
Hävdar du ändå att du inte kände till att man måste tjäna så mycket i månaden för att få ersättning?
– Som jag sagt innan så har jag inte uppmärksammat det sen.
Glömde du bort det?
– Jag har mitt politiska uppdrag för att jag vill försöka göra nytta för Trelleborg och inte för arvodets skull.
Men du har inte tänkt på att den siffran gällde?
– Min inkomst har förändrats under tiden utan att jag tänkt på att jag skulle ha kollat upp det.
Enligt Moderaternas etiska regler bör en politiker som befinner sig i en rättsprocess ta time-out från sitt uppdrag. Lars Mikkelä säger att han ska diskutera frågan med sina partikamrater.
– Det får vi i så fall diskutera i fullmäktigegruppen, säger han.
Kommunalrådet Ulf Bingsgård (M) vill inte uttala sig om huruvida Mikkelä ska ta time-out.
– Vi får ta upp det i vår gruppstyrelse och se ifall det finns anledning att rekommendera Lars att ta time-out under tiden som utredningen pågår, säger han.
Time-out eller inte, Ulf Bingsgård säger att han har fortsatt fullt förtroende för Lars Mikkelä.
– Jag är övertygad om att Lars inte skrivit upp några timmar i bedrägligt syfte. Det är en person som varit väldigt duktig och skött sitt uppdrag både inom partiet och nämnden på ett väldigt professionellt sätt. Jag har inget förändrat förtroende för honom, säger han.
Lars-Ingvar Ljungman, ordförande för Moderaterna i Skåne menar att det är upp till partiet lokalt att avgöra om en politiker ska ta time-out eller inte. Petter Larsson på Moderaternas presstjänst säger att riktlinjen är att time-out bör övervägas när åtal är väckt.

description.hltext_display: NCCER Releases Rigger and Signal Person Certification Programs
description.content:
The National Center for Construction Education and Research (NCCER) has released a certification program for signal person and a three-level certification program for riggers (basic, intermediate, and advanced).
Gainesville, FL (Vocus/PRWEB) December 21, 2010
The National Center for Construction Education and Research (NCCER) has released a certification program for signal person and a three-level certification program for riggers (basic, intermediate, and advanced). These certification programs include written assessments and practical examinations that meet or exceed current ASME consensus safety standards and OSHA 29 CFR part 1926 subpart CC.
In order to offer these programs, NCCER Accredited Assessment Centers must successfully complete the application process and become endorsed.
Once endorsed this program can be administered by qualified industry professionals at an NCCER Accredited Assessment Center. This gives the assessment center the advantage of scheduling tests as their equipment and personnel are available and time permits. Test results are available in computer-based and paper/pencil format with results accessible within 15 minutes of submission without any rush fees. NCCER certified riggers and certified signal persons earn portable, industry-recognized credentials that are verifiable in real-time through NCCER’s Automated National Registry (ANR).
Call now for information on becoming an NCCER Rigger and Signal Person Endorsed Accredited Assessment Center, 888.622.3720 or visit http://www.nccer.org/rspe.aspx
About NCCER NCCER is a not-for-profit 501 (c)(3) education foundation created by the construction industry to develop standardized curriculum with portable credentials and to help address the skilled construction workforce shortage. NCCER is recognized by the industry as the training, assessment, certification, and career development standard for the construction and maintenance craft professional. For more information visit http://www.nccer.org or contact NCCER customer service at 888.622.3720.
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prwebrigger/certification/prweb8032979.htm

entity.property: Signal Person Endorsed Accredited Assessment Center
National Center for Construction Education and Research

description.hltext_display: Greeks go on strike before austerity budget vote (Reuters)
description.content:
ATHENS (Reuters) Greek unions called a general strike on Wednesday and Athens was paralyzed by a 24-hour public transport stoppage in protest against the government's 2011 budget, set to pass later as part of an EU/IMF bailout.
The budget, meant to help stem a debt crisis that has shaken the euro zone, includes further tax hikes and wage cuts in state-run enterprises, especially in public transport.
Fitch said on Tuesday it may cut Greece's credit rating next month to junk as both other major rating agencies have done. "Even though this news was expected, it will go down badly with the markets, there is widespread fear about downgrades coming," said Ioanna Telioudi, analyst at HSBC in Athens. Greece's main public and private sector labor unions have called a 3-hour strike from 1000 to 1300 GMT (5 to 8 a.m. ET) in Athens. Thousands are expected to rally outside parliament.
Athens bus and subway drivers have been holding on and off strikes for two weeks, keeping Christmas shoppers from the city center, adding to the strain of recession-hit retailers.
The government threatened on Wednesday to break the public transport strikes, invoking emergency legislation it used earlier this year to dissolve Labor action by truck drivers and other transport workers. "Everyone has to show responsibility ... the state has all the powers it needs to protect the public interest," government spokesman George Petalotis said in a television interview.
Analysts have warned the additional measures will hurt the economy even more without providing guarantees that the country will avoid a debt restructuring to cope with ballooning debt.
The government has a comfortable majority of 156 seats out of 300 in parliament and the budget is expected to be approved despite growing discontent among the ruling PASOK party ranks. "I am giving the government a last chance," said PASOK deputy Thomas Robopoulos during the budget debate on Tuesday. Since the EU/IMF bailout agreement was signed in May, Prime Minister George Papandreou has expelled four deputies for disagreeing publicly with his austerity policies
The socialists, who revealed a gaping budget deficit after coming to power last year, have braved public discontent and taken draconian measures to meet the bailout terms.
The government has cut public sector wages by about 15 percent, increased the retirement age, frozen pensions, cut public spending but has failed to boost tax collection as much as targeted, despite a hefty VAT increase. Greece's lenders have said that the country was broadly on track with its fiscal program but needed to step up reforms and spending cuts next year.
Partly as a result of the measures, the economy is seen shrinking by 3 percent next year after a 4.2 percent drop in 2010, with unemployment jumping to a record 14.6 percent from an estimated 12.1 percent this year.
Greece targets a deficit of 7.4 percent of GDP next year, from about 9.4 percent this year.
Greek protesters clashed with police last week and set fire to cars and a hotel in central Athens earlier this month, as some 50,000 marched against austerity in the biggest and most violent march since three died in protests in May.
(Editing by Louise Ireland)

event_or_fact.property: Even though this news was expected, it will go down badly with the markets, there is widespread fear about downgrades coming
Everyone has to show responsibility ... the state has all the powers it needs to protect the public interest
I am giving the government a last chance

description.hltext_display: 2010 was a 'Perfect Gift' for Canadian Tenors
description.content:
Damian Dovarganes In this Oct. 8, 2010 photo, the Canadian Tenors, from left, Fraser Walters, Clifton Murray, Victor Micallef and Remigio Pereira pose for a photo in Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Damian Dovarganes)
Loading…
A year after releasing their first hit album, the Canadian Tenors are delivering "The Perfect Gift," a compilation of traditional and contemporary holiday music.
"You have the classics like 'O Holy Night' and 'Silent Night,' but there are songs that are not necessarily Christmas-specific," explained tenor Victor Micallef. "Some great producers worked on that, as well," added band mate Clifton Murray. "'Hallelujah' was (produced by) Bob Ezrin, who worked on 'The Wall.'"
That's as in Pink Floyd's "The Wall" _ just one of many aspects of The Tenors that may surprise. The quartet's clean-cut, all-North American looks scream "pre-fab," and, indeed, the band was the brainchild of Canadian composer Jill Ann Siemens, who first started work on the project some 10 years ago. The current configuration of the group is Victor Micallef, Clifton Murray, Remigio Pereira and Fraser Walters, who said that while they might not have come together organically, that's precisely how they've stayed together.
"Unlike some of these other pre-fab groups, there is a lot of money involved and everything," Pereira said. "We started grassroots and just slowly built up. We cut our teeth on the road doing that. That is how it all happened."
The recent holiday album was released in October, months after the group's debut album "The Canadian Tenors" ranked at the top of Billboard's Classical Albums chart.
Before making inroads stateside, Pereira said, the group did 12 shows in 12 small towns without hitting the two main cities _ Saskatoon, Regina.
By late 2009, the Tenors built a solid Canadian following, then caught the attention of Oprah Winfrey, who invited the members to be guests on her show. After that February 2010 appearance, the quartet quickly experienced the so-called "Oprah Effect."
"It is still happening," said Pereira, with a smile.
The four spend more time together on the road than they do with their families these days. And, yes, they're cool with the term "bromance."
"'Bromance,'" replied Micallef. "It does work, but like any relationship, you have to work on it. And communication is key. As soon as you stop talking, there is a problem. So, half our work is the music and half our work is relationship building. So, it is so important or else this thing wouldn't survive more than a year."
The Canadian Tenors wrapped up its 2010 tour schedule Tuesday night (21 December) in Fort Worth, Texas, then planned head north, to the singers' respective homes for the holidays.
Talk about cutting it close. "It kind of makes sense because Christmas is a very busy time for us," said Murray. "Obviously tenors and Christmas go hand in hand."

event_or_fact.property: Unlike some of these other pre-fab groups, there is a lot of money involved and everything; We started grassroots and just slowly built up. We cut our teeth on the road doing that. That is how it all happened.
the group did 12 shows in 12 small towns without hitting the two main cities _ Saskatoon, Regina
It kind of makes sense because Christmas is a very busy time for us; Obviously tenors and Christmas go hand in hand.
You have the classics like 'O Holy Night' and 'Silent Night,' but there are songs that are not necessarily Christmas-specific;Some great producers worked on that, as well,

description.hltext_display: Thigh high boots: How to wear winter's hottest trend
description.author: Kristi Rivera, Houston Shoes Examiner
description.content:
Thigh high boots are everywhere this season. From the runway to the streets of our wonderful city of Houston, you often find them on the stylish and the daring, but lucky for you, I'm here to tell you how you, too, can wear this season's sexiest and hottest trend.
We all love boots, whether that means cowboy boots for some, 5-inch stilettos for others, and cold weather gives us the chance to pull out our favorite pair, if only for a couple of months here in heat and humidity-soaked Houston. Thigh high boots are no longer just for your favorite Julia Roberts movie; they have taken the fashion world by storm. Finding the courage, and the right outfit of course, to wear these boots is not as hard as one might think.
Here are some tips for the weary:
1. Thigh highs look fabulous with leggings and tights. Disclaimer: both leggings and tights are NOT pants - do not wear them as such. If your behind is showing, you are wearing them wrong. Back to the boots - If you are a little nervous about diving straight in with your new boots, pairing them with leggings or tights is a great way to slowly ease into them. Because of the disclaimer above, be sure and wear a tunic or long sweater and pair it with your new boots and voila! Your legs will look instantly longer. A definite plus for the vertically challenged.
2. Minis for the younger and more daring are a definite do. The same goes for dresses. Make sure to keep the hemlines of your skirt above the top of the boot. This tip goes for sweaters and tunics over leggings as well. The best thing about the style is that they definitely elongate your figure, but you run the risk of doing just the opposite if your top, skirt or dress drops farther than the boots.
3. Jeans, jeans, jeans. Skinny jeans are still hot this season and for a very trendy look pull these boots over the outside of your favorite pair. Do not attempt to wear them on the outside of the boots. Remember, we are elongating. Also, just to clarify, we are definitely talking about skinny jeans here, do not attempt to wear bootcut or wide leg jeans with them, it just won't work.
4. The cigarette pant looks just as good as your skinny jeans with these boots. As long as the legs are cut slim and somewhat fitted, the boots will work. You can wear this look anywhere - from the office straight to happy hour to shopping on the weekend.
5. Age isn't always an indicator of what you should or shouldn't wear these days. Jane Fonda appeared on the Late Late Show tonight rocking a pair of black leather thigh highs with a black leather mini. The first thing out of the host's mouth was that she "looked sensational." As with #1 above, pair them with something underneath if you feel more comfortable i.e. leggings, pants.
The good news about the thigh high boots is that they can be worn with so many different things that you probably have in your closet anyway. The even better news is that their very nature elongates the legs and in turn give you a slimmer silhoutte, especially if you follow the tips above.
Don't be afraid to try these boots and you can forget your preconceptions about them. You can wear them and look fabulous.
These tips will have you rocking the season's hottest trend in style.
What do you think? Do you own a pair? Will you be buying some this season? Let us know in the comments below!
Follow me on Twitter for much more shoe related good stuff or you can subscribe at the top of the article.

description.hltext_display: V hlasovaní na Zápas hviezd vedie Crosby, Halák je piaty medzi brankármi
description.content:
Ruský hokejista Jevgenij Malkin sa po návrate po štvorzápasovej pauze po zranení kolena výraznejšie zapísal do povedomia fanúšikov a 31 152 hlasov za posledný týždeň ho vynieslo na 3. miesto medzi útočníkmi v hlasovaní o nominácii pre Zápas hviezd, ktorý sa uskutoční v závere januára v Caroline.
Jaroslav Halák je v hlasovaní fanúšikov spomedzi Slovákov najvyššie.
Autor: SITA
Ruský hokejista Jevgenij Malkin sa po návrate po štvorzápasovej pauze po zranení kolena výraznejšie zapísal do povedomia fanúšikov a 31 152 hlasov za posledný týždeň ho vynieslo na 3. miesto medzi útočníkmi v hlasovaní o nominácii pre Zápas hviezd, ktorý sa uskutoční v závere januára v Caroline.
Hráč Pittsburghu predstihol o 4171 hlasov Stevena Stamkosa z Tampy Bay. Miesto v exhibícii majú zaručené traja najlepší útočníci,
dvaja obrancovia a jeden brankár podľa hlasovania fanúšikov. Celkovo sa v Zápase hviezd predstaví 42 hokejistov.
Lídrom hlasovania, ktoré potrvá do 3. januára, je podľa nhl.com aj naďalej Malkinov spoluhráč z Pittsburghu Sidney Crosby, ktorý dostal celkovo 464 832 bodov. V najlepšej trojke útočníkov je medzi duom z Penguins kapitán Chicaga Jonathan Toews.
Výberu obrancov dominujú Kris Letang z Pittsburghu a Duncan Keith z Chicaga, medzi brankármi vedie Carey Price z Montrealu. Crosby dostal absolútne najviac hlasov, o 122 714 menej má na svojom konte Letang. Z hráčov,ktorých do hlasovania zapísali fanúšikovia, je zatiaľ najobľúbenejší Claude Giroux z Philadelphie so 196 886 hlasmi.
Zo Slovákov je v hlasovaní momentálne najvyššie Jaroslav Halák, ktorému patrí 5. pozícia medzi brankármi. Opore St. Louis Blues dalo svoj hlas 110 722 fanúšikov. Medzi obrancami je Zdeno Chára z Bostonu trinásty s 94 701 hlasmi. Ľubomír Višňovský, o ktorého zaradení do hlasovania rozhodli práve fanúšikovia, má zatiaľ 10 246 bodov. Najviac hlasov spomedzi Slovákov dostal doteraz Marián Hossa z Chicaga (165 238), čo ho medzi útočníkmi radí na priebežnú 13. pozíciu. Výkony Mariána Gáboríka oslovili 53 036 hlasujúcich.

description.hltext_display: Стрелялият по братя в Санданско остава в ареста
description.content:
Състав на Районен съд - Сандански, председателстван от магистрата Димитър Узунов, постанови постоянна мярка за неотклонение "задържане под стража" спрямо Димитър Искренов Методиев от село Илинденци, обвинен в стрелба с нелегална пушка по съселяните му Илия Апостолов и Владимир Апостолов.
Срещу Методиев вече е образувано наказателно производство по член 131 и член 129 от Наказателния кодекс. Престъплението бе извършено от Методиев на 17 декември към 18.00 часа в село Илинденци, при условията на опасен рецидив, чрез използване на незаконно огнестрелно оръжие, вследствие на което е причинил средна телесна повреда на братята Илия и Владимир Апостолови.
Изстреляните от Методиев куршуми попаднаха в коремната кухина на Илия и в гръдната област на Владимир. По случая вече са разпитани множество свидетели от село Илинденци.
Димитър Методиев е осъждан 12 пъти за разнородни престъпления от общ характер, като последното наказание е 7 години ефективно лишаване от свобода. На 5 октомври тази година Методиев бил предсрочно освободен от затвора от изтърпяването на седемгодишната присъда, съобщиха за Дарик от Районен съд - Сандански.

description.hltext_display: "Jag trodde att nu ska vi alla dö"
description.author: Anna Thulin
description.content:
Det här är familjens berättelse om branden på Hovslagaregatan.
Det har börjat ljusna när Noura vaknar vid halv åtta. Hon dricker dagens första kopp kaffe, ett glas mjölk och börjar att amma sin tio dagar gamla son. Det är då hon hör ett ljud. Det låter som att vatten hälls från en flaska, och hon tänker att det kanske är hennes 66-åriga mamma som har glömt kranen på i köket. Eller att mamman har gått upp tidigt för att hon mår dåligt.
Noura lägger barnet ifrån sig och reser sig från sängkanten för att kolla hur modern mår.
När hon kommer ut i hallen känner hon lukten av bensin.
#
Det är två dagar efter lucia, snart tre veckor efter branden. Gatorna ligger hala utanför familjens nya lägenhet som de har fått hyra tillfälligt. Amir bjuder på sött te och berättar att hela familjen sover i samma rum. När de väl kan sova. Noura sitter oftast i soffan och stirrar ut i luften medan barnen slumrar en halvtimme i taget. Ett av barnen vågar inte gå fram till balkongen.
– Vi trodde att det här var det värsta, säger Amir. Men när vi hörde att de misstänkta släppts var det värre än själva branden, mycket värre.
#
Bensinen sticker i näsan. Noura står i hallen och vrider om handtaget till köksdörren, som knarrar till, och hon ser då hur brevinkastet sakta stängs. När Noura kommer fram till ytterdörren blir högerfotens strumpa blöt.
– Jag förstod att det var bensin och lyfte foten. Sedan kikade jag ut genom titthållet, säger Noura.
Genom det lilla hålet ser hon en kvinna som hon känner igen, och längre bort i trappen ser hon kvinnans pojkvän.
Noura ser hur kvinnan tänder eld på en papperslapp. Noura håller knät mot brevinkastet, men kvinnan utanför dörren pressar upp luckan och slänger in den brinnande pappret.
Det sker på ingen tid alls. Elden flammar upp på golvet och bränner Nouras fötter. Sedan slår lågorna tillbaka mot dörren.
#
Det är Nouras vittnesmål som leder till att en 41-årig kvinna och en 34-årig man grips senare samma dag, misstänkta för anstiftelse till mordbrand. Det är hennes vittnesmål som gör att åklagaren häktar de båda personerna på sannolika skäl.
Det är samma vittnesmål, vad Noura säger sig ha sett genom titthålet, som inte räcker till för att väcka ett åtal. Det krävs mer bevisning för att säkerställa att det inte var någon annan som stod utanför dörren, hällde in brandvätska och tände eld på lägenheten, menar åklagaren.
#
Amir vaknar av sin hustrus skrik. Han springer ut i hallen i bara kalsongerna och ser hur elden sprider sig på hallgolvet.
– Jag trodde att nu ska vi alla dö, säger Amir. Men sedan kom jag på att vi kunde hoppa från balkongen. Det är bara två, tre meter till marken och kanske skulle vi bryta benen, men vi dör inte.
Under tiden som röken sprids har Amirs svärmor vaknat. Noura är panikslagen och Amir ropar att alla ska ta sig ut på balkongen.
Trots att det finns fyra mobiltelefoner hemma hittar han inte en enda. Svärmodern vet, pekar på bokhyllan. Tillsammans springer de ut på balkongen och ringer samtidigt 112. Svärmodern med den yngsta flickan i handen, som är ett och ett halvt år. Noura med treåriga dottern. Och Amir med bebisen i famnen.
#
Grannarna har hjälpt till att samla in kläder och leksaker. Familjen är tacksam för all deras hjälp. Bostadsbolaget Trelleborgshem har sett till att de inte behöver betala dubbla hyror under tiden den utbrända lägenheten renoveras.
– Jag säger inte till mina barn att allt är förstört. Jag har köpt nya leksaker. Men min dotter undrar ju, varför kan jag inte få bo i mitt eget rum? Varför flyttar vi runt från ett hotell, till lägenhet i Malmö och sedan tillbaka till Trelleborg? Jag vill inte göra henne ledsen. Jag tror inte hon har minnen från branden för hon sov.
#
Ute på balkongen ser familjen hur rutorna krossas av hettan. Amir kastar äldsta dotter till en granne som står nedanför på gården. Han har tappat tidsuppfattningen men uppskattar att en till fem minuter har passerat sedan han vaknade.
Grannen i lägenheten bredvid har vaknat av uppståndelsen. Noura ropar till honom: ”ta bebisen, ta bebisen!”
– Min granne är gammal och fick inte lyfta armen. Han kunde högst bära ett halvkilo på grund av problem med axeln, säger Amir. Men gud gav honom styrka att bära bebisen.
Det sista barnet skjutsas också över till grannen på balkongen bredvid.
När räddningstjänsten kommer fram arbetar brandmännen snabbt. Svärmodern får hjälp ned via en stege. Till slut också Noura och Amir. Familjen förs till sjukhus där man undersöker skadorna: Nouras fötter är brända, Amir har brännskador på bröstkorgen och fingrarna. Men, de lever.
#
Polisen har knackat dörr i området där familjen bor och i områdena i Trelleborg där de misstänka bor, men arbetet har inte lett vidare. Ingen har kunnat stödja familjens uppgifter, eller de misstänktas förklaring om att de befunnit sig på en annan plats vid brandtillfället.
Amir fyller på tekopparna i lånelägenheten. Det vita vinterljuset faller över Noura, där hon sitter på madrassen på golvet och ammar yngsta barnet, nu en dryg månad gammal. Hon talar upprört och hennes man översätter:
– Jag har fått gå till läkaren för att jag mår dåligt. Jag dog nästan, tillsammans med mina barn och min mor och min make, och nu säger de att det inte finns bevis.
Noura säger att de som ville splittra deras familj inte har lyckats. Det är tack vare sin nyfödda son som hon gick upp tidigt och ammade, vilket gjorde att de hann fly branden. Hon säger att kärleken inom familjen är starkare än någonsin.
Familjen är dock besviken på att de inte har fått hjälp från socialen eller fått någon krishjälp. Brottsoffersamordnare Karin Hammar säger att hon har skickat ett brev med brottofferjourens kontaktuppgifter till familjens gamla adress. Hon vet dock inte om brevet har kommit fram. Trelleborgs Allehanda har försökt att kontakta socialförvaltningen utan resultat.
Fotnot: Amir och Noura heter egentligen något annat.

description.hltext_display: Marián Hossa sa vráti na ľad až po Vianociach
description.content:
Slovenský hokejový útočník Marián Hossa sa do vianočných sviatkov neobjaví v zostave Chicago Blackhawks v zámorskej hokejovej NHL.
Marián Hossa.
Autor: SITA
Pôvodne sa uvažovalo, že by trenčiansky odchovanec mohol hrať v stredu proti Nashville. Hossa absolvoval podľa denníka Chicago Sun-Times v utorok tréningovú jednotku, do zápasu však nemôže ešte zasiahnuť.
Tridsaťjedenročný útočník sa v závere novembra na tréningu nešťastne zrazil so spoluhráčom Nickom Boyntonom. Zatiaľ čo Boynton po kolízii pokračoval v príprave, Slovákovi museli pomáhať z ľadu. Podľa prvotnej prognózy mal Marián Hossa pauzovať približne dva až tri týždne pre bližšie nešpecifikované zranenie v dolnej časti tela.
Tréner Joel Quenneville okrem Hossu vylúčil aj štart Patricka Kana, ktorý v utorok už tretí deň v rade netrénoval. Kane si členok opätovne zranil počas sobotňajšej prípravy.
UBYTUJSA.SK / MONAMOUR.SK

description.hltext_display: UK House Prices Likely To Fall 2% In 2011: RICS
description.content:
(RTTNews) - British house prices are likely to fall by around 2% next year, the Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors said Wednesday.
However, the decrease in supply to the market is set to prevent the decline amounting to more than 5% next year. The RICS forecasts the number of housing transactions in 2011 at around 900,000.
The RICS house price balance remained negative in November with respondents reporting decline in house prices outweighed those saying increases by 44%.
Earlier this month, property website Rightmove said sellers will continue to drop their asking prices in 2011 with national average expected to decline by up to 5%.
Today's report showed that government's spending cuts posed a risk, which would increase unemployment and ultimately reduce demand for properties.

description.hltext_display: Police: Thousands of tons of wild animals smuggled through Vietnam to China in past year
description.content:
HANOI, Vietnam - Police in Vietnam say an estimated 4,500 tons of wild animals mostly snakes, turtles and pangolins have been smuggled through the Southeast Asian country during the past year.
Lt. Col. Vu Duyen Hai of the Department of Environmental Police says the animals are smuggled in from Laos, Thailand, Cambodia and Myanmar and taken through Vietnam before heading to China where they are eaten as delicacies or used in traditional medicines.
Hai says the estimate is based on information from police, border guards, customs and wildlife officials. He says he does not have a figure for the total numbers of animals.
He said Wednesday that the smugglers have become increasingly sophisticated to evade authorities.

event_or_fact.property: he does not have a figure for the total numbers of animals
the animals are smuggled in from Laos, Thailand, Cambodia and Myanmar and taken through Vietnam before heading to China where they are eaten as delicacies or used in traditional medicines
the estimate is based on information from police, border guards, customs and wildlife officials
the smugglers have become increasingly sophisticated to evade authorities.

description.content: Berlin (dpa) - Bundesverkehrsminister Peter Ramsauer hat angesichts der aktuellen Verkehrsprobleme jahrelange Versäumnisse bei der Bahn eingeräumt. Man habe mit erheblichen technischen Problemen zu kämpfen, die aus der Vergangenheit herrührten, sagte der CSU- Politiker im ARD-Morgenmagazin. In den letzten zehn Jahren sei zudem an der sogenannten Bereithaltung gespart worden....

description.hltext_display: NFU backs hemp processor move to save growers unnecessary licence fee costs
description.content:
The NFU is backing a move by one of the leading hemp processors to bear the burden of licence fee costs being introduced by the Home Office which will penalise all industrial hemp growers in the UK.
Hemptechnology will be writing to all growers to inform them of the action which they estimate could represent up to £60,000 of unnecessary costs. The Home Office introduced licence fees last month under the Misuse of Drugs Act (MDA) without consultation with the industrial hemp industry. It followed a more stringent regime of licences that were introduced in October 2009.
The increasing demand for hemp based products for markets such as the domestic construction industry and the export market for the fibres, used in the manufacture of BMW 5 and 3 series cars, means Hemptechnology is looking to more than double the hectares grown this year.
NFU Vice President Gwyn Jones said: “We are continuing to lobby for the removal of industrial hemp from the Misuse of Drugs Act and we are aiming to put as much pressure as possible on the Home Office. The continued inclusion is creating significant burdens for growers’ and the developing domestic processing and manufacturing industries. It is ludicrous that an industrial fibre crop continues to be subject to rules created for controlling illegal drugs. Industrial hemp has an important role to play in mitigating greenhouse gas emissions, providing diversification in break crops for growers and creating green jobs in the UK.
“Hemp technology should be applauded for their positive action on this issue. However, the unnecessary and significant costs, along with the increased administration burden from the licence regime threatens the future of this industry.”

event_or_fact.property: ?We are continuing to lobby for the removal of industrial hemp from the Misuse of Drugs Act and we are aiming to put as much pressure as possible on the Home Office

description.hltext_display: اسرائيل تتقدم بشكوى امام الامم المتحدة رداً على اطلاق الصواريخ من غزة
description.content:
تقدمت اسرائيل بشكوى امام الامم المتحدة بعد تزايد اطلاق الصواريخ والقذائف من قطاع غزة على اراضيها الجنوبية في الايام الاخيرة، على ما افادت وزارة الخارجية الاسرائيلية.
واكد السفير الاسرائيلي لدى الامم المتحدة ميرون روفن في رسالة وجهها الى مجلس الامن والى الامين العام للمنظمة الدولية بان كي مون ان "حوادث الايام الاخيرة تندرج في سياق تصعيد للهجمات الارهابية انطلاقا من قطاع غزة".
واوضحت الرسالة ان ثلاثة صواريخ و18 قذيفة هاون تم اطلاقها باتجاه جنوب اسرائيل منذ 19 كانون الاول/ديسمبر.
كما جاء في الرسالة ان "اسرائيل تعتبر ان سلطة الامر الواقع في قطاع غزة (حماس) مسؤولة بالكامل عن كل هذه الحوادث (...). وردا على هذه الهجمات، مارست اسرائيل وستواصل ممارسة حقها في الدفاع عن النفس".

description.hltext_display: «Rockbands sind eigentlich langweilig»
description.content:
Mando Diao erinnern sich an nichts
Video: news.de
Weihnachten steht vor der Tür, die Zeit der Besinnlichkeit, aber auch der Rückbesinnung. War 2010 ein gutes Jahr für Mando Diao?
Norén: Ich kann mich ehrlich gesagt an gar nicht so viel erinnern.
Dann muss es wohl ein gutes Jahr gewesen sein.
Norén: Wahrscheinlich. Mein Gott, ich kann mich echt an gar nichts erinnern!
Dixgard: Wir haben ein MTV Unplugged gemacht. Das war gut. Das hat sich gut angefühlt. Aber die Details davon? Verschwunden!
War die Unplugged-Session das Highlight in Eurem Jahr?
Norén: Auf jeden Fall. Und mir ist noch etwas eingefallen: Als wir im Sommer beim Southside und Hurricane gespielt haben - das war eines der besten Erlebnisse, die ich seit langer Zeit auf der Bühne hatte.
Mögt Ihr Weihnachten? Oder nervt es eher?
Norén: Ich mag es. Weihnachten ist die einzige Zeit im Jahr, wo wir keine Konzerte spielen können, weil uns an diesen Tagen niemand engagieren will. Deshalb nutzen wir die Möglichkeit, ein bisschen Zeit mit der Familie zu verbringen.
Das klingt fast, als würdet ihr an Heiligabend lieber auf der Bühne stehen.
Dixgard: Nein, natürlich nicht.
Norén: Aber grundsätzlich fällt es uns schon sehr schwer, Konzertangebote abzulehnen. Auf der Bühne zu stehen ist einfach die Essenz von dem, was wir tun. Deshalb ist es immer sehr schwer, nein zu sagen, wenn uns jemand für eine Show haben will.
Dixgard: Das wäre, als ob wir zu unserer eigenen Persönlichkeit nein sagen würden.
Ist es dann nicht schwierig, sich plötzlich an den ruhigen Lebenswandel an den Feiertagen zu gewöhnen?
Norén: Früher war das so. Als wir 23, 24 waren, da fiel uns das auf jeden Fall schwerer als heute.
Dixgard: Es war dann jedes Mal so, als würde man für zwei Tage in ein Koma fallen, wenn man nach Hause kam. Jetzt ist es besser geworden.
Wie muss man sich Weihnachten im Hause Mando Diao vorstellen?
Dixgard: Sehr verschneit.
Norén: Wie ein Klischee. Wir feiern in den Wäldern von Dalarna. Es sieht aus wie in einem Disney-Film. Überall sind Weihnachtsbäume, und es gibt tonnenweise Schnee.
22.12.2010
Interview
Weihnachten bei Mando Diao
Video: news.de
Das klingt wirklich wie ein Klischee. Und durchaus so, als ob es einem nach ein paar Jahren zum Hals raushängen kann.
Norén: Nein. Weihnachten soll so sein wie Disneyworld. Der Sinn davon ist, dass wir alle wieder Kinder werden. Deshalb lieben wir Weihnachten auch so: Wir können noch einmal so tun, als ob wir jung sind. Wir singen, wir kriegen Geschenke, wir tun so, als seien wir glücklich.
Dixgard: Wenn wir mit Mando Diao Lieder schreiben, versuchen wir, eine ganz ähnliche Atmosphäre zu kreieren. Ein bisschen Naivität, Unschuld, ein Gefühl von Kindheit.
Singt Ihr selbst an Weihnachten und holt die Gitarren raus?
Norén: Eigentlich nicht. Das passiert eher in der Mittsommernacht.
Wie sieht es mit Geschenken aus? Denkt Ihr Euch kleine Überraschungen für die anderen Mitglieder von Mando Diao aus?
Norén: Nein. Wir mögen uns ja eigentlich gar nicht. Das größte Geschenk ist es, dass wir an Weihnachten nicht so viel Zeit miteinander verbringen müssen. (lacht)
Könntet Ihr Euch vorstellen, irgendwann ein Weihnachtslied zu schreiben?
Norén: Wir haben schon eins.
Dixgard: Es ist in der Schublade, vielleicht bringen wir es eines Tages heraus.
Norén: Es ist kein Weihnachtslied im Sinne von «oh wunderbare, fröhliche Weihnachtszeit». Aber das Lied erzählt eine Geschichte, die an Heiligabend spielt.
Könnte das dann eines Tages eine Weihnachtssingle von Mando Diao werden?
Norén: Keine Ahnung. Wir haben so viele Lieder, von denen wir noch nicht so recht wissen, was wir damit anfangen sollen. Sie sind einfach da. Manche Lieder sind auch gar nicht für die Öffentlichkeit gedacht, sondern nur für uns.
Dixgard: Vielleicht ergibt sich irgendwann mal eine Gelegenheit, das Lied herauszubringen. Das passiert uns recht oft, dass sich einfach so eine unerwartete Möglichkeit auftut. Bei MTV Unplugged war das auch so. Die Leute von MTV haben uns gefragt, und wir haben gesagt: Das machen wir.
Wird die Erfahrung der Unplugged-Sessions sich auf den Sound von Mando Diao auswirken? Könnte das nächste reguläre Album auch ein bisschen akustischer werden?
Norén: Ja. Rockbands an sich sind ja eigentlich ziemlich langweilig. Ständig muss man alles auf genau die gleiche Art und Weise spielen.
Dixgard: Zumindest gilt das für einige Bands. Wir versuchen natürlich, das zu vermeiden.
Norén: Wir versuchen schon lange, aus dem Mando-Diao-Kostüm herauszukommen. Deshalb sind wir immer auf der Suche nach Neuem. Und mehr akustische Elemente sind ein Weg dahin.
Schon vor dem Unplugged-Album habt Ihr bei Konzerten ja einen Teil gehabt, wo Ihr auf einer kleinen Bühne mitten im Publikum ein paar Stücke rein akustisch spielt.
Norén: Das ist einfach die beste Methode, um dem Publikum zu zeigen, wie der Song eigentlich gedacht ist. Alle unsere Lieder sind ganz schlicht auf dem Klavier oder der Gitarre komponiert, und dann entwickeln sie sich und wachsen. Wenn wir akustisch spielen, ist das ein bisschen, als ob man in einem Fotoalbum blättert: Dann sieht man, wie der Song aussah, als er noch ganz klein war und gerade erst auf die Welt kam. Bei Fotos ist es ja auch meistens so: Babys sind viel schöner als erwachsene Menschen.
Habt Ihr besondere Pläne für Silvester?
Norén: Ich werde versuchen, einfach gar nichts zu tun. Genau wie an Weihnachten. Einfach entspannen. Aber Björn wird groß feiern: Er geht zu einer Hochzeit.
Dixgard: Das stimmt. Ein etwas exzentrischer Freund von mir heiratet. Es ist das erste Mal seit langer Zeit, dass ich an Silvester feiern gehe. Bestimmt seit sieben oder acht Jahren. Ich mag das sonst eigentlich nicht. Alle suchen immer nach der ultimativen Silvesterparty, und dann ist es eigentlich immer eine Enttäuschung, weil man sich viel zu viel davon versprochen hat.
Und was steht 2011 für Mando Diao an?
Norén: Wir werden uns kurz nach Neujahr zusammensetzen und einen Schlachtplan erstellen. Wir werden schauen, welche neuen Songs wir haben und ob man daraus vielleicht ein neues Album machen kann.
Es könnte also schon sehr bald eine neue Platte von Mando Diao geben?
Norén: Vielleicht. Wir nehmen jedes Album auf, als könnte es das letzte sein. Es könnte also auch sein, dass nach Give Me Fire gar nichts mehr kommt.
Dixgard: Die Songs kommen einfach, und sie sagen dir, was gut für sie ist und in welchem Kontext sie gut passen würden.
Wenn Ihr so viele Lieder habt, die nicht gut zu Mando Diao passen, könnte man sie ja auch anders veröffentlichen. Zum Beispiel als Solo-Album.
Norén: Ich glaube nicht, dass das für uns funktioniert. Wir sind wie siamesische Zwillinge. Wenn ich ein Soloalbum machen wollte, würde ich gern Björn dabei haben, um ein paar Lieder mit zu schreiben und auch einige zu singen. Ich hätte gerne CJ am Bass. Und wahrscheinlich auch einen Produzenten, mit dem wir schon als Mando Diao gearbeitet haben. Deshalb würde ein Soloalbum einfach keinen Sinn machen. Jedenfalls nicht zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt.
Interpret: Mando Diao
Titel: MTV Unplugged - Above And Beyond

description.hltext_display: الحكومة العراقية الجديدة تعقد اليوم اول اجتماع لها
description.content:
تعقد الحكومة العراقية الجديدة غداة نيلها ثقة البرلمان اول اجتماع لها برئاسة رئيس الوزراء نوري المالكي لمناقشة اولوياتها، وفي مقدمتها مسألة تثبيت الامن وملف تطوير العلاقات الخارجية، كما افاد مسؤول رفيع.
وقال علي الموسوي المستشار الاعلامي لرئيس الوزراء في تصريح لوكالة فرانس برس "سيعقد مجلس الوزراء جلسته الاولى لاعضاء الحكومة الجدد قبل ظهر اليوم".
واكد الموسوي ان "اعضاء الحكومة سيباشرون مهامهم فورا بعد انعقاد الاجتماع"، مشيرا الى ان "اولوليات الحكومة الجديدة ستنصب على ملف تثبيت الامن وملف تطوير العلاقات الخارجية والخدمات وعلى رأسها الكهرباء".
ومنح مجلس النواب العراقي الثلاثاء ثقته للحكومة الجديدة التي طال انتظارها والتي سيتولى فيها المالكي بالوكالة الحقائب الوزارية الامنية الثلاث، الداخلية والدفاع والامن الوطني.
ولم يتم بعد تعيين وزراء لشغل عشر حقائب من اصل 45 في حكومة المالكي، الذي يبدأ ولاية ثانية، وذلك بهدف التمكن من توزير نساء، كما قال رئيس الوزراء.
لكن المالكي الذي قال ان الحكومة لا تمثل طموحاته اكد ان قضية تعيين الوزراء الباقين هي مسألة ايام لا اكثر.

description.hltext_display: 58697: el premio más madrugador
description.author: LUCÍA PALACIOS | MADRID
description.content: 9 de la mañana de este 22 de diciembre. Comienza la Navidad con el tradicional sorteo de la lotería. Los bombos con las 85.000 bolas ya han empezado a girar. La suerte está echada y millones de españoles siguen con ilusión el transcurso de estas horas en las que la fortuna puede llamar a su puertas. Los niños de San Ildefonso comienzan a cantar los 1.787 premios que repartirán más de 2.320 millones de euros. La principal novedad del popular sorteo es el cambio de sede. El objetivo es tener un espacio más amplio para la celebración. Según los datos facilitados por Loterías y Apuestas del Estado (LAE), el aforo del nuevo salón se eleva a unas 2.000 personas, frente a las 300 butacas que había en el antiguo salón. Otra novedad es la posibilidad de cobrar los premios grandes' al día siguiente, en lugar de tener que esperar nueve días para hacerse con el dinero. Los protagonistas de la jornada son los niños de San Ildefonso -que cantan los números y los premios- y los bombos, que, construidos con una aleación de latón y bronce, reparten suerte desde 2006. El más grande, el de los números, pesa casi 1.000 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 1,65 metros; el de los premios, más pequeño, pesa 125 kilos y tiene un diámetro de 0,60. A partir de las 9.00 horas da comienzo el espectáculo. Antes, todos aquellos que quieran comprobar que su número está dentro de los bombos puede hacerlo. Después, la suerte está echada. Los bombos comenzarán a girar y durante aproximadamente tres horas y media llegarán los 1.787 premios, entre ellos el 'Gordo' y otros doce premios mayores. El primer premio está dotado con tres millones de euros, lo que supone que el portador de un décimo agraciado se embolsará 300.000 euros. El segundo está dotado con un millón de euros (100.000 euros al décimo); el tercero con 500.000 euros (50.000 euros el décimo); dos cuartos premios dotado cada uno con 200.000 (20.000 euros por décimo) y ocho quintos premios dotado cada uno con 50.000 euros (5.000 euros por décimo).

description.hltext_display: Beskjutne butiksägaren:"Jag älskar honom"
description.author: Elin Fjellman Jaderup
description.content:
Foto: Henrik Rosenqvist
Naser Yazdanpanah känner ingen ilska mot 38-åringen som enligt åklagaren försökte mörda honom. - Han är sjuk. Jag hoppas att han får hjälp.
Vi besöker Naser Yazdanpanah, skräddaren och frisören på Lönngatan som denna höst haft uppemot femtio samtal med journalister. – Till och med från Japan, berättar han.
Journalisterna har frågat om skotten lördagen 23 oktober. Naser Yazdanpanah har upprepat: – Jag är inte rädd.
Nu, nästan två månader senare, häktas den redan tidigare utpekade 38-åringen på sannolika skäl misstänkt för mordförsök på bland andra Naser Yazdanpanah.
Naser Yazdanpanah är det enda kända offret för serieskjutningarna som har mött gärningsmannen på nära håll. Han upprepar sin berättelse: Det var tidig kväll. Han stod vid sin strykbräda och arbetade, vänd mot fönstret som vetter mot gården. Ute var det helt mörkt. Rummet där han stod och strök var upplyst. Han hörde ett ljud mot fönstret och tänkte: stenkastning. Han sprang ut genom entrédörren på framsidan och mötte en man på väg från gården. – Jag frågar honom: Varför kastar du sten? Han säger: Det var inte jag! Jag säger: Jo, det var du! Det är ingen annan här.
Naser Yazdanpanah försöker hålla fast mannen samtidigt som han skriker på hjälp. Men han har sina innetofflor på fötterna och tappar balansen. Mannen skallar honom och flyr. Naser Yazdanpanah larmar polisen som kommer direkt och upptäcker att det inte är fråga om stenkastning. I fönsterkarmen sitter kulor.
Naser Yazdanpanahs ena framtand är skadad av skallningen. Polisen följer honom till sjukhuset för att försöka säkra bevis. Den yttre glasrutan som skadades av skotten tar polisen med sig.
När 38-åringen grips kommer journalisterna tillbaka till Naser Yazdanpanah. De visar bilder på den misstänkte. Naser Yazdanpanah säger att han är så gott som säker: mannen på bilden är samma person som han blev skallad av.
Nu bekräftas hans utpekande av åklagaren. Men Naser Yazdanpanahs starkaste känsla är inte lättnad. Som brottsoffer känner han sig mest av allt ensam och ledsen. Vad som händer i polisutredningen vet han inte mer om än vad tidningarna rapporterar. Och eftersom han inte kan läsa och skriva på svenska behöver han hjälp med översättningen.
Det är mycket han undrar. Vad hände med glasrutan som polisen tog med sig? Varför tar allt så lång tid? Varför får han ingen advokat? Vad har han egentligen för rättigheter? Varför hör ingen av sig och berättar vad som gäller?
Framtanden är fortfarande lös. Den börjar bli missfärgad.
Men vad känner Naser Yazdanpanah för den man som enligt åklagaren försökte döda honom? Han hänvisar till sin religion när han svarar. – Jag älskar honom. Han är en människa.

description.hltext_display: ترنتينو الإيطالي وفنربغشة التركي بطلا العالم للكرة الطائرة
description.content:
احتفظ ترنتينو الإيطالي بلقب بطولة العالم للأندية للكرة الطائرة إثر فوزه على وصيفه سكر بيلشاتوف البولندي 3-1 (الأشواط 25-22 و25-19 و20-25 و25-16) في المباراة النهائية التي اجريت في الدوحة.
واحرز بيكان الإيراني المركز الثالث بعد فوزه المثير علي بوليفار الأرجنتيني 3-2. وتقدم بوليفار في الشوطين الأولين بنتيجة واحدة 25-23، لكن بيكان تألق في الأشواط الثلاثة الأخيرة وانتزعها باستحقاق وجدارة 25-23 و25-20 و15-13 على التوالي.
وتوّج فنربغشة التركي بطلاً للسيدات بعد فوزه على اوساسكو البرازيلي 3-صفر (الأشواط 25-23 و25-22 و25-17).
وحلّ برغامو الإيطالي ثالثاً بتغلبه على ميرادور الدومنيكاني 3-1 (الأشواط 25-8 و23-25 و25-8 و25-15).

description.hltext_display: Parlament in Athen stimmt über Sparhaushalt ab
description.content: Athen (dpa) - Im griechischen Parlament geht die Debatte über den umstrittenen Sparhaushalt in die letzte Runde. Nach fünf Tagen hitziger Kontroversen soll unmittelbar nach Mitternacht die Abstimmung über den Haushalt 2011 beginnen. Das neue Budget sieht massive Sparmaßnahmen und Mehrbelastungen für die Bürger vor. Damit will die sozialistische Regierung über sechs Milliarden...

description.hltext_display: Russian president heads to India's financial capital
description.content:
NEW DELHI (AFP) - Russia and India agreed Tuesday on a series of defence and nuclear deals potentially worth billions of dollars and pledged to deepen cooperation on counter-terrorism and regional security.
The agreements surrounded talks in New Delhi between visiting Russian President Dmitry Medvedev and Indian Premier Manmohan Singh, during which both sides set a target of doubling bilateral trade to 20 billion dollars by 2015.
They also signed a contract envisaging the joint design and development of fifth-generation fighter aircraft with stealth capabilities.
Although no figures were mentioned, experts say the final fighter deal could be worth close to 30 billion dollars, with India planning to induct up to 300 of the aircraft into its air force.
The two leaders also discussed plans for Russia to build two additional generating units at a nuclear power plant in the southern Indian state of Tamil Nadu, where it is already setting up two reactors.
Energy-hungry India is one of the world's biggest markets for nuclear technology with plans to reach a nuclear power capacity of 63,000 megawatts by 2032, from the current level of 4,560 megawatts.
Hailing what he described as a "special and privileged" strategic partnership, Singh said Russia was a "time-tested friend ... that has stood by us in our times of need in the past."
Medvedev arrived in India on Tuesday, seeking to fend off growing international competition for lucrative Indian defence contracts that were once monopolised by Moscow.
His trip capped a flurry of top-level diplomatic activity that has seen the leaders of all five permanent members of the UN Security Council beat a trade-focused path to India's door over the past six months.
British Prime Minister David Cameron was here in July, and US President Barack Obama, French President Nicolas Sarkozy and Chinese Premier Wen Jiabao have passed through over the last six weeks.
Traditionally India's default defence supplier, Russia faces stiff competition from Europe and the United States as India diversifies its sources of military hardware and becomes more demanding over pricing and quality.
Medvedev was also expected to use his visit to lobby India to select Russian-made MiG-35s for a 12-billion-dollar contract for 126 fighter jets.
European and US aeronautical giants including Dassault Aviation, Boeing Co. and Lockheed Martin Corp. are also bidding for the tender.
Wary of China's military modernisation drive, India is embarking on what global consultancy firm KPMG has described as "one of the largest procurement cycles in the world".
Between now and 2016, India's defence sector is expected to spend 112 billion dollars on capital defence acquisitions, KPMG said in a recent report.
New Delhi and Moscow enjoy close ties that date back to the 1950s and analysts say Russia retains a competitive edge as an old ally even as India looks to build new strategic partnerships.
In a remark that will play well with his hosts, Medvedev voiced Moscow's support for India "as a deserving and strong candidate" for a permanent seat in an expanded UN Security Council.
As well as bilateral issues, the two leaders discussed regional security and agreed to deepen cooperation in stabilising Afghanistan and confronting terrorism.
"Those who hide terrorists hide criminals. No modern civilised state can hide terrorists," Medvedev said.
He made no specific mention of India's arch-rival Pakistan, which Delhi accuses of harbouring militant groups like Lashkar-e-Taiba -- blamed for the November 2008 attacks on Mumbai.
On Wednesday, Medvedev was scheduled to visit the Taj Mahal city of Agra before flying on to Mumbai.

event_or_fact.property: Those who hide terrorists hide criminals.; No modern civilised state can hide terrorists

description.hltext_display: Activision targets EA in $400 million lawsuit
description.content:
Activision, the publisher of the smash-hit shooter "Call of Duty: Black Ops," has added a new target in its lawsuit against two former executives: rival video game maker Electronic Arts.
In a court filing Tuesday, Activision for the first time valued its claim at $400 million.
The filing is the latest salvo in a legal shootout that began when Jason West and Vince Zampella sued Activision for $36 million in March, claiming Activision fired them to avoid paying royalties for their work on the "Call of Duty" franchise.
Activision claims EA lured the men away despite their having two years left on their contract. The two later formed Respawn Entertainment, which will create games exclusively for release by EA.
EA did not immediately respond to a request for comment.

description.hltext_display: India govt willing to bear 1/3 of FY11 fuel subsidy: official
description.content: NEW DELHI, Dec 22 (Reuters) - The Indian government is willing to bear one-third of fuel subsidies in the fiscal year that ends in March 2011, Finance Secretary Ashok Chawla said on Wednesday.
