description.hltext_display: Überwachungsoffensive in Paris
description.content:
In Paris sollen über 13.000 öffentliche und private Kameras installiert und an ein gemeinsames Netz zusammengeführt werden. Wie die Zeitung Le Figaro berichtet, könnten die Aufzeichnungen sogar einen Monat lang gespeichert werden. Nachdem zu Beginn des Jahres Geschäften erlaubt wurde, ihre Überwachungskameras auch auf öffentliche Bereiche auszurichten, verschärft Paris nun die Gangart erneut. In dem Zeitungsbericht erklärte Michel Gaudin, Präfekt der Pariser Polizei: "Die Videokameras ersetzen die Polizisten nicht, aber sie werden ihre Arbeitsweise revolutionieren."
Damit sollen Beamte künftig von ihrer Polizeiwache aus auf Videomaterial aus Museen oder auch von Kaufhäusern zugreifen können. Um die Bilder zum Beispiel auch im Innenministerium auszuwerten, wird derzeit an einem System gearbeitet. Dieses Programm soll dann die Analyse leichter machen.
Anfänglich sollte lediglich die Anzahl der öffentlichen Kameras von 400 auf 1000 erhöht werden. Mit der Einsichtnahme und Zusammenführung der unterschiedlichsten Videodaten, wird nun ein neue Überwachungs-Dimension angestrebt.

description.hltext_display: Japanese Supermarket Sales Fall In November
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Japanese supermarket sales declined at a pace of 0.5% annually in November, the Japan Chain Stores Association said on Wednesday. This follows a 0.3% fall in October.
Before adjustment, sales recorded an annual decrease of 1.8%, smaller than the 2.5% decrease seen in the previous month.
Survey data released by the Economy Watchers on December 8 showed that Japanese current conditions strengthened in November after easing for three straight months. The survey suggested that the economy is picking up moderately, but it is now showing soft spots.

description.hltext_display: کارگران توانبخش الوند قزوین 21 ماه حقوق نگرفته‌اند
description.content:
تعدادی از کارگران توانبخشی الوند قزوین با مراجعه به دفتر خبرگزاری ایلنا نسبت به عدم توجه صاحب این کارخانه و برخی از مسئولان به نپرداختن 21 ماه از حقوق‌شان معترض بودند.
آفتاب: تعدادی از کارگران توانبخشی الوند قزوین با مراجعه به دفتر خبرگزاری ایلنا نسبت به عدم توجه صاحب این کارخانه و برخی از مسئولین
” با سیلی صورت‌مان را سرخ نگه می‌داریم، برخی‌ها از ما کارگران هنوز مستاجرند و فرزند دانشجو دارند، کسی به دادمان نمی‌رسد. “
به نپرداختن 21 ماه از حقوق‌شان معترض بودند.
این کارگران که تا 25 سال سابقه کارگری دارند در مراجعه به دفتر خبرگزاری ایلنا در شهر صنعتی البرز از عدم پرداخت حقوق 21 ماهه خود شکایت داشتندو گفتند: با توجه به اینکه کارخانه در حال حاضر تولید و فروش دارد، ولی متاسفانه کارفرما با ادعای ورشکستگی ،به ما کارگران حقوق نمی‌دهد.
عدم پرداخت بیمه این کارگران به تامین اجتماعی در 9 ماه گذشته از دیگر مشکلات کارگران توانبخش الوند قزوین است و این کارگران اعلام داشتند: در جلسه کمیسیون امنیت کارگری شهرستان البرز که همزمان با سفر رئیس‌جمهوری محترم به استان برگزارشد، نماینده این شرکت در جلسه قول داد تا پانزدهم
” وقتی مشکلات‌مان را برای برخی از مسئولان می‌گوییم، انگار آقایان به داستان گوش می‌دهند و درکی از 21 ماه حقوق نگرفتن کارگران ندارند که جای تاسف دارد. “
آذر ماه جاری نسبت به پرداخت 3 ماه از حقوق معوقه اقدام کند که تاکنون این قول عملی نشده است.
در ادامه کارگران معترض به طرح شکایت از صاحب شرکت به اداره‌های کار، تامین اجتماعی، دادگستری و... اشاره کردند و گفتند: با سیلی صورت‌مان را سرخ نگه می‌داریم، برخی‌ها از ما کارگران هنوز مستاجرند و فرزند دانشجو دارند، کسی به دادمان نمی‌رسد.
یکی از این کارگران که نخواست نامش اعلام شود، گفت: وقتی مشکلات‌مان را برای برخی از مسئولان می‌گوییم، انگار آقایان به داستان گوش می‌دهند و درکی از 21 ماه حقوق نگرفتن کارگران ندارند که جای تاسف دارد.
یکی دیگر ازاین کارگران با اشک‌های در چشم گفت: تا به حال مشکل‌مان را رسانه‌ای نکردیم تا شاید کاری کنند، ولی صاحب کارخانه به تعهد نماینده‌اش در پرداخت مطالبات کارگران پایبند نیست.

description.hltext_display: Roma, un finto ordigno nella metro B. Investigatori: solo un gesto dimostrativo
description.author: webinfo@adnkronos.com
description.content:
Roma, 21 dic. (Adnkronos/Ign) - Un ordigno artigianale è stato ritrovato stamattina intorno alle 10,30 sulla linea B della metropolitana di Roma. A rinvenirlo in un vagone è stato un dipendente dell'Atac presso il ''binario tronchino'' (nell'area in cui vengono effettuate le manovre dei treni) della stazione-capolinea di Rebibbia.
Sono state immediatamente allertate le forze dell'ordine e i vigili del fuoco, che hanno provveduto a isolare l'area procedendo poi alla constatazione della potenzialità esplosiva dell'ordigno.
In ogni caso, ''dopo ulteriori verifiche con gli artificieri, risulta che l'ordigno non poteva esplodere perché il rudimentale congegno non era in grado di provocare un'esplosione'', afferma il sindaco di Roma Gianni Alemanno in una nota.
"Alle 10.30 è stata rinvenuta da un controllore dell'Atac sui binari della metro della stazione Rebibbia - ricostruisce il sindaco - è stata immediatamente disinnescata dagli artificieri'' e ora ''la situazione è stata ristabilita ed è sotto controllo".
''Dopo aver sentito il Prefetto e il Questore posso garantire ai cittadini che tutte le stazioni della metro sono state controllate e bonificate e che quindi non ci sono ulteriori pericoli", assicura Alemanno ringraziando ''Atac e le forze dell'ordine per il pronto intervento e per l'immediata individuazione del problema che dimostra come il nostro sistema di sicurezza abbia funzionato perfettamente".
Gli esami di laboratorio, eseguiti dai Carabinieri del Ris di Roma, hanno provato che la polvere nera contenuta nei due tubi metallici che costituivano il corpo principale del dispositivo sospetto, è materiale inerte.
Un ordigno assemblato 'a pezzi', oppure un 'segnale' per far crescere la tensione in vista delle annunciate manifestazioni di domani. Queste, apprende l'Adnkronos da fonti investigative, le due ipotesi attualmente al vaglio degli investigatori. La prima fatta dagli inquirenti è che si tratti di un ordigno assemblato gradualmente che doveva essere completato in una fase successiva. La seconda ipotesi tende invece ad accreditare il gesto dimostrativo per far crescere la tensione a poche ore dai cortei che domani sfileranno nella capitale per protestare contro l'approvazione della riforma Gelmini.
Dalle immagini raccolte dalle telecamere non sembrano al momento emergere elementi particolarmente significativi. Quanto alla matrice, al momento gli investigatori stanno valutando diverse ipotesi, una delle quali fa riferimento alla galassia anarco-insurrezionalista.
A escludere un collegamento con la manifestazione di domani è però il comandante provinciale dei carabinieri di Roma, Maurizio Mezzavilla sottolineando che ''al momento non ci sono elementi che possano collegare le due cose". Per Mezzavilla comunque "potrebbe essere stata un'azione dimostrativa" visto che ''l'ordigno era ben confezionato, fatto da un esperto'' ma "era privo di innesco esplosivo, non avrebbe mai potuto funzionare, non era in grado di creare alcun danno".
Non c'è connessione con la protesta studentesca nemmeno per il sindaco di Roma: ''Quella di oggi è stata una brutta provocazione - afferma Alemanno ai microfoni del Tg1 - ma sono sicuro che non ci sia alcuna connessione con quanto succederà domani''.
La Procura di Roma aprirà a breve un fascicolo sul ritrovamento dell'ordigno. Il procuratore aggiunto Pietro Saviotti procederà contro ignoti per porto e detenzione di materiale esplosivo. Sulla vicenda la Procura di Roma attende una prima informativa da parte dei carabinieri ai quali è affidata l'indagine dopo il ritrovamento dell'ordigno.

description.hltext_display: Debbie Pincus MS LMHC, New Expert on Empowering Parents.com, Gives Readers the Secret to Calm Parenting, Joins the Total Transformation Advisory Board
description.content:
There isn’t a parent out there who doesn’t get frustrated and angry from time to time when their child’s behavior crosses the line from acceptable to inappropriate.
Westbrook, Maine (Vocus/PRWEB) December 21, 2010
There isn’t a parent out there who doesn’t get frustrated and angry from time to time when their child’s behavior crosses the line from acceptable to inappropriate. The problem, as Debbie Pincus MS LMHC sees it, is that parents need to “stop reacting to their kids’ reactivity.” In her recent article, Calm Parenting: How to Get Control When Your Child is Making You Angry on the award-winning EmpoweringParents.com website, she explains the dilemma this way: “When you try to manage your child’s behavior instead of your own anxiety, what you’re saying is, ‘I’m out of control. I need you to change so that I can feel better.’”
According to Pincus, the key is to focus instead on getting yourself under control, which will in turn help your child to calm down. The popularity of Pincus’s debut article in EP, which was the site’s most-viewed article in the autumn line-up, might rest on the fact that parenting has never been more challenging. Pincus responds to that problem by giving parents practical, effective ways to maintain control and stay calm. To date, there have been more than 500 combined shares and “likes” of the article on the Empowering Parents Facebook page , and it has been emailed to others close to 600 times.
“We are thrilled that Debbie Pincus has joined our team of experts at Empowering Parents,” says EP Editor Elisabeth Wilkins. “Her experience and extensive knowledge of child behavior and parenting issues make her a perfect fit for our website.” In addition, “As a member of the Total Transformation Advisory Board, Debbie will offer our readers the practical advice they’ve come to expect—along with her own personal twist on parenting.”
Pincus has been a therapist and coach for more than 25 years in the Greater New York area. She works with individuals, couples and parents and also facilitates parenting groups. Debbie Pincus is the author of numerous books for young people on interpersonal relations.
Legacy Publishing Company, the publisher of EmpoweringParents.com, is America’s premier producer of personal development programs for families and couples. Legacy’s flagship product, The Total Transformation Program—created by renowned child behavioral therapist James Lehman, MSW—has sold nearly a quarter of a million units to date. For more information or to schedule an interview with Debbie Pincus, MS LMHC, please contact Nathan O’Leary at 856-5600 x 3013 or nso(at)legacypublishingcompany(dot)com.
# # #
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prwebempoweringparents/calmparenting/prweb8032861.htm

description.hltext_display: Work and Family
description.author: Steven Karpe, Long Island Job Search Examiner
description.content:
It is not an easy task to juggle work and family. Being responsible for other lives places you in a juxtaposition, you are responsible as a provider to your dependents and you also need to be physically around them to meet their various needs. Unless you have a successful home based business, you most likely need to go out and earn a living, because you cannot clone yourself at this point in evolution, it becomes a daily challenge to maintain a physical and mental presence at work and with your family. If you are fortunate enough to have a spouse that can help, then you can coordinate your schedules, sometimes one spouse puts the kids on the bus while the other spouse is home to receive them after school. In some cases the kids are sent to an after school program, school are recognizing that more and more families have two working parents and therefore there are a lot of all day Kindergarten porgrams being initiated. Some parents delay promotions in order to maintain job flexibility, other parents actually take "demotions". In the movie "Kramer Vs. Kramer" the character Ted Kramer had taken a demotion to care for his son, in the custody trial his ex-wife's attorney sarcastically referred to this as "working your way down the ladder of success"
Some jobs have "flex-time" or a "compressed" workday, while other jobs have options for telecommuting, in which the employee only needs to report to the office once or twice a wek. There are several financial alternatives to help defer the cost of childcare including the federal and state dependent care exemptions. Some jobs also offer flexible spending plans which allows the employee to have money witheld from their paycheck on a pre-tax basis to cover the cost of after school programs and day care. These plans usually do not cover the cost of sleepaway camp.
In conclusion, although difficult, the task of juggling work and childcare is not insurmountable and if one arms their mind with knowledge, they will find that drawbridges close, so that they may safely cross over the waters of uncertainty.

description.hltext_display: FCC Adopts New Rules To Protect Web Traffic
description.author: JOELLE TESSLER, AP Technology Writer
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- A divided Federal Communications Commission has approved new rules meant to prohibit broadband companies from interfering with Internet traffic flowing to their customers.
The 3-2 vote Tuesday marks a major victory for FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski, who has spent more than a year trying to craft a compromise.
The FCC's three Democrats voted to pass the rules, while the two Republicans opposed them, arguing that they amount to unnecessary regulation. The new rules are likely to face intense scrutiny on Capitol Hill once Republicans take over the House. Meanwhile, public interest groups decried the regulations as too weak, particularly for wireless systems. Known as "net neutrality," the rules prohibit phone and cable companies from favoring or discriminating against Internet content and services, such as those from rivals.

description.hltext_display: 兽兽郭晶晶领衔体坛十大惨不忍睹毁容美女
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
一、郭晶晶 出生日期：1981年10月15日身高：1.63米体重：49.1公斤 郭晶晶刚出现在家视野的时候就是个小肥妹，但是后来日渐成熟，又出名，又恋爱的愈发成为一个漂亮的小贵妇样子，不过还是不能不警惕岁月的摧残，看这脸一笑，都成什么样子了啊。
十、肖恩·约翰逊 平衡木上哪里飞来的这只小肥鹅？一次体操表演赛上，人们惊异地发现，这居然是大名鼎鼎的肖恩·约翰逊。身披红纱巾的肖恩，实在有些惨不忍睹。在翩翩起舞的北京奥运会平衡木冠军，短短数月身材变形成这样，让人匪夷所思。据分析，奥运会前运动员的精神压力太大，而巨大的压力骤减、精神突然松弛后，导致一定程度的肥胖完全有可能。
二、莎拉波娃 1987年4月19日，出生于俄罗斯的尼尔根，身高1.88米，体重59公斤，看这一脸的雀斑，还用多说什么呢？难怪很多人都说，俄罗斯人婚前是美女，婚后就是大妈。
四、伊娃 绝对的大妈啊，要怎么说姐弟恋还是有一定风险呢，看看这张斑驳的脸，帕克不知道会不会做噩梦。帕克与伊娃分手和这张斑驳的脸有没有关系呢。
五、唐莉 素颜的唐莉肤色黯淡了不少，最明显的是黑眼圈和眼袋，真是有损美女的形象。

description.hltext_display: 2010 Goes Viral: YouTube's Best Videos
description.content:
Check Out The Year's 5 Best Viral Video Offerings
SAMANTHA SIN/AFP/
Joshua Nichols, Staff writer
YouTube has become such a part of our lives that it sometimes seems like it's been around forever.
In reality, the website only turned 5 years old this year. Then again, five years might as well be five decades when it comes to the Internet.
The video sharing site has grown so fast for one reason: everybody loves a good viral video. After all, nothing gets an office buzzing or sends e-mails flying quite like a sneezy baby Panda or a home video of a stupid person about to do something even stupider.
Every year brings great viral videos, but 2010 was a banner year, almost as if the video gods planned a special treat for YouTube's fifth birthday. With that in mind, we sorted through the best videos of the year to come up with the following five viral gems.
Viral Video No. 5: So Beautiful! >>

description.hltext_display: На Байкальском ЦБК введена процедура внешнего управления
description.author: RU
description.content:
Арбитражный суд Иркутской области в среду ввел на Байкальском ЦБК процедуру внешнего управления сроком до 2 июня 2012 года, передает агентство РАПСИ.
Внешним управляющим назначен представитель саморегулируемой организации арбитражных управляющих ЦФО Александр Иванов.
Процедура внешнего управления введена по инициативе Альфа-банка. Кандидатуру внешнего управляющего также предложил банк.Ранее Газета.Ru сообщала, что кредиторы БЦБК на общем собрании приняли решение ходатайствовать перед судом о введении на комбинате процедуры внешнего управления сроком на 18 месяцев. Альфа-банк и Райффайзенбанк, консолидировавшие около 51% задолженности предприятия, до последнего времени требовали признать БЦБК банкротом и ввести конкурсное производство.
Кредиторская задолженность БЦБК, включенная в реестр кредиторов, составляет более 1,3 млрд рублей, в самом реестре 59 кредиторов. «Газета.Ru»

description.hltext_display: Король Саудовской Аравии выписан из больницы
description.author: RU
description.content: Король Саудовской Аравии Абдалла выписан из больницы Нью-Йорка, где ему была проведена успешная операция, сообщает государственное агентство Саудовской Аравии.Он переехал в свою резиденцию в Нью-Йорке, для восстановления после операции и продолжения курса физиотерапии, - говорится в официальном заявлении. О сроках возвращения короля на родину не сообщается.Как ранее писала Газета.Ru 86-летний саудовский монарх, прибыл в США для лечения тромба. Reuters

description.hltext_display: Studenti in piazza, Roma blindata
description.author: webinfo@adnkronos.com
description.content:
Cortei da nord a sud Roma - (Adnkronos/Ign) - Attesi nella Capitale almeno 15mila manifestanti. Nessun preavviso alla questura. Blitz dell'UdS: sigilli a scuole private. Allargata la zona rossa, ma gli studenti: "Nessun assalto". Flash mob a Montecitorio, studenti regalano fiori (VIDEO). Caos ieri durante l'esame del ddl sull'università. La presidente di turno Mauro dichiara approvati quattro emendamenti dell'opposizione (VIDEO). L'Idv chiede che la legge torni alla Camera. Poi arriva la decisione di Schifani. Pd: "Precedente gravissimo". Pedica filma con il telefonino (VIDEO) Bondi mentre allunga il braccio per votare al posto di Sacconi
commenta0 vota 3 invia stampa
Roma, 22 dic. (Adnkronos/Ign) - Studenti di nuovo in piazza oggi in tutta Italia contro la riforma dell'Università che, nonostante i ritardi seguiti alla bagarre di ieri al Senato, potrebbe essere approvata proprio oggi in via definitiva.
A Roma sono attesi almeno 15mila studenti mentre polizia e carabinieri hanno schierato 2mila uomini. Una delegazione dei giovani tenterà di portare una lettera-appello a Napolitano per chiedergli di non firmare il ddl.
Il centro di Roma è blindato ma gli studenti hanno assicurato che non intendono violare la 'zona rossa'. Nessun avviso invece alla questura: i manifestanti infatti hanno optato per cortei 'spontanei' senza comunicare alcun percorso alla questura. Il corteo principale comunque dovrebbe partire dall'università della Sapienza.
In mattinata l'Unione degli Studenti ha fatto un blitz in oltre 100 scuole private da Nord a Sud (Milano, Firenze, Bologna, Cagliari, Napoli, Bari, Cosenza), sigillate con nastro da cantiere, per protestare contro il "processo di privatizzazione messo in campo da governi di ogni schieramento negli ultimi 15 anni, per demarcare la qualità dell'istruzione pubblica rispetto ad un'idea di formazione di elite, finanziata con moneta sonante dal ministero all'ultima Finanziaria" - afferma in una nota l'UdS.
"Oggi è l'ennesima mobilitazione di questi ultimi 3 mesi che hanno scaldato il cuore ad un'Italia ripiegata nel berlusconismo in decomposizione. L'Italia dei conflitti ha ripreso parola anche grazie al fiato che il movimento studentesco le ha dato" - afferma Tito Russo, coordinatore nazionale Unione degli Studenti. "Oggi in molte città la politica istituzionale segnerà un'ennesima distanza dalla società reale, trincerandosi dietro camionette blindate. Oggi noi ci riprendiamo le nostre città, continuando a manifestare fin quando in questo Paese non ci saranno politiche attive per il welfare, la formazione ed il lavoro".
E contro il rischio di nuove violenze e scontri, gli studenti annunciano sorprese. "Oggi stupiremo la politica di Manganello e di Governo. Non abbiamo paura di strumentalità, insulti e vecchi mostri agitati populisticamente, spiazzeremo oggi e durante le vacanze, chi per una generazione che chiede futuro assicura macerie e rastrellamenti cileni".
Da nord a Sud, la mobilitazione oggi interessa tutta la Penisola. A Palermo si terrà un nuovo "Blocchiamo tutto day" in coincidenza con la seduta del Senato per la discussione della legge Gelmini. I giovani non hanno annunciato quali saranno i loro obiettivi, ma hanno solo fatto sapere che "saranno assediati i palazzi del potere'.

description.hltext_display: Kylan släpper inte greppet
description.author: Behrang Behdjou behrang.behdjou@expressen.se
description.content: Varmast i Sverige vid 8-tiden på onsdagsmorgonen: Hallandskusten, minus två grader. - Sedan är det bra många minusgrader i resten av landet, säger Elin Torstensson, meteorolog vid SMHI, till Expressen.se. Enköping har 27 minusgrader, en av toppnoteringarna. - Till och med i Skåne är det 24 minusgrader, säger Torstensson. Hur blir onsdagen? - Det är ett stråk med snöfall i norra Götaland och även längs södra Norrlandskusten men det kommer att avta under dagen. Det kommer att fortsätta vara kallt, uppehållsväder och ganska mycket sol, framför allt i söder. Dagen lär inte bjuda på några större väderomslag.

description.hltext_display: Letters: Giving to the rich
description.content:
Dec. 22 Letters to the Editor
Giving to the rich
I found Allan Schwindt's Dec. 12 letter defending the Bush tax cuts to be quite interesting, especially his idea to instead abolish the Department of Energy because, as he notes, "After spending hundreds of billions we are more dependent on foreign oil than ever before."
Even more interesting is Paul Krugman's (Nobel Prize in Economics) 2009 estimate that the Bush tax cuts had cost the country $1.8 trillion; an estimate even the conservative Heritage Institute called "defensible."
Giving money to people who hate us is silly, I agree ... it's just getting harder and harder to figure out who those people are. But the Saudis aren't the only energy fat cats taking my money. I realize that every month as I write out my contribution to PUD's raises and executive compensation fund.
John Martinez Weston
Castle Rock
Lights are poorly timed
This letter is in response to Terry Ellefson's (Dec. 17) letter about the red-light cameras. If you haven't noticed, a lot of the cameras in Longview/Kelso are not timed and also the light will not stay yellow long enough to finish going through it even if it turned yellow after you already started to go.
The intersection in West Kelso going over the old bridge by Fibre Federal Credit Union is a perfect example. You can be driving and the light is green; you just get barely into the intersection and the light turns yellow (it is too late to stop because you would be slamming on your brakes right in the middle of the intersection), so the light turns yellow while you are already going through it and then it turns red so fast the tail end of your car is barley hanging over the line when the light turns red.
I don't believe this is breaking the law. A light that is not timed properly is a faulty light, not a faulty driver. And what if you have to stop for a pedestrian crossing the street? That could leave you hanging in the intersection enough to get a ticket. I just think there are a few things that need to be thought about and worked out because they could cause safety concerns and accidents.
Brandy Walton
Kelso
Choice was life changing
Why worry about traffic cameras? Or police cars following you, or getting in a wreck, or ... ?
I've had my share of speeding/warning tickets through the years on Ocean Beach Highway, Pacific Way, 42nd Avenue, Ohio Street, school zones, Grade Street, the bridge in West Kelso and Interstate 5. I've slaved over large fines I couldn't afford, worked some off in community service, plus wasted valuable time in court trying to get fines reduced, even having my license suspended years ago (unknown to me) for missing a payment on a speeding ticket. Not to mention paying higher car insurance rates.
I finally woke up a few years ago. It is so much easier, more pleasant driving, but most important ethical, moral and financially responsible, to just stinkin' slow down, pay attention and obey the law. I quit making excuses and that choice has changed my life, reduced stress and saves me lots of money for other more important things in my life.
For those of you who tail me going too fast on the above-mentioned routes, I will let you get the next ticket. Because those speeding, frazzled, hurried, "breaking the speed limit" days are over for me, forever.
Lynette Bishop
Longview
Read the fine print
I think the "deal of the day" is a great way for local businesses to bring in more customers. It's also a great way to save a little money, but be sure you understand how they work before buying.
Our daughter bought us certificates from a local steak/seafood restaurant for our birthdays. It was a great idea and we looked forward to having a nice birthday dinner without it costing us anything (a plus this time of year). We went to dinner and when it was time to pay, I offered up our gift certificates, only to be told that we couldn't use both of them together. I was not a happy camper. So in conclusion, I would just advise you to read the fine print before purchasing your certificates.

event_or_fact.property: After spending hundreds of billions we are more dependent on foreign oil than ever before.

description.hltext_display: Lotería de Navidad: Zapatero juega poco y Rajoy apuesta por el 6
description.content: (09.29) El jefe del Gobierno, José Luis Rodríguez Zapatero, ha asegurado hoy que ha apostado "poco" para el sorteo de la Lotería de Navidad de hoy, mientras que el líder del PP, Mariano Rajoy, ha comprado décimos en Galicia y Madrid, y ha confiado en que el 'Gordo' termine en 6, el número que lleva.A la misma hora que comenzaba el sorteo extraordinario de Navidad, los miembros del Gobierno y los diputados comenzaban en el Congreso el último pleno del año, en el que Zapatero va a explicar las conclusiones del Consejo Europeo celebrado la pasada semana.Zapatero ha dicho al entrar en el hemiciclo que no sabe exactamente cuántos décimos de lotería ha comprado este año y se ha limitado a decir que "pocos".Tampoco la ministra de Asuntos Exteriores, Trinidad Jiménez, ha gastado mucho, ya que sólo ha comprado el número del ministerio.Por su parte, Rajoy ha afirmado que tiene décimos comprados en Madrid y en Galicia, y ha apostado por que el 'Gordo' termine en 6, antes de desear suerte a los informadores que se encontraban en el pasillo del Congreso.

description.hltext_display: Justicia indígena por intento de violación
description.content:
Comunidad condena a agresor en Cañar Ángel Morocho, habitante de la comunidad de Quilloac en la provincia del Cañar, fue castigado a hortigazos el pasado sábado por ser el presunto autor de un intento de violación a una menor de 9 años.
Según José Acero, secretario comunal, el caso fue denunciado a la comunidad por la madre de la niña en noviembre pasado. Luego de hacer un seguimiento y después de efectuar los análisis médicos y psicológicos a los involucrados se determinó que la menor no presentaba signos de violación en su cuerpo.
En el examen psicológico se determinó que el agresor padece un ligero retardo mental. Además, se indicó que Morocho tiene varias lesiones psíquicas por provenir de un hogar disfuncional.
Después de deliberar tres horas, la comunidad sentenció al acusado a recibir un castigo con ortiga, para "purificar sus energías".
La sanción fue impartida por sus familiares. (AFM) ... Ver mas

description.hltext_display: Aktuell: DE Außenhandelspreise November
description.content:
Uhrzeit: 08:00
Ort: Wiesbaden
Land: Deutschland
Veröffentlichung der Zahlen zu den deutschen Außenhandelspreisen für November 2010
Die deutschen Einfuhrpreise sind im November zum Vorjahr um 10,0 % geklettert nach zuletzt +9,2 %. Im Monatsvergleich sind die Preise auf der Importseite um 1,2 % gestiegen nach zuvor -0,2 %. Ohne Erdöl und Mineralölerzeugnisse ist der Index der deutschen Einfuhrpreise auf Jahresbasis um 8,5 % gestiegen nach +7,7 % im Vormonat.
Die Ausfuhrpreise haben in Deutschland zum Vorjahresmonat um 4,5 % angezogen nach zuletzt +4,3 %. Auf Monatssicht legten die deutschen Exportpreise um 0,3 % zu nach -0,3 % im Monat zuvor.

description.hltext_display: Alemania: los precios de importación suben un 1,2% en noviembre
description.content: Los precios de las importaciones alemanas subieron un 1,2% en noviembre respecto a octubre, cuando se produjo un descenso del 0,2%.En comparación con el mismo mes del año pasado, los precios subieron un 10,2%, por encima del alza del 9,2% de octubre. Los analistas consultados por Bloomberg esperaban de media un aumento mensual del 0,5% y una tasa ineteranual del 9,3%.

description.hltext_display: York girls cruise past Wells for 27th straight win
description.author: Dan Doyon
description.content:
YORK, Maine ? Five games into the season, York High School again looks like the team to beat in Class B girls basketball.
The defending state champion Wildcats jumped out to a 33-3 lead over Wells and cruised to a 65-24 victory at Robert E. Butler Gymnasium on Tuesday. York won its 27th straight game and improved to 5-0 on the season.
Senior guard Stephanie Gallagher connected on four 3-pointers and finished with a game-high 17 points for the Wildcats. Senior center Niki Taylor added 12 points and seven rebounds and is now two points shy of second place on York's all-time scoring list, according to coach Rick Clark. Taylor has 1,163 career points and trails 1994 graduate Andrea Little (1,165) and 2001 graduate Lani Boardman (1,413).
"They're an undermanned team; they're missing their point guard (Meaghan Lewia), and without her they have a tough time bringing the ball up against any kind of pressure," Clark said. "Our press bothered them a lot. I think they only had three or four open looks in the first half. I was pleased both with our offense and our defense."
Wells (1-3) had 11 turnovers in the first quarter and was held to eight field goals for the game. The Warriors shot 24 percent from the floor.
"There is a reason they've won (27 in a row) ? they've got all the pieces," Wells coach Don Abbott said. "They're big, strong, physical and athletic. Defensively, they get you out of what you try to do and it's hard to get shots off against them."
The Wildcats scored the final 17 points of the first quarter to take a 22-3 lead, as Jeni Wallingford's 3-pointer accounted for Wells' only points. Taylor scored back-to back hoops and Gallagher drained her third 3-pointer of the quarter for the 19-point cushion.
"Defensively, we did everything we wanted to," Gallagher said. "As far as offense, we had open shots on the outside and we were hitting those shots."
York scored the first 11 points of the second quarter, with Emily Campbell's hoop giving the Wildcats a 33-3 lead.
The Wildcats have averaged 60 points per game this season and have won their five games by an average of 34 points. Gallagher said the team's offense is ahead of where it was a year ago, which is a scary proposition for opponents.
"Each game it's definitely improving," she said. "I know we can continue to get better. We work hard at it at practice."
Forward Marquis MacGlashing continues to make strides after coming back from a torn ACL in her right knee. The sophomore, who started as a freshman last year, scored four points.
York will play undefeated Greely (5-0) at home on Thursday before hosting the Wildcat Invitational holiday tournament next week.
"I thought Wells did a good job tonight of taking away Niki on the inside," Clark said. "But if teams take away a piece, we're going to go to another piece. That's why we have to make all the parts work."
YORK 65, WELLS 24 WELLS (24) � Mulkern 2-0-6, Larmie 0-0-0, Bragdon 2-1-5, A. Moody 0-1-1, Beisswanger 0-0-0, Sevigney 2-0-6, Wallingford 2-0-6, N. Moody 0-0-0. Totals: 8-2-24. YORK (65) � Morley 3-0-7, Campbell 2-2-6, Taylor 5-2-12, Gallagher 6-1-17, Mountford 1-0-2, LaBonte 3-0-6, Contella 2-1-5, MacGlashing 2-0-4, Eaton 1-2-4, Cribby 1-0-2, Heck 0-0-0. Totals: 26-8-65. Wells 3 3� 9 �9 ? 24 York 22�11�16�16 ? 65 3-pointers ? Wells 6: Sevigney 2, Wallingford 2, Mulkern 2; York 5: Gallagher 4, Morley. Fouled out ? None.

description.hltext_display: Megnyerte elefánt-perét az idomár
description.content:
Az új-zélandi munkaügyi hatóság(ERA) szerdai bejelentése szerint "súlyos megrázkódtatást okozott egyik idomárjának a Loritz Bros. nevû cirkusz, amikor azt hazudta a férfinak, hogy kedvenc elefántja megszökött, ezért nincs szükség a munkájára, és elbocsátják". Az új-zélandi médiában nagy port kavaró ügy fõszereplõje, az idomár Tony Ratcliffe mellett Jumbo, a nõstény elefánt volt.
A férfinak korábban volt egy saját utazó cirkusza, de tönkrement, ezért az általa 30 éve gondozott indiai elefántot eladta 2008-ban a Loritz Bros.-nak, amely idomárként alkalmazta õt. A problémák akkor kezdõdtek, amikor Ratcliffe tiltakozott az ellen, ahogy a porondon bánnia kellett volna az állattal, hogy a közönség szórakozásként etethesse.
Röviddel késõbb közölték vele, hogy Jumbo elveszett, ezért már nincs szükség rá, és felmondtak neki. Aztán Ratcliffe azt olvasta az egyik újságban, hogy a 35 éves elefántot a cirkusz átadta az állatvédõ ligának, az RSPCA-nek. Az idomár erre pert indított a hatóságnál a cirkusz ellen.
A hatóság megállapította, hogy szándékosan félrevezették az idomárt, és "súlyos megrázkódtatást okoztak neki a szeretett állat sorsával kapcsolatban". A döntés értelmében a cirkusznak csaknem 20 ezer amerikai dollár kártérítést kell fizetnie. Jumbo jelenleg az aucklandi Franklin állatkertben él, ahol a Mila nevet adták neki.
Címkék: Új-Zéland, Jumbo, cirkusz

description.hltext_display: Kalėdų Senelio elnius ekspertai pataria pažymėti atšvaitais (Įvairenybės)
description.content:
„Reuters“-BNS ir lrytas.lt inf.
Norvegijos šiaurės elnių augintojams, tarp jų Kalėdų Seneliui, ekspertai davė neįprastą patarimą - pritvirtinti prie šių eiklių gyvūnų atšvaitus, kad jų nepartrenktų automobiliai.
"Reuters"
REKLAMA
Šiemet Norvegijoje apie 2 tūkst. šiaurės elnių buvo pažymėti šviesą atspindinčiais geltonos spalvos antkakliais arba mažesniais prie ragų tvirtinamais atšvaitais, siekiant sumažinti eismo įvykių, per kuriuos iki šiol kasmet žūdavo apie 500 šių gyvūnų.
„Tai išties veikia“, - Norvegijos viešųjų kelių administracijos ekspertas Kristianas Oevernesas, vadovaujantis šiam projektui, sakė naujienų agentūrai „Reuters“.
Elnių žymėjimo projektas vykdomas toliausiai į šiaurę nutolusioje Finmarko apskrityje, kurioje žiemos viduryje saulė nepakyla virš horizonto.
Bandomasis važiavimas sniego motociklu parodė, kad atšvaitais pažymėti elniai iš tikrųjų labiau pastebimi tamsoje negu kiti.
Kasmet per avarijas, susijusias su šiaurės elniais, sužalojama po kelis žmones, o neseniai Suomijoje įvykęs incidentas nusinešė žmonių gyvybių.
Paklaustas, ar Kalėdų Senelis taip pat galėtų pasinaudoti šia priemone, K.Oevernesas atsakė: „Tikriausiai taip“.
„Pirmas kartą (šiaurės elniai) žymimi tokiu mastu“, - pridūrė jis.
Norvegijoje gyvenantys samių tautelės elnių augintojai anksčiau yra mėginę žymėti savo gyvulius šviesą atspindinčiomis lipniomis juostelėmis, tačiau šaltyje klijai nelaikydavo. Suomių elnininkai yra išbandę purškiamus šviesą atspindinčius dažus, tačiau taip pažymėtų elnių kailis prasčiau sulaiko šilumą.
Kaip nurodo Tarptautinis šiaurės elnių auginimo centras, Norvegijoje gyvena apie 200 tūkst. šiaurės elnių, o dauguma jų priklauso vietos samiams, kurie šiuos gyvūnus augina dėl mėsos, odų ir ragų.

description.hltext_display: Nálož v římském metru byla nakonec neškodná
description.content:
Řím /AKTUALIZOVÁNO/ - Řím zažil planý poplach kvůli údajné náloži nalezené na předměstské stanici metra Rebibbia. Oblast byla uzavřena a na místo byli přivoláni pyrotechnici, postupně se ale zjistilo, že u "nálože" chyběla nejen rozbuška, ale že v ní nebyla ani žádná výbušnina.
Autor:
reklama
Diskutovat (0) včera 16:40 aktualizováno včera 22:59
Ilustrační foto.
Autor: ČTK
Krabici s podezřelým obsahem objevil náhodně v úterý ráno řidič pod sedadlem v jednom z odstavených vagonů. Uvnitř byly kabely, baterie, antény a trubičky s nějakým práškem.
Římský starosta Gianni Alemanno v první reakci řekl, že "jde o bombu, která by mohla explodovat". Později však prohlásil, že nálož nemohla vybuchnout, protože byla sestrojena velmi primitivně a neměla rozbušku, a ještě později odborníci zjistili, že prášek v trubicích byl zcela neškodný.
O tom, kdo krabici na místo položil, panují jen dohady.
Spekulovalo se o studentech, kteří protestují proti úsporným opatřením vlády premiéra Silvia Berlusconiho. Údajná nálož byla nalezena v době, kdy v zemi vládne zvýšené politické napětí a kdy se objevily zprávy o údajně chystaných atentátech teroristické sítě Al-Káida v Evropě kolem Vánoc.

description.hltext_display: Debate over liquor sales far from over
description.content:
Washington voters just last month soundly defeated two ballot measures aimed at getting the state out of the retail liquor business. Initiative 1100, which would have privatized both the sale and distribution of liquor, was rejected by about 53 percent of voters. More than 64 percent of voters rejected Initiative 1105, which proposed to put only the sale of liquor in the private sector.
Despite this thumping at the polls, advocates of privatization are working to keep this issue front and center. State Rep. Gary Alexander, R-Olympia, and Sen. Tim Sheldon, D-Potlach, have said they'll introduce bills that would move the state toward partial, if not full, privatization of the retail liquor business. And Gov. Chris Gregoire has indicated that she is open to ideas as to how the current system might be improved. Associated Press writer Rachel La Corte reports that officials with the state Liquor Control Board are working with the governor "to address frustrations over the current system, short of completely removing the state from the equation."
But, according to Chris Greygiel of SeattlePI.com, Gregoire has said she wants a better sense of how people feel about even partial privatization before embracing any specific proposal. And she's right to take a cautious approach in reopening this issue. State lawmakers need to take care not to appear as if they are dismissing that November vote. Washingtonians clearly rejected the notion of fully privatizing the retail liquor business. They might accept modest changes in the current system, though what Alexander is proposing could be too big of a step toward privatization without another vote of the people. The Olympia Republican proposes a system like Oregon's, in which all liquor stores are private outlets contracting with the state.
Still, Sen. Jeanne Kohl-Welles, D-Seattle, believes the public has concerns about the state-run system, which lawmakers shouldn't ignore. "We still need to modernize the system more, and I'm very optimistic we can do that, but I want to do it the right way," Kohl-Welles told La Corte. "I think there will be a lot of proposals before us and we should consider them seriously."
Indeed, this issue isn't going to go away anytime soon. That much is certain. It's fueled, in large part, by one of the worst budget years in state history. There now seems to be a legislative consensus that the current model of state government is no longer working. Most lawmakers agree that they must embrace more sustainable budget practices and explore ways to slim down state government through privatization of some functions.
Completely ending the state monopoly on retail liquor sales may be off the table. But Washingtonians might well embrace sensible steps to modernize the current system in ways that cut costs and continue to ensure public safety. Legislators will have to listen closely to their constituents as they publicly debate the various proposals Kohl-Welles believes will be offered during the upcoming session. There may be, as many elected officials seem to think, an opportunity to improve the existing system without ignoring the expressed will of the people.

description.hltext_display: Ir po valstybinių kalbų egzaminų bus galima išsinešti užduoties sąsiuvinį (Žaidžiame klases)
description.content:
ELTA ir lrytas.lt inf.
Nuo kitų metų užduočių lapai atsiras ir lietuvių bei užsienio kalbų valstybiniuose brandos egzaminuose, o jiems pasibaigus abiturientai galės išsinešti užduoties sąsiuvinius.
2011-aisiais abiturientams kalbų įskaitos bus organizuojamos per pavasario atostogas, tad mokykloms siūloma savo nuožiūra keisti atostogų laiką dvyliktokams. V.Balkūnas
REKLAMA
Šie ir kiti pakeitimai įteisinti švietimo ir mokslo ministro Gintaro Steponavičiaus patvirtintame Brandos egzaminų organizavimo ir vykdymo tvarkos apraše, Kalbų ir mokinių kompiuterinio raštingumo įskaitų nuostatuose, teigiama Švietimo ir mokslo ministerijos pranešime spaudai.
Kokius brandos egzaminus laikys, kandidatai turės apsispręsti iki kovo 7 dienos. Balandžio pradžioje bus paskelbta, kuriose savivaldybių mokyklose bus rengiami atskirų dalykų egzaminai.
Brandos atestatui gauti reikės išlaikyti du brandos egzaminus - privalomąjį lietuvių kalbos ir vieną pasirenkamąjį. Iš viso kandidatas galės laikyti ne daugiau kaip 6 egzaminus. Pagrindinė brandos egzaminų sesija prasidės gegužės 7 dieną vokiečių kalbos egzaminu, baigsis birželio 16 dieną chemijos valstybiniu brandos egzaminu. Pakartotinė sesija vyks birželio 27 - liepos 8 dienomis.
Pagrindinės sesijos mokyklinių brandos egzaminų rezultatai bus paskelbti per 5 dienas. Lietuvių kalbos ir gimtųjų kalbų - per 9 dienas. Visų pagrindinės sesijos valstybinių brandos egzaminų rezultatus planuojama paskelbti iki liepos 12 dienos.
Kaip ir anksčiau, kandidatas, nesutinkantis su egzamino darbo įvertinimu, per 3 dienas nuo rezultatų paskelbimo dienos galės teikti prašymą mokyklos direktoriui dar kartą darbą peržiūrėti ir pakartotinai įvertinti. Valstybinių brandos egzaminų apeliacijų rezultatų vėliausias skelbimo terminas - liepos 22 diena.
2011-aisiais abiturientams kalbų įskaitos bus organizuojamos per pavasario atostogas, tad mokykloms siūloma savo nuožiūra keisti atostogų laiką dvyliktokams: suteikti jiems pavasario atostogas kitu laiku arba gegužės pabaigoje sutrumpinti ugdymo procesą.

description.hltext_display: Autor příručky pro pedofily byl na Floridě zatčen
description.content:
Washington - Autor příručky pro pedofily, který své dílo v listopadu nabízel v internetovém knihkupectví Amazon.com, byl na Floridě zadržen.
Autor:
reklama
Diskutovat (0) včera 23:00
Ilustrační foto.
Autor: DENÍK/archiv
Čelí zde obvinění z šíření obscénního materiálu, a pokud bude shledán vinným, hrozí mu až pět let vězení. Informovala o tom agentura Reuters.
Sedmačtyřicetiletý Phillip Greaves svou knihu za 50 dolarů (965 korun) prodal floridskému policistovi, který před autorem utajil svou totožnost. Po zakoupení knihy vznesl obvinění z šíření obscénních materiálů.
"Greaves napsal tuto knihu výslovně za účelem učit lidi, jak sexuálně zneužívat a znásilňovat děti," prohlásil před soudem policista Grady Judd.
Greaves ale obvinění popřel a tvrdí, že svým spiskem chtěl pomoci lidem zlepšit jejich život.
Negativní reakce
Autor knihy The Pedophile's Guide to Love and Pleasure: a Child-lover's Code of Conduct (Pedofilův průvodce láskou a rozkoší: Kodex chování milovníka dětí) žije ve státu Colorado, kde zákon o šíření obscénních materiálů neplatí. Tím, že knihu prodal na Floridu, ale může být souzen podle tamních předpisů.
Příručka pro pedofily byla v knihkupectví Amazon.com k mání v elektronické verzi za 4,79 dolaru (92 korun). V první polovině listopadu ale z nabídky zmizela po vlně negativních reakcí od ostatních uživatelů. Greaves tvrdí, že na internetu prodal jediný exemplář knihy.
Amazon umožňuje autorům, aby na jeho stránkách sami nabídli své knihy potenciálním zájemcům. O zisk z prodeje se potom s autorem dělí. Knihkupectví tvrdí, že má směrnice pro zakázání nabídky titulů s "nevhodným obsahem", blíže ale nespecifikovalo, co za nevhodný obsah považuje. Není ani jasné, zda Greavesovu knihu stáhlo z nabídky knihkupectví nebo sám autor.
Příručka pro pedofily obsahovala mimo jiné i popisy sexuálního styku s dospělým sepsané z pohledu zneužitého dítěte. Greaves ale tvrdil, že příručka neměla vrhat lepší světlo na dospělé, kteří ubližují dětem. Podle něj by opravdový pedofil dítěti nikdy neublížil.

description.hltext_display: Australias Cutting Edge acquires 25 Q-Ball HD/SD minicams
description.content:
You are here: Home Page » Products & Reviews » Australia’s Cutting Edge acquires 25 Q-Ball HD/SD minicams
Australia’s Cutting Edge acquires 25 Q-Ball HD/SD minicams
Camera Corpshas delivered 25 Q-Ball HD/SD pan and tilt minicams to Australian broadcast service-provider Cutting Edge.
The latest delivery increases the total number of Q-Ball systems Cutting Edge has purchased in recent months to 36.
Initially, the Q-Balls replaced ageing dressing room and coach cameras for football coverage. Recently, Cutting Edge won the contract to produce “The Family,” a reality show for Shine Australia. Twenty-four Q-Balls and eight Camera Corps Minizooms were employed for the show under the control of one cameraman and one video engineer.
Shine Australia also has used eight of the Q-Balls in infrared mode for a show called “Dating in the Dark.” Currently the Q-Balls are being used every day as slam-cams for basketball coverage and commentator cams for cricket.

description.hltext_display: EU Morning Report - Euro recovers losses but still fragile
description.content:
Latest News in Forex
RATE STORY: Euro recovers losses but still fragile
Euro recovered some of its losses on Wednesday after it slid on Tuesday weighted by rating agencies' decision to put Portugal and Greece's debt rating on review for a possible downgrade. Also, France appeared to face sovereign debt problems as well further weighing on the single currency. On Tuesday, the euro broke below the 1.31 level falling as low as 1.3074 and today recovered to 1.3145 supported by talks that Asian central banks bid on the euro in a thin and choppy end of year trade.
Against the safe haven Swiss franc, the euro hit a fresh record low at 1.2532 on Tuesday after tensions in Korea and euro zone contagion fears raised demand for the safe haven currency. The pair is now trading at 1.2543 threatening to hit a fresh record low. The euro fell versus the Japanese Yen on Tuesday finding support at 109.56 before it recovers some of its losses to trade at 110.11.
Against the Japanese Yen, the greenback rose to 83.90 on Tuesday's currency markets from 83.49. On Wednesday, the dollar surrendered some of its losses to trade at 83.72 yen. The US dollar extends losses against the franc on Wednesday hitting a two month low at 0.9533.
The Canadian dollar fell on Tuesday weighted by data showing inflation declined more than the market expected in November and disappointing retail sales in October. The dollar hit 1.0205 versus the Loonie but today the pair fell to trade at 1.0154.

description.hltext_display: Villar: "El 2010 ha sido el mejor año"
description.content:
El presidente de la Real Federación Española de Fútbol, Ángel María Villar , ha resaltado, en la tradicional cena de Navidad con la prensa que se ha celebrado en el salón 'Vicente del Bosque' de la RFEF, que el "2010 pasará a la historia como el mejor año del fútbol español".
"El año 2010, después 101 años, pasará a la historia como el mejor año del fútbol español, y pasará a la historia por haber ganado el Campeonato del Mundo. Lo hemos conseguido brillantemente ", señaló con entusiasmo.
Villar quiso recordar que la selección española ha sido reconocida también por su forma de ser fuera del campo. " Ha habido muchos calificativos y todos destacan valores de nuestra selección como trabajo, constancia, saber estar y sobre todo la humildad. Hemos sido los mejores jugando y los mejores también fuera del campo", aseveró.
Por otro lado, el presidente de la Federación de Fútbol, que no se refirió a la 'derrota' de la candidatura española para organizar el Mundial de 2018, declaró que el fútbol español "se ha proyectado al mundo entero" e hizo un repaso de los éxitos más relevantes del año.
"Este año hemos tenido éxitos en otros campos, como las mujeres, campeonas de Europa, y dos veces subcampeones de Europa con la sub 17 y sub 19. El Atlético ha sido brillantemente campeón de la Europa League. El 10 de enero la Gala de la FIFA tiene como candidatos a los premios a tres jugadores de la Liga y dos españoles, y dos entrenadores de la Liga española, y dos españoles", señaló.
" El Príncipe de Asturias de los Deportes, la medalla de oro del Instituto Reina Sofía de Nueva York al seleccionador Del Bosque, el primer puesto en el ranking FIFA , éxito debido a estos inolvidables jugadores que han representado al fútbol español durante el Mundial", declaró.
Además, Villar quiso recordar que lo conseguido no es fácil ya que "en el fútbol nadie te regala nada" y que es un "éxito debido a inolvidables jugadores". "Va a ser muy difícil aglutinar a un grupo como el de ahora", confesó.

description.hltext_display: V USA letos popravili 46 vězňů, méně než vloni
description.content:
Washington - Trest smrti je legální v 35 amerických státech, počet popravených klesá.
Autor:
reklama
Diskutovat (0) dnes 3:58
Ilustrační foto.
Autor: Uwe Titscher
Ve Spojených státech bylo v roce 2010 popraveno 46 vězňů, tedy o 12 procent méně než před rokem. K smrti bylo odsouzeno 114 lidí, což je téměř historickému minimum. Napsala to agentura AP s odvoláním na nevládní organizaci Death Penalty Information Center (DPIC), která shromažďuje informace o popravách v USA.
Podle DPIC za poklesem stojí měnící se postoj vůči trestu smrti, ale také vysoká cena poprav v době ekonomické krize a nedostatek látky používané při popravách smrtící injekcí. Kvůli nedostatku thiopentalu sodného, který slouží k uspání vězňů těsně předtím, než je usmrtí jed v injekci, musely být v pěti amerických státech popravy zrušeny, nebo odloženy.
17 popravených v Texasu
Celkem bylo k letošnímu 20. prosinci popraveno 46 odsouzených ve 12 amerických státech, nejvíce již tradičně v Texasu, kde úřady popravily 17 lidí. Celkový počet exekucí se snížil z 52 v roce 2009 a představuje méně než polovinu vykonaných trestů smrti v roce 1999.
K trestu smrti bylo letos odsouzeno 114 lidí, což je téměř nejnižší číslo od znovuzavedení nejvyššího trestu v USA v roce 1976. Ve Spojených státech, které v mezinárodním srovnání patří mezi země s nejvyšším počtem vykonaných trestů smrti, bylo za posledních 34 let popraveno 1234 lidí, téměř polovina z nich ve dvou státech – Texasu a Virginii.
Trest smrti je legální v 35 amerických státech. Na jeho výkon k 1. lednu 2010 čekalo 3261 vězňů. Nejvyšší počet vězňů odsouzených k smrti – 697 – má Kalifornie, kde však za posledních pět let nebyl popraven nikdo.
Čtěte také: Vězně popravili pomocí látky k usmrcování zvířat

description.hltext_display: China's Banks 'May Face Higher Reserve Ratios'
description.content:
(RTTNews) - Chinese lenders could be ordered to raise their reserve levels further in 2011 to the highest level ever set by a central bank, state media reported on Wednesday.
The China Daily newspaper said the People's Bank of China could order the nation's biggest banks to set aside upto 23% of capital as reserves from the current level of 18.5%, citing a leading economist.
Lu Zhengwei, chief economist at Industrial Bank, was quoted as saying at a forum on Tuesday that more hikes to the reserve requirement ratio are likely to be necessary to curb surging liquidity flows in the domestic economy.
The potential 4.5 percentage point increase in the reserve ratio would absorb at least 1.3 trillion yuan from the economy, the paper said.
China's central bank has ordered banks to raise their reserves six times this year, and raised interest rates once, amidst fears of an overheating economy and rising inflation.
"The loose monetary policy in the United States, over-liquidity in the domestic market and rising wages present an unprecedented task for China to manage its excessive liquidity and inflation next year," the paper quoted Lu as saying.
Chinese inflation surged to 5.1% in November, a 28-month high. Speculation of another interest rate hike from the Chinese central bank has rattled global markets in the past few days.

description.hltext_display: Sponsoren halten zur Stange - Luckenwaldes Trainer Andreas Zabel will einheimischen Athleten Beine machen
description.author: MAZ
description.content:
LUCKENWALDE - Die Maus hing am seidenen Faden beim Play-off-Duell zwischen dem 1. Luckenwalder SC (LSC) und dem KSV Köllerbach. Als der Gastgeber sogar mit elf Punkten Vorsprung führte, gingen auch mit Hallensprecher Manfred Jura die Pferde durch. Er rief den Köllerbacher Konstantin Schneider zum Sieger aus. Dabei hatte er soeben gegen den Ungarn Tamas Lörincz vom LSC verloren. Die Halle brodelte.
Am Ende scheiterten die Brandenburger um zwei Punkte. Jura betrieb mit einheimischen Fans an der Ringmatte Ursachenforschung. Einer sagte: „Nick Matuhin hätte seinen Gegner von der Matte pusten müssen.“ Der Gescholtene bekam das mit und mischte sich mit krächzender Stimme ein: „Der Matuhin hat die Woche im Bett gelegen“, sagte er vergrätzt. Der grippegeschwächte Schwergewichtler hatte sich gegen den 31 Kilogramm leichteren Luben Iliev zum 3:1-Punktsieg gequält. Auch in anderen Duellen gaben die Luckenwalder „kleine Punkte“ ab, die zum Schluss fehlten.
Laut RBB ist das erneute Ausscheiden der hochgehandelten Luckenwalder im Viertelfinale ein „Ergebnis des Umbruchs“. Der LSC setze beim „Kurswechsel weniger auf teure Ausländer“. Stattdessen sollen es die einheimischen Athleten im roten Kampfanzug richten.
Wenn es doch so wäre. Zu den zehn Deutschen im Kader gesellten sich in dieser Saison 15 Einflieger aus anderen Ländern, zum Teil mit Weltklasseformat. Dank dem 250 000-Euro-Etat kann es sich der LSC leisten. Sechs Ausländer standen beim Rückkampf gegen Köllerbach auf der Matte, vier gewannen. Dazu kamen die Erfolge der Deutschen Mirko Englich und Matuhin. Englich kam aus Witten, Matuhin wurde eingedeutscht.
Seit der Wende hat es der Bundesleistungsstützpunkt in Luckenwalde (Freistil) mit angeschlossenem Sportgymnasium vergeblich versucht, nach Heiko Balz und Erik Hahn Klasseringer hervorzubringen. Dabei stehen Talente wie Emanuel Krause und Damian Hartmann (beide unterlagen gegen Köllerbach) auf dem Sprung. Der LSC muss auf sie bauen, denn der Deutsche Ringer-Bund will in der neuen Saison den Einsatz von fünf statt bisher vier deutschen Startern in der Bundesliga vorschreiben. Zabel, der als Cheftrainer weitermachen will, ist skeptisch. „Wir müssen die jungen Burschen voranbringen und ihnen Beine machen“, sagt er. „Sie quälen sich zu wenig im Training und lassen sich kaum Kritik gefallen.“
Luckenwaldes „Top-Ausländer“ (Zabel) werden wieder die Kastanien aus dem Feuer holen müssen. Laut Manager Bernd Fassbender wollen die Sponsoren in bisheriger Größenordnung zur Stange halten. „Wir greifen wieder an“, so Zabel.
„Hochklassiges Ringen in Luckenwalde im nächsten Jahr“ versprach auch Spediteur Norbert Görig vom neugegründeten Sponsorenbeirat. Dieser ersetzt quasi den Aufsichtsrat, der sich in Luft aufgelöst hat. Görig mahnte: „Die Ausländer müssen pünktlich ihre Gagen bekommen. Es kann nicht sein, dass ein Ringer zum Konkurrenten Aalen zieht, weil er bei uns nach einer Niederlage kein Honorar erhalten hat.“
Als Zuschauer gegen Köllerbach war auch Roland Gehrke dabei. „Ich träume noch von alten Zeiten“, meinte der Ex-Trainer. 1981 war er für Luckenwalde Weltmeister geworden. Eventuelle Nachfolger kann er bisher nicht ausmachen. (Von Detlef Braune)

description.hltext_display: India test raket, net als Pakistan
description.content:
� Vragen over frequenties of andere vragen? EPA
NEW DELHI (ANP) - Een dag na een Pakistaanse proef met een kernraket, heeft aartsrivaal India woensdag een test gedaan met een soortgelijke raket. De proef is succesvol verlopen, meldde het Indiase ministerie van Defensie.
Het land schoot twee zelfgemaakte Prithvi II-raketten af vanaf een testcentrum in Chandipu-aan-zee in het oosten van India. De raketten kunnen 350 kilometer ver reiken en kunnen een gewone of een kernbom dragen. India had het wapen op 24 september voor het laatst getest. Toen ging de lancering echter niet door wegens technische problemen.
,,De Prithvi II-raket heeft zijn robuustheid en precisie bewezen'', zei het Indiase ministerie.
Pakistan testte dinsdag met succes haar Hatf V, die geschikt is voor een atoombom. � Om reacties te kunnen plaatsen moet je ingelogd zijn. Ga naar 'Mijn BNR' om in te loggen.

description.hltext_display: Wells holds off York boys in thrilling finish
description.author: Mike O'Neil
description.content:
YORK, Maine ? The one thing Randy Small knew about his young York High School boys basketball team was that it would battle to the end.
Despite trailing by six points with 11 seconds to go, the Wildcats saw one final comeback attempt finish a basket short as rival Wells held on for a thrilling 55-53 win over York Tuesday night at Butler Gymnasium.
The loss snapped a season-opening, four-game win streak for the Wildcats (4-1) in Class B.
"I don't like to lose, and we're disappointed, but this one was a blast," said Small. "I'm excited about this team just by the way they never, ever gave up tonight."
Down 55-49 after a pair of Alex Furness free throws with 20.8 seconds to go, the Wildcats put together one last comeback.
A Kyle Robinson three-point play made it 55-52 with 11.2 seconds to go. After a pair of missed Furness free throws at the other end, Liam Langaas hit a free throw with 8.5 seconds remaining to cut the Wells lead to two points.
After Langaas missed the second free throw intentionally, York had one last chance on the ensuing inbound play, but a Robinson jumper was long at the buzzer.
"The kids made some plays down the stretch," said Small. "We did a great job at the foul line and got the ball back. I like it; the kids fought. That was fun stuff tonight."
With the win, Wells improved to 2-3 on the season.
"This one is gigantic," said Wells coach Troy Brown. "This one teaches us a bunch of things. It shows us we can beat a very good team, we can come into a place like this and beat a rival like York, and it shows us we can win a game in the fourth quarter by doing the things we need to down the stretch."
Furness scored 19 of his game-high 26 points in the second half, including 11 in the deciding fourth quarter.
With the Wildcats holding a 27-20 lead on a Zach Leal jumper to open the third quarter, Furness netted three buckets in a 17-7 run to give the Warriors a 37-34 lead.
After a jumper pulled Wells within a point, Furness found Zach Deshaise with a great dish underneath to give the Warriors a 35-34 advantage, their first lead of the night. Furness shot 9-of-16 from the field with three 3-pointers.
"Alex is a great player," said Brown. "Tonight he made all the plays he needed to."
"They made a couple threes off a couple hard screens," said Small. "But even after that, we were able to keep coming back, even through the lead changes in the fourth quarter."
The Warriors did a nice job containing Wildcat center Aaron Todd, who averaged over 17 points in his first four games of the season.
"I thought Josh Ingalls did a great job on (Todd)," said Brown. "(Todd) has been very tough in the post for them."
After picking up two early fouls in the first half, Todd was just 2-of-13 from the field (five points), but it was his bucket with 5:50 to go that gave York a 44-41 lead. Furness' three-point play with 4:18 left led a 12-2 run that gave Wells a 53-46 lead with 1:39 remaining.
"I thought the key for us tonight was the defense," said Brown. "We gave up 70 and 66 points in our last two games coming in here. This kind of shows what we're capable of doing. We didn't give up the second chances we had been giving up."
Wells 55, York 53
WELLS (55)
McDonough 2-0-5, Chase 1-0-2, Furness 9-5-26, McLean 2-0-4, Ingalls 3-4-10, Deshaise 4-0-8. Totals: 21-9-55.
YORK (53)
Kinton 1-0-3, Langaas 6-3-18, Leal 2-2-6, Todd 2-1-5, King 2-2-6, Robinson 3-1-8, Webster 2-3-7. Totals: 18-12-53. Wells 8 12 19 16 ? 55 York 12 13 14 14 ? 53 3-point field goals ? Wells 4: Furness 3, McDonough. York 5: Langaas 3, Robinson, Kinton. Fouled out ? None.

event_or_fact.property: I thought Josh Ingalls did a great job on (Todd); Todd) has been very tough in the post for them.
The kids made some plays down the stretch; We did a great job at the foul line and got the ball back. I like it; the kids fought. That was fun stuff tonight.
I don't like to lose, and we're disappointed, but this one was a blast; I'm excited about this team just by the way they never, ever gave up tonight.

I thought the key for us tonight was the defense; We gave up 70 and 66 points in our last two games coming in here. This kind of shows what we're capable of doing. We didn't give up the second chances we had been giving up.

This one is gigantic; This one teaches us a bunch of things. It shows us we can beat a very good team, we can come into a place like this and beat a rival like York, and it shows us we can win a game in the fourth quarter by doing the things we need to do
They made a couple threes off a couple hard screens; But even after that, we were able to keep coming back, even through the lead changes in the fourth quarter.
Alex is a great player; Tonight he made all the plays he needed to.

description.hltext_display: Benoît Parayre
description.author: journal@lesechos.fr
description.content: , quarante-six ans, titulaire d'un DEUG de philosophie, a commencé comme professeur de français avant de devenir en 1990 directeur des services au Press Club de France. Appelé en 1994 au cabinet de Michel Giraud, ministre du Travail, en tant que chef du service de presse, il intègre l'année suivante le cabinet d'Anne-Marie Idrac, secrétaire d'Etat aux Transports. Devenu en 1997 directeur de la communication de Matra Transports International, il part à Bordeaux en 2000 diriger la communication auprès du député-maire de Bordeaux, Alain Juppé. De 2005 à 2007, il coordonne, au sein du cabinet de Jean-Louis Borloo, ministre de l'Economie puis de l'Ecologie, la communication et la presse.

description.hltext_display: Jižní Korea zahájila námořní cvičení, další ve čtvrtek
description.content:
Soul - Jižní Korea ve středu oznámila novou vlnu vojenských cvičení na zemi, ve vzduchu i na moři, a to jen tři dny poté, co uskutečnila manévry s ostrou dělostřeleckou palbou z ostrova Jonpchjong. Cvičení vedlo ke zvýšení napětí na Korejském poloostrově.
Autor:
reklama
Diskutovat (0) dnes 7:19
Ilustrační foto.
Autor: REUTERS
Armáda nejprve oznámila, že ve čtvrtek zahájí vojenské cvičení s ostrou střelbou na zemi a ve vzduchu u hranic se Severní Koreou. Cvičení se bude konat asi 20 kilometrů od hranic mezi oběma Koreami, řekl mluvčí armády, který manévry označil za důležité. Účastnit se jich podle něho bude 800 vojáků, vrtulníky, šest bojových letounů, tanky, protitankové střely a další bojová technika.
Armáda dále oznámila, že již dnes zahájila námořní manévry u východního pobřeží poloostrova v Japonském moři.
Cvičení se podle jihokorejské agentury Jonhap koná asi sto kilometrů jižně od hranic se Severní Koreou a účastní se ho šest válečných lodí a vrtulníky.
Cílem je připravit se na reakci pro případ, že by severokorejské ponorky nebo hlídkové lodě vnikly do jihokorejských vod, uvedla armáda.
Novým manévrům předcházelo v pondělí plánované vojenské cvičení s ostrou dělostřeleckou palbou z ostrova Jonpchjong. Jižní Korea během něho vystřelila přibližně 1500 dělostřeleckých granátů a trvalo asi 90 minut.
Severní Korea pondělní cvičení označila za bezohlednou vojenskou provokaci a původně hrozila i odvetou. Po cvičení prohlásila, že manévry nebyly hodné reakce. Uvedla, že na ně hledí jinak než na ty listopadové, po kterých spustila palbu na ostrov Jonpchjong. Tentokrát prý jihokorejské granáty dopadaly dále od severokorejského pobřeží.
Rusko a Čína již dříve Jižní Koreu vyzvaly, aby od plánovaných manévrů ustoupila. Spojené státy naopak jihokorejské cvičení podpořily. Soul manévry obhajoval s odůvodněním, že jsou běžné a že je již roky každý měsíc pořádá.
O krizi na Korejském poloostrově v neděli jednala Rada bezpečnosti OSN. Většina jejích členů odsoudila KLDR za letošní útoky proti jihokorejským cílům, při nichž přišly o život desítky lidí. Členové rady se ale nedokázali shodnout na znění rezoluce, námitky vznášela především Čína.
Ostrov Jonpchjong, který od hraniční linie leží pouze 12 kilometrů, má vedle vojenské posádky přibližně 280 civilních obyvatel. Koncem listopadu na něj severokorejská armáda spustila palbu, která si vyžádala životy čtyř Jihokorejců.

description.hltext_display: Vigilance orange pour 20 départements en prévision de nouvelles chutes de neige
description.author: rtlinfo@rtl.be (RTL Info
description.content:
Vingt départements de la moitié nord de la France, de la Loire-Atlantique aux Ardennes, ont été placés en vigilance orange par Météo France en raison de chutes de neige attendues mercredi en fin de journée.
Par ailleurs, la vigilance orange est décrétée pour la Moselle et le Bas-Rhin en raison de risques de crue.
Les chutes de neige atteindront de 5 à 10 cm sur les départements de l'Ile-de-France, sur l'Aisne (02), les Ardennes (08), l'Eure (27), l'Eure-et-Loir (28), l'Ille-et-Vilaine (35), la Loire-Atlantique (44), le Maine-et-Loire (49), la Mayenne (53), le Morbihan (56), l'Oise (60), l'Orne (61) et la Sarthe (72).
La pluie traversera dans la matinée l'Aquitaine et les Charentes avant de remonter vers le nord où, en butant sur l'air froid, elle se transformera en neige sur le nord des Pays de la Loire et les collines normandes.
"Ces chutes de neige s'étendront en soirée et la nuit suivante au bassin parisien et aux Ardennes et pourraient être précédées d'un peu de verglas", prévient Météo France.
"Cet épisode neigeux débutera vers 18h00 sur le Pays de Loire, 19h00 sur l'Ile-de-France, 20h00 sur la Bretagne, le sud de Normandie et la Picardie", selon les prévisionnistes de Météo France.

description.hltext_display: Fuller on Food: Regional flavors reason to celebrate
description.content:
One of the remarkable things about living in the Northwest is the access to seafood. Until I came to this part of the world, the holidays did not include seafood as an option for me in the Midwest. Well, I take that back. On New Year's Eve my mother would open cans of oysters and make us an oyster stew. For us, that stew was a great seafood treat, particularly when you could add a handful of oyster crackers and watch them swim around the melted butter floating on top.
But out here, December is the month of the Dungeness crab. I was amazed when I first came here standing at the seafood counter to hear a customer order ten pounds of cleaned crab for New Year's Eve. To me that was extravagant and still is, but I now understand why you might do it.
The truth be told, while I still enjoy crab in all its varieties, Judy really doesn't wax enthusiastic about sitting down to a whole crab with nothing but a pick and shell cracker and a little red sauce on the side. For alternatives we look for other ways to prepare crab. We both like crab cakes, and I have tried a number of ways of making the crab cake so that it has lots of crab and very little breading. Still, I am always up to try some new ways of serving this Northwest delicacy.
Right now, I have come across a recipe that uses a reduction of wine and vegetables combined with cream and crab. That mixture then is placed in a gratin dish, topped with Parmesan cheese and bread crumbs, and broiled until the top is browned All that we add to complete the meal is a lettuce salad with a lemon dressing and a glass of a Washington or Oregon pinot gris. Hmm, the perfect light supper for us and a special December treat that would be difficult to replicate anywhere else but in our corner of the world.
Another find of mine recently is a recipe for "smashed" potatoes as an alternative to mashed potatoes. We recently have entertained friends with entrees of roasted meat. In my mind these kinds of meals called for mashed potatoes. And then I came ran across the smashed potato alternative watching a cooking demonstration on my computer. It's simple to make and requires about five minutes right before serving. Plus, our guests have enjoyed it. Perhaps it will help reduce the panic of preparing a holiday meal at your house.
While I write about food for the holidays, I know that we want the time to be filled friends, family and traditions that make this time of year so special. I hope that happens for all of us. Some of those good times can be had by sitting down to a great meal, a special kind of giving to some special people in our lives.
DUNGENESS CRAB GRATIN
(Serves 2)
2 tablespoons minced carrot
2 tablespoons minced celery
2 tablespoons minced red bell pepper
1 tablespoon butter
1/2 cup chicken broth
1/4 cup dry white wine
1/2 teaspoon dried tarragon, crushed
1/2 cup whipping cream
1/2 pound (about 1 1/2 cups) fresh Dungeness crab cleaned
Lemon juice to taste
1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 cup panko or dried bread crumbs
In a small heavy saucepan cook carrot, celery, and bell pepper in butter over moderate heat, stirring for one minute. Add broth, wine, and tarragon. Boil mixture until liquid is reduced to about 1 tablespoon. Add cream and boil sauce until thickened, 1 or 2 minutes. Stir in crab meat, lemon juice and salt and pepper to taste.
Divide mixture between two 1-cup shallow baking dishes. Sprinkle with panko and Parmesan cheese over the crab mixture and set dishes in shallow baking pan.
Broil gratin about 4 inches from the burner for 2 minutes, or until bubbling and golden. If making ahead reheat in a 350 degree oven until mixture begins to bubble, about 10 minutes, and complete cooking under broiler for browning the topping.
- Adapted from a recipe found at www.thegutsygourmet.net.
LETTUCE SALAD WITH LEMON DRESSING
(Serves 4)
4 cups torn leaf and/or bib lettuce
1 ripe Bartlett or Comice pear
1 ounce (or to taste) chevre cheese crumbled
1/2 cup pomegranate seeds (or to taste)
1 cup toasted, coarsely chopped pecans
3 tablespoons lemon dressing, recipe follows
Peel the pear, remove seeds and core. Cut into quarters. Cut each quarter crosswise in bite size pieces. Use a fruit freshener or toss with lemon juice to prevent browning. Toss lettuce and pear slices with dressing. Divide the tossed lettuce and pear among 4 salad plates and decorate each with some of the pecans, chevre, and pomegranate seeds.
Lemon Dressing
1 medium garlic clove, pressed or minced
1/4 cup (4 tablespoons) freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/2 cup sour cream
1 tablespoon sugar
1/2 cup vegetable oil
With a whisk or immersion blender, mix together the garlic, lemon juice, sour cream, sugar and vegetable oil in a small bowl. Dressing can be made ahead and refrigerated. (Recipe makes more than needed for this recipe and is versatile and can be used on other salads or on cooked vegetables like broccoli.)
- Adapted from a recipe shared by Don Allison, Dunedin, FL
SMASHED POTATOES
(Serves 4 to 8)
2 pounds red potatoes, unpeeled and scrubbed*
Salt
1 bay leaf
4 tablespoons butter (melted and warm)
1/2 (4 ounces) cup cream cheese at room temperature
Ground black pepper
*Ideally the potatoes should be about the same size for uniform cooking. Smaller potatoes work better. Larger potatoes can be used but extend cooking time. White potatoes will work too but won't have the same color appeal in the finished recipe.
Place potatoes in large saucepan covered with 1-inch of cold water. Add a 1 teaspoon salt and bay leaf. Bring to boil over high heat and then reduce heat to medium low. Simmer gently until an inserted fork meets no resistance, about 35 minutes (cooked to the level you would normally expect potatoes to be for mashing).
Reserving ½ cup of the cooking water, drain potatoes. Return potatoes to uncovered pan to dry. Discard bay leaf.
While the potatoes are drying, beat together the melted butter and the softened cream cheese until blended and smooth. Add ¼ cup of the potato water, 1/2 teaspoon pepper and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
Using the back of a wooden spoon, smash each potato until the skin is broken. Fold in the butter/cream cheese mixture until the liquid is absorbed and chunks of potato remain.
Add more liquid a tablespoon at a time until the potatoes are slightly looser than desired because the potatoes will thicken while setting. Serve immediately.
- Adapted from a recipe in "Cook Illustrated" n.d.
Don Fuller, an avid cook, retired as dean of instruction at Lower Columbia College in 1998. Readers can reach him at The Daily News, P. O. Box 189, Longview, WA 98632 or by e-mail at df1013784@uid.onemain.com.

description.hltext_display: JD(U) protests against Karnataka land scam, price rise
description.author: Agencies
description.content:
The Janata Dal (United), an ally of NDA on Wednesday staged a demonstration here against ruling BJP government's alleged involvement in land scams in Karnataka and also against the Centre's decision of price rise.
Launching the agitation in front of a Mahatma Gandhi statue here, JD(U) state unit President Dr M P Nadagouda hit out at the government for its "involvement" in a series of land scams, which he said, "has brought to the fore corruption that has seeped into every sphere in the state".
Terming the judicial probe ordered by the government into the land scams as the "biggest farce" and an "eyewash", he said such probes even in the past have never yielded any results.
Taking a swipe at BJP for demanding resignations of ministers for their alleged involvement in various scams, including CWG and the 2G Spectrum and "now removal of CVC," Nadagouda sought to know how the party could ask for it "when their own government in the state has earned the tag of the most corrupt government".
He also slammed the BJP government for its "anti farmer" policies which he alleged had led to debt-ridden farmers selling their farming equipment.
Flaying the UPA government for "keeping its eyes closed over widespread corruption in its own government", he alleged that its anti-people policies, including rise in prices of essential commodities had hit the common man the hardest.
The BJP has kept Karnataka out of its nationwide protest against the UPA government being staged today in the wake of the party government facing a spate of corruption charges.

Frankfurt a. M. (forexcheck.de) - Gestern hat der Euro zum US-Dollar bis unter die Marke von 1,31 nachgegeben. Heute Morgen notiert das Währungspaar knapp unter 1,3150.
Zum Britischen Pfund pendelt sich der Euro nach volatilem Handel zwischen 0,8452 und 0,8512 am gestrigen Tag heute Morgen zwischen 0,8480 und 0,8490 ein. Zum Schweizer Franken setzte der Euro hingegen seine Abwärtsbewegung fort bis auf 1,2533.
Zum Japanischen Yen bewegt sich der Euro nach Schwächen in der Nacht am Morgen wieder um 110,00.
Die Zahl der Beschäftigten im Bauhauptgewerbe in Deutschland ist im Monats-Vergleich zum Vorjahr im Oktober zum Vorjahr um 2,1 % auf 732.000 gestiegen, die Summe der geleisteten Arbeitsstunden ist um 1,0 % auf 82,5 Mio. Stunden geklettert. Der Gesamtumsatz ist in gleicher Zeit um 3,0 % gestiegen und betrug im Berichtsmonat 8,72 Mrd. Euro, während sich der Index des Auftragseingangs um 1,1 % auf 99,8 erhöht hat (2005 = 100). Im Jahr 2010 kumuliert bis Oktober ist die Beschäftigtenzahl um 1,5 % auf durchschnittlich 715.000 gestiegen, während die geleisteten Arbeitsstunden um 0,5 % auf 696,9 Mio. geklettert sind. Der Gesamtumsatz ging bis dahin um 0,5 % auf 66,59 Mrd. Euro zurück, der Index des Auftragseingangs stieg um 2,2 % auf im Durchschnitt 100,2.
Das Außenhandelsdefizit Italiens im Handel mit nicht EU Mitgliedern liegt im November bei 1,899 Mio. Euro.
