description.hltext_display: Glänzende Schnauzen unterm Weihnachtsbaum
description.content:
ESSLINGEN: Zum Fest gibt es auch für Fiffi, Minka und Co. zahlreiche Geschenke
Nikolauskostüm für den Mops: Auch für viele Haustiere gibt es an Weihnachten eine schöne Bescherung.Foto: dpa Ein Weihnachtsmantel für Bello, ein Katzenkörbchen im Rentier-Design oder ein Lebkuchenhaus fürs Aquarium: Zur Weihnachtszeit steht im Fachhandel und im Internet eine reiche Auswahl an Haustierpräsenten zur Verfügung. Der Leiter des Esslinger Tierheims auf der Neckariansel, Horst Theilinger, rät hingegen zu praktischen Geschenken.
Von Angelina Schmid
Katze Fauchi und ihre Freunde Bino und Mucki dürfen sich zumindest über ein kleines Präsent freuen: „An Weihnachten bekommt jede unserer Familienkatzen eine Scheibe Schinken", erzählt Besitzer Karl-Christian Knapp. „Das bekommen die sonst das ganze Jahr nicht." Dabei will der 27-jährige Reichenbacher es aber auch belassen: „Die können dann ruhig quengeln, mehr als eine Scheibe pro Katze gibt’s nicht." Andere Geschenke kommen für den Katzenfreund nicht in Frage: „Ich wüsste gar nicht, was ich ihnen sonst schenken sollte", gibt er zu.Erst im November dieses Jahres brachte eine Umfrage des Bremer Marktforschungsinstituts The Consumer View zutage, dass fast zwei Drittel aller Hundehalter ihre Lieblinge zu Weihnachten beschenken möchten. 60 Prozent der befragten Katzenbesitzer, 58 Prozent der Kleintierhalter und 53 Prozent der Aquarienbesitzer wollen ihren Haustieren ebenfalls etwas unter den Weihnachtsbaum legen.
Wir informieren Sie, sobald es zu diesem Thema Neues gibt!
Informieren| Einloggen| Registrieren
Vom Adventskalender bis hin zu speziellen Weihnachtsplätzchen bleiben für Schenkwillige fast keine Wünsche offen. Verpackte Knochen und Kratzbäume mit Schleifchen warten in den Ladenregalen auf Käufer. Zum Fest stehen Delikatessen wie „Gans und Kalb mit Äpfeln, Spätzle und Käse" für Bello und das „Diner mit Gans und Leber" für Minka auf der Speisekarte. In Heidelberg kann man mittlerweile sogar einen Weihnachtsmarkt für Hunde und ihre Besitzer besuchen.
Und wem das noch nicht genug Weihnachtsstim-mung ist, der kann von der Hundeband „Die Wölfe" Klassiker wie „Alle Jahre wieder" vorbellen und vorjaulen lassen.
Hundebesitzerin Karin Müller, die mit Haustier Lilli und Freunden auf dem Weg zum Esslinger Weihnachtsmarkt ist, hält von solchen Geschenken nicht viel. Golden Retriever-Dame Lilli wird zu Weihnachten kein Geschenk bekommen. Manchen Einfällen kann Müller allerdings schon etwas abgewinnen: „Unsere Nachbarin hat uns neulich Hundeplätzchen geschenkt, das war eine nette Idee", erzählt sie. Auf Weihnachtsgeschenke für Vierbeiner will sie trotzdem verzichten: „Wir liegen den Tieren doch das ganze Jahr zu Füßen", meint die Hedelfingerin schmunzelnd.
„Um die Weihnachtszeit gibt es viele unnütze Geschenke", findet Horst Theilinger. Der Leiter des Esslinger Tierheims legt Herrchen und Frauchen deshalb nahe, bei Präsenten stets das Wohl des Haustiers im Auge zu behalten. „Ein gutes Geschenk soll dem Tier und dessen Gesundheit etwas Gutes tun." Empfehlenswert sei alles, was zu einer artgerechten Haltung beitrage: eine größere Voliere für den Vogel, gutes Heu für das Kaninchen oder ein Kauknochen für den Hund. „Sinnvolle Geschenke sind solche, die man sowieso braucht", betont der Tierexperte. Das Bedürfnis, Tieren etwas zum Fest zu schenken, erklärt er sich so: „Die Tiere werden immer mehr vermenschlicht. Hund oder Katze sind oft Ersatz für eine Familie. Halter bekommen ein schlechtes Gewissen, wenn sie dem Tier nichts schenken. Dabei versteht es ja gar nicht, dass Weihnachten ist."
Damit das Weihnachtsfest fröhlich bleibt, sollten Herrchen und Frauchen darauf achten, ihre Lieblinge nicht zu überfüttern: „Nur weil wir selbst zu viel essen, müssen die Tiere das nicht auch tun", sagt Theilinger. Süßigkeiten und gewürzte Speisen seien auf jeden Fall tabu für tierische Mägen.
Artikel vom 22.12

description.hltext_display: Yprintit.com - New 'Green Technology' QR-Code Social Networking App for iPhone and Android
description.content:
Yprintit (Yprintit.com) is a digital virtual business card and mobile social networking application for iPhone and Android that has its roots in Green technology. Users form an interactive social community using digital virtual business cards, which eliminate the need for traditional printed business cards (hence the name “Yprintit”) while maintaining the value and visual impact that a traditional card offers. Using a web or mobile interface users create and store unlimited digital virtual business cards for different purposes choosing from templates or by importing their own business card design through the YPrintit QR card conversion service. The new version of the web interface and mobile app to be released in early 2011 will also allow users to add digital media files to a card, such as images, and audio and video clips. A key component of Yprintit is the use of QR code (Quick Response Code) technology, the two dimensional bar code data storage technology which allows for encoding a large amount of data into a bar code type image as well as the rapid transfer of data from one QR enabled device to another. Changes to your cards are reflected instantly to all your contacts.
New York, NY (Vocus/PRWEB) December 21, 2010
YPrintit is a full-featured electronic business card and social networking application. Incorporating the use of QR Code technology, it was first introduced as an iPhone QR App , and now recently as an Android QR app as well. QR-Codes (Quick Response) are an increasingly popular two dimensional bar code data storage technology which allows for the encoding of a large amount of data into a “bar code type” pattern that also permits the rapid transfer of data from one QR enabled device to another.
“YPrintit is a natural progression” says a company spokesperson. “There will always be a need for print products and value in the utility that they provide. YPrintit however is an idea whose time has come. The widespread use of smart phones makes YPrintit an ideal solution to the many drawbacks inherent to the use of traditional printed business cards. It is a model that just makes sense.” he adds. YPrintit is indeed, in addition to other things, a new type of business card, but significantly more powerful in so many ways, while at the same time eliminating many of the typical weaknesses inherent to a traditional printed business card.
The Yprintit application is in fact a full fledged social and business networking tool. A simple interface accessible both from your mobile device and from the web allows a user to create an unlimited number of digital virtual business cards by choosing from over 1500 professionally designed business card templates. You can even convert your existing business card to a YPrintit QR Card. All of a user’s unique cards are stored in their YPrintit profile, and with the new version scheduled to be released soon, you’ll also be able to add digital media such as images, audio and video, truly taking business cards to a higher dimension. “QR seemed to be the perfect fit for what we were trying to accomplish. This really is a great QR Code app .” says the spokesperson. The YPrintit app automatically creates a unique QR code for each digital card a user creates, which not only stores a user’s information, but also acts as the mechanism by which a user “hands out” a card. Picking up a card is as simple as snapping a photo of a QR code with your mobile device camera. Once someone has your card they can pass your card to someone else, who would grab your card by taking a photo of your QR code.
You can update your contact information, change the look of your card, or add new information to your profile which is instantly reflected to all the contacts in your network. Your contacts never have outdated information in their hands. In addition, you won’t have to spend money printing new cards. “As soon as you make a change to your card or profile, everyone has your new information. It’s really fantastic. And the soon to be released version will allow the attachment of media files, and integrate with existing social networks“, the spokesperson added. “I’d like to add” said an associate “Accessing the same database from the web or from your mobile phone also allows for peace of mind. You don’t worry about losing your phone and all of your contacts and other important information. All of your data is safely stored in your web profile”.
Apart from the obvious social networking and business connectivity advantages of using this free app, YPrintit also helps the environment by reducing dependency on paper cards, whose production consumes natural resources like trees and produces toxic waste and pollutants that harm the environment. Additionally, the use of electronic business cards like YPrintit makes business practices more efficient, since the cards are digitally stored and transferred. One-touch access including email, calling, and SMS also work right from the face of the card on your touch screen. Further, using electronic cards saves money since they’re free and infinitely reusable, and can be modified, stored, created, shared and transferred without limit – features not possible with paper cards.
For more information on the YPrintit app for iPhone and Android and for information on QR Code technology, visit YPrintit.com.
Supporting Resources: http://www.yprintit.com/index/browse/to/Videos
About YPrintit: YPrintit is a new free app and social networking platform for iPhone and Android. It’s roots lie in a goal to promote green technology. As an application and networking platform, YPrintit allows you to create unlimited numbers of virtual business cards and share them with others from phone to phone through the use of QR Codes, and changes you make to your card are reflected in what your contacts see instantly.
# # #
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prwebyprintit/applicationoverview/prweb8031874.htm

description.hltext_display: Accord Europe/Etats-Unis sur les crédits export à l'aéronautique
description.content:
Le nouvel accord international sur les crédits export à l'aéronautique, finalisé vendredi à Paris après plusieurs mois de négociations au sein de l'OCDE, a été approuvé mardi par les Etats-Unis, rapportent mercredi Les Echos. Cet accord vise à rétablir l'équilibre entre les compagnies des pays exportateurs d'avions et leurs concurrents des pays tiers, tout en protégeant les exportations d'Airbus, filiale d'EADS, et de Boeing, écrit le quotidien.
Malgré quelques demandes américaines de dernière minute, le texte final, applicable à partir du 1er février, reste néanmoins conforme au compromis négocié la semaine dernière, précise le journal. "Cependant, comme le demandaient Airbus et Boeing, cet accord prévoit une période de transition durant laquelle un certain nombre d'avions continueront à échapper à cette hausse des primes", poursuivent Les Echos. "Ce sera le cas pour tous les appareils commandés avant le 31 décembre et livrés avant fin 2012, ainsi que pour 69 Boeing et autant d'Airbus commandés avant 2007 et qui continueront à bénéficier de taux encore plus bas que les conditions actuelles." Alexandre Boksenbaum-Granier, édité par Dominique Rodriguez

description.hltext_display: Karunakaran's condition critical
description.content:
The condition of ailing Congress leader K Karunakaran turned critical on Wednesday and he was put on ventilator support at a hospital here.
Karunakaran (93) was hospitalised on December 10 following severe breathing problems. Though his condition was critical in the initial days, he showed improvement last week, hospital sources said.
opposition leader Oommen Chandy visited Karunakaran at the hospital on Wednesday.

description.hltext_display: In der Zwickmühle
description.content:
Von Hermann Dorn
Der Gemeinderat ist um die Verantwortung, die ihm im Umgang mit den städtischen Gewerbeflächen zufällt, nicht zu beneiden. Auf der einen Seite muss er versuchen, die knappen Reserven nur zu veräußern, wenn die Interessenten neue Arbeitsplätze bringen oder zumindest vorhandene erhalten. Gefragt sind Unternehmen, die Hoffnungen wecken, mit ihnen könnten sich dem gesamten Standort neue, vielversprechende Chancen eröffnen. Auf der anderen Seite darf im Rathaus niemand die Augen vor der bitteren Erkenntnis verschließen, dass produzierende Betriebe dünn gesät sind, die im Großraum Stuttgart eine neue Adresse suchen. Die hohen Grundstückspreise und Auflagen sind nicht gerade dazu angetan, solche Ansiedlungen in großem Stil zu fördern.Weil die weitere Entwicklung offen bleibt, kann es für den richtigen Umgang mit diesem Thema kein Patentrezept geben. Das bloße Schielen auf den besten Preis, das sich um den Effekt für die Beschäftigung nicht kümmert, wäre eine Kapitulation. Ob der Esslinger Gemeinderat gut beraten ist, wenn er das letzte städtische Grundstück in Sirnau hartnäckig gegen den Zugriff aus dem Hause Hornbach verteidigt, bleibt allerdings abzuwarten. Klar ist aber schon jetzt, dass CDU, Freie Wähler und Grüne hoch pokern, möglicherweise zu hoch. Für die Stadt ist die Gefahr, am Ende auf dem Grundstück sitzen zu bleiben oder es für einen sehr viel geringeren Preis abgeben zu müssen, schließlich nicht von der Hand zu weisen. Prinzipientreue in Grundstücksfragen allein ist kein Ersatz für eine erfolgreiche Wirtschaftspolitik. Problematisch wird sie zudem, wenn sie dabei den Blick auf den städtischen Haushalt vernachlässigt, der auf die Grundstückserlöse dringend angewiesen bleibt.Das Rathaus hat sich im Umgang mit Hornbach als unzuverlässiger Partner präsentiert. Es ist schlechter Stil, langwierige Verhandlungen zu führen und dann plötzlich zu erklären, ein Kaufvertrag komme grundsätzlich gar nicht in Betracht. Auch wenn die Verwaltungsspitze die Vorbehalte gegen diesen Interessenten möglicherweise unterschätzt hat, müssen sich CDU, Freie Wähler und Grüne den Vorwurf gefallen lassen, an dieser Peinlichkeit wesentlich beteiligt zu sein. Ihren grundsätzlichen Widerstand hätten sie sehr viel früher erklären müssen.
Wir informieren Sie, sobald es zu diesem Thema Neues gibt!
Informieren| Einloggen| Registrieren
Artikel vom 22.12

description.hltext_display: Im Norden kalt, im Süden mild
description.content:
Offenbach (dpa) - Temperaturen über dem Gefrierpunkt bringen Schnee und Eis zumindest in Süddeutschland vielerorts zum Schmelzen. " ", bilanzierte der Deutsche Wetterdienst DWD im hessischen Offenbach am frühen Mittwoch. Mit Stand von 4.00 Uhr am Morgen lagen die Temperaturen in Konstanz, Stuttgart und Frankfurt am Main im Plusbereich. In München waren es null, in Nürnberg minus ein Grad. Köln und Dresden lagen mit einem Grad geradeso im Plus.
Weiter gen Norden wurde es kälter, beispielsweise mit minus sechs Grad in Hannover, minus sieben Grad in Bremen und Rostock, minus fünf in Hamburg und minus acht Grad in Berlin. Dieses Temperaturgefälle zwischen Nord und Süd soll laut DWD-Prognose generell anhalten, wobei jedoch die milderen Temperaturen in die Mitte Deutschlands vorrücken.
In Baden-Württemberg und Bayern war das Tauwetter schon am frühen Morgen vielerorts zu beobachten, wie eine Umfrage bei den größeren Polizeidienststellen ergab. Leichte Plusgrade gab es fast überall.
Für den Heiligabend am Freitag sagt der DWD für weite Teile Deutschlands leichten Schneefall voraus. Bei Temperaturen um den Gefrierpunkt soll es zunächst am Vormittag in Berlin, Frankfurt/Main, Stuttgart und München noch Regen oder Schneeregen geben, zum Abend hin wird es dann laut Prognose aber deutschlandweit leicht schneien.

description.hltext_display: NDA ally JD(U) protests against Karnataka govt
description.author: Tihar inmates paid to make CWG 'supari' claim
description.content:
Bangalore: The Janata Dal (United), an ally of NDA on Wednesday staged a demonstration here against ruling BJP government's alleged involvement in land scams in Karnataka and also against the Centre's decision of price rise.
Launching the agitation in front of a Mahatma Gandhi
Terming the judicial probe ordered by the government into the land scams as the "biggest farce" and an "eyewash", he said such probes even in the past have never yielded any results.
Taking a swipe at BJP for demanding resignations of ministers for their alleged involvement in various scams, including CWG and the 2G Spectrum and "now removal of CVC," Nadagouda sought to know how the party could ask for it "when their own government in the state has earned the tag of the most corrupt government".
He also slammed the BJP government for its "anti farmer" policies which he alleged had led to debt-ridden farmers selling their farming equipment.
Flaying the UPA government for "keeping its eyes closed over widespread corruption in its own government", he alleged that its anti-people policies, including rise in prices of essential commodities had hit the common man the hardest.
The BJP has kept Karnataka out of its nationwide protest against the UPA government being staged today in the wake of the party government facing a spate of corruption charges.

description.hltext_display: Ầm ĩ với xu hướng quần một mất một còn
description.content: (24h) - V� thế l� Selena Gomez đã thổi bùng lên ngọn lửa sexy mang tên "quần một mất một còn" đang gây ầm ĩ trong l� ng sao thế giới.Trong buổi biểu diễn âm nhạc mừng giáng sinh hồi đầu tháng 12 vừa qua, người đẹp tuổi teen đã khiến người hâm mộ ngây ngất vì vẻ đẹp ngọt ng� o, duyên dáng m� tr� n đầy gợi cảm của mình. Có mặt trên sân khấu của đêm nhạc Jingle Ball, Selena Gomez đã thổi bùng lên ngọn lửa sexy mang tên "quần một mất một còn" đang gây ầm ĩ trong l� ng sao thế giới. Ngôi sao trẻ xinh đẹp được cho l� "nối gót" của các bậc đ� n chị vốn đã nổi tiếng khắp thế giới về phong cách thời trang gợi cảm như Cheryl Cole v� Rihanna. 3 người đẹp n� y đã "gây dựng" nên một tr� o lưu thời trang mới rất được yêu thích trên thế giới hiện nay. Đó l� những chiếc quần âu, quần côn hoặc quần harem được xẻ dọc từ hông xuống mắt cá chân. Chiếc quần n� y đã xuất hiện nhiều trong cách BST thời trang thu/đông 2010 của nhiều thương hiệu nổi tiếng. Nhưng có lẽ người đặt dấu ấn đầu tiên cho nó trong lòng khán giả khắp thế giới có lẽ chính l� cô ca sĩ xinh đẹp Cheryl Cole. Cheryl Cole từng gây sửng sốt vì bộ đồ jumpsuit ôm sát được khoét dọc từ hông xuống mắt cá m� u đen rất sexy. Khoảng hở được che chở bằng mảng vải lưới bó chặt vô cùng quyến rũ. Bộ đồ n� y đã gây chú ý mạnh cho công chúng. Không để tên tuổi v� điều thú vị của mình "nguội đi", Cheryl Cole liên tiếp xuất hiện trong những bộ trang phục biểu diễn nóng bỏng đầy gợi cảm. Người đẹp quyến rũ nhất h� nh tinh đốt cháy ánh nhìn của khán giả bằng những thiết kế thời trang lạ mắt, khỏe khoắn, sexy v� không lẫn với ai. Cheryl Cole "lăng xê" nhiệt tình những chiếc quần "một mất một còn". Đó l� những thiết kế đậm đ� phong cách quân đội. Áo jacket nh� binh với hệ thống khóa, cúc hầm hố, mũ cáp, quần harem xẻ đùi tạo nên sự sôi động, cuồng nhiệt v� hưng phấn tột độ cho các m� n biểu diễn của người đẹp. Tiếp lửa cho xu hướng độc đáo m� Cheryl Cole tạo nên, Rihanna cũng khiến cho người hâm mộ "bốc hỏa" khi trình diện trong bộ đồ jumpsuit đến từ thương hiệu Victoria Scerets. Đó l� một thiết kế được đánh giá l� vô cùng "liều lĩnh" nhưng đã được công chúa dòng nhạc R&B thổi v� o luồng sinh khí mới lạ. Bộ áo liền quần bó sát ấy không chỉ khoe ba vòng quyến rũ m� nh� thiết kế còn khiến nó gây sốc bằng việc cắt phăng một bên ống quần v� tay áo. Điều n� y đã gây b� n tán ầm ĩ. Sau đêm biểu diễn của Rihanna, rất nhiều trang báo đã cho rằng đây chỉ l� một trong nhiều "trò lố" của cô công chúa siêu quậy. Nhưng dù có chê bai đến mấy thì chẳng ai phủ nhận được vẻ đẹp săn chắc, bốc lửa của Rihanna. Selena Gomez thì phần n� o trẻ trung v� trong sáng hơn. Người đẹp trẻ tuổi rất biết dùng m� u trắng để tôn nét trong sáng vốn đã được các fan rất yêu thích của cô. Selena Gomez diện chiếc áo quây ngực cùng quần harem xẻ đùi. Người đẹp đi chân trần trên sân khấu. Nhiều báo chí đã ví Selena Gomez đẹp như n� ng công chúa trong chuyện "Ng� n lẻ một đêm".

description.hltext_display: Ngọc Quyên: "Bạn trai tôi là người Hàn Quốc!"
description.content: (24h) - "Clip bị tung lên mạng về người bạn trai của tôi l� ho� n to� n sai, người trong clip l� bạn thân tôi" - Ngọc Quyên giãi b� y trong b� i phỏng vấn mới nhất.Nếu trước đây, Ngọc Quyên luôn che giấu chuyện tình cảm thì giờ đây gặp “búp bê Trung Hoa” lại thấy cô ríu ra ríu rít thổ lộ tình yêu mới. Điều đầu tiên khi ngồi xuống trước khi trò chuyện, Quyên than thở: “Nh� mới xa quá, xa lắm lắm, nên giờ em phải thuê nh� gần trung tâm rồi nh� đó mình cho thuê”. Quyên l� người có sở thích… than thở, cứ gặp ai thân thiết l� mè nheo, tìm sự động viên. Thường thì Quyên than thở về những sự cố, m� theo Quyên l� không đáng xảy ra với mình. Chúng tôi bắt đầu từ chuyện Quyên mua nh� . Tiền bạc l� điều nhạy cảm Quyên nổi tiếng trong giới người mẫu l� tiết kiệm trong chi tiêu. Ít khi thấy Quyên x� i tiền phung phí hay lên kế hoạch mua sắm. Đi nước ngo� i với Quyên cũng l� kết hợp công việc hơn l� chủ động đi du lịch. Với Quyên, gánh nặng gia đình luôn l� mục tiêu để Quyên phải quan tâm giải quyết. Nh� mới của Quyên thế n� o? Diện tích 70m2, nhưng giờ tôi thấy đáng tiếc vì sao mình mua xa như vậy. Thật ra, tôi mê khung cảnh v� môi trường ở đó, rất thích hợp cho mẹ tôi nhưng lại bất tiện cho công việc đi lại thường xuyên của tôi. Từ nh� ra trung tâm mất khoảng 25 phút chạy xe, mua nh� gần hơn thì tôi chưa đủ tiền… Không có ai giúp đỡ Quyên sao? Lúc trước, tôi ngại “được” giúp đỡ. Bây giờ tôi lại nghĩ khác, không còn cứng nhắc cho rằng việc ai đó giúp đỡ đều có sự lợi dụng. Tôi nghĩ một người con gái nhận sự giúp đỡ của người mình yêu cũng đâu có gì l� xấu. Họ có may mắn, nhưng bản thân Quyên lại không có may mắn đó hoặc chưa cũng nên. Tất cả những gì tôi có đến bây giờ đều từ công “c� y cuốc” của mình m� ra. Những người bạn trai cũ của Quyên thì sao, vì Quyên không nhận hay vì họ không “dang tay” với Quyên? Tôi không bao giờ yêu cầu những người xung quanh giúp đỡ. Khi n� o khó khăn lắm, tôi mới mở lời. Nh� tôi có truyền thống l� có sự cố thì luôn tìm về người thân để nhờ giúp đỡ. Tiền bạc l� điều nhạy cảm, có khi mình mất luôn cả bạn vì chuyện vay tiền. Những người cũ đến giờ vẫn l� bạn, họ san sẻ với tôi về tinh thần l� chính, chứ tiền thì không. Nếu đó l� những người yêu quý Quyên thì họ biết lúc n� o Quyên khó, chứ đâu cần mở lời? Họ biết chứ, nhưng câu trả lời của tôi luôn l� : “Thôi! Em vượt qua được”. Cuối cùng tôi cũng vượt qua được. Nếu tôi có một món nợ lớn đi nữa thì tôi cũng tự lo. Vì thế, khi tôi gọi thì không có người bạn n� o từ chối, vì họ biết tôi gọi để tâm sự chứ không phải vay tiền. Nhiều lúc tôi hỗn với mẹ Trong câu chuyện của Quyên hay tương lai của Quyên đều gắn liền với mẹ. Quyên bảo, nhiều lúc mặc nhiên l� vậy, Quyên chưa bao giờ nghĩ một ng� y phải dọn ra ở riêng cho tự do hơn. Quyên không giữ tiền sao? Tôi không giữ tiền, l� m bao nhiêu đều mang về đưa mẹ. Mỗi ng� y mẹ phát cho 500.000 đồng, hôm sau phát tiếp. Từ ng� y áp dụng kiểu n� y l� đỡ tốn kém hẳn. Nhiều lúc thấy một món đồ đẹp không chịu nổi, chạy về nh� lấy tiền, nhưng trên đường về suy nghĩ lại thấy: “Ừ! Thật ra cũng không đẹp lắm, thôi không mua”. Con gái l� m ra tiền v� đã lớn m� Quyên đi đâu cũng nhắc đến mẹ… Tôi với mẹ hay cãi nhau. Cãi ho� i � ! Khắc khẩu m� . Hầu như ng� y n� o cũng cãi. Tính tôi nóng nảy lắm, ít ai thấy tôi bị stress, nhưng về nh� l� bùng nổ với mẹ. Vì thế c� ng thương mẹ hơn. Chẳng hạn như… Đôi khi hứa với mẹ l� đưa mẹ đi ăn tối, nhưng tôi có việc đi gấp, thế l� mẹ khóc, nói tôi không biết thương mẹ. Thế l� tôi phải xin lỗi rối rít, “ăn năn sám hối” đủ điều. Đúng l� tôi có lỗi với mẹ quá. Quyên có vẻ bướng bỉnh v� quen được cưng chiều? Nh� có hai anh em, mẹ thì quấn quýt tôi. Con gái m� , hay vòi vĩnh đủ kiểu, tính tôi hay cãi, nói nhỏ nhẹ thì nghe m� la rầy l� tôi có đủ lý do để nói phần thắng về mình. Nhiều lúc tôi cũng hỗn với mẹ lắm (nét mặt chùng xuống, đăm chiêu). Mẹ ít đi đâu, ngồi nh� hay tưởng tượng những chuyện rất động trời. Tôi sợ sau n� y mình lấy chồng, chắc mẹ buồn lắm. Nghe nói có lúc Quyên đã nuôi anh trai đi học v� quán xuyến cả nh� … Chỉ một thời gian ngắn thôi! Khi đi l� m, tôi đỡ đần cho anh trai chút xíu, khi ấy anh chưa có việc l� m ổn định, nhưng bây giờ cuộc sống của anh trai hơn cả mong đợi. Anh l� m IT cho một thương hiệu lớn, lập gia đình v� chị dâu khá yêu quý mẹ tôi. Chứ có thời gian tôi cảm giác tiền bạc l� một cơn ác mộng đối với mình. Có lúc n� o Quyên chạnh lòng ước ao mình sinh ra trong một gia đình sung túc, đầy đủ hơn hay Quyên mặc cảm, ganh tỵ với những ai có nhiều hơn mình? Nói không l� không đúng. Mặc cảm ai đó cũng có, nhưng bù lại cơ hội đến với tôi dễ d� ng hơn. L� m nghề một thời gian ngắn, th� nh quả dồn dập, nói chung l� may mắn trong công việc, hiếm ai có được sự thuận lợi trơn tru như vậy m� không mất mát hay vất vả gì. Nhiều lúc tôi buông lời trách móc vì sao mình khổ, mình thiệt thòi vậy với mẹ, nhưng trong lòng tôi biết, ngo� i những vất vả về kinh tế ra, mình luôn có được những điều khác bù lại. Tôi nghĩ khác về tình yêu Chuyện tình cảm của Quyên được biết nhiều từ ng� y cô tất bật kinh doanh nhãn hiệu thời trang Cabeen trên đường Nguyễn Trãi cùng với người bạn trai. Khi ấy, Quyên có vẻ hạnh phúc. Sau n� y chia tay với người bạn trai n� y, Quyên cũng tìm hiểu v� i người nhưng không đi đến đâu. Tính Quyên ngang ngạnh như vậy thì chắc ai l� m bạn trai sẽ mệt lắm đây! Với bạn trai thì khác. Nãy giờ Quyên hay nói xin lỗi với mẹ, m� việc n� y những cô gái kiêu hãnh thường khó nói dù biết mình có lỗi. Thật ra xin lỗi ho� i cũng không hay. Với người thân, tôi không ngại sĩ diện, chứ nếu h� nh động chuộc lỗi chưa chắc họ đã biết. Giận hờn với bạn trai, tôi sẵn s� ng xin lỗi nếu lỗi l� do mình. M� lúc n� o tôi cũng thấy mình có lỗi. Chuyện nhiều khi bé xíu m� tôi l� m quá lên, nhiều lúc đùng đùng. Thế thì mau mau hạ hỏa v� xin lỗi chứ sao. Hiện tại Quyên đã có bạn trai? Có! Chắc đây l� định mệnh quá. Anh ấy người H� n Quốc. Định mệnh…? Đây l� lần đầu tôi nói như vậy, gọi l� duyên phận cũng đúng. Tôi đi công việc ở H� n Quốc, quen anh lúc đi mua sắm. Bạn bè can ngăn, khuyên tôi nên suy nghĩ thực tế, nhưng… Lần gặp đầu tiên, anh không biết Tiếng Việt, tôi không biết tiếng H� n, ngôn ngữ giao tiếp l� tiếng Anh, m� vốn tiếng Anh của cả hai cũng không nhiều cho lắm. Cũng từ đấy tôi đã có cái nhìn khác về tình cảm, về sự lựa chọn của mình. Hai người chỉ gặp nhau ở H� n Quốc có một lần duy nhất? 3 ng� y ở H� n Quốc v� cho đến hiện tại, anh đang ở Việt Nam thăm tôi. Anh l� sinh viên. Nghe giống trong phim đúng không? Nhiều lúc tôi cũng lo mình mù quáng lắm. Chắc vì anh ấy l� sinh viên nên bạn bè v� người thân của Quyên mới khuyên thực tế đúng không? Hẳn anh ấy rất đẹp trai? Anh cao 1,8m dễ nhìn chứ không đẹp trai lắm đâu. Từ ng� y về Việt Nam, ng� y n� o anh cũng điện thoại, chat chit v� … ghen tuông. Clip bị tung lên mạng về người bạn trai của tôi l� ho� n to� n sai, người trong clip l� bạn thân tôi. Có thể đây chỉ l� mơ mộng? Đây l� cảm xúc của tôi. Có lúc tôi quá phụ thuộc v� o đồng tiền, chọn lựa người đ� n ông cho mình cần vững chắc. Tuy nhiên, từ khi gặp anh, nhìn cách người ta sống không quan trọng vật chất, tôi nghĩ sao mình lại nghiệt ngã với bản thân, sao không hưởng thụ cuộc sống, sống với hiện tại, niềm vui đang có. Tôi không kỳ vọng quá nhiều nhưng tôi d� nh cho tình cảm n� y một cơ hội để kỳ vọng. Cảm ơn Ngọc Quyên!

description.hltext_display: Fresh snowfall disrupts rail and air transport across Europe
description.author: Agencies
description.content:
Thousands of air travellers remained stranded and train services were severely disrupted as fresh snowfall and sub-zero temperatures worsened Europe's Christmas travel chaos.
For the fifth consecutive night, several hundred stranded passengers slept on camping beds at Germany's largest airport in Frankfurt as the authorities struggled to cope with the tension building up among those still unable to catch a flight.
The airport operator Fraport has been trying to improve the services for stranded passengers and offered them free drinks and snacks after a brawl at Lufthansa's check-in counter last Saturday.
Around 570 flights out of 1,300 flights were cancelled yesterday and the airport was shut down for more than three hours after unexpectedly heavy snowfall blocked the runways and frustrated efforts to keep aircraft free of ice.
Even after the airport resumed its operations, some of the flights were delayed by more than six hours, airport officials said.
The officials expressed fears that the time is running out for stranded passengers to reach their home or holiday destinations before Christmas.
Even if the airport resumes normal operations today, it will take several days to clear the backlog built up during over the past few days and some of the stranded passengers may be still in Frankfurt during Christmas, they said.
About 30 incoming long-distance flights could not land in Frankfurt because of the temporary closure and they were diverted to the country's second largest airport in Munich.
Over 10,000 air travellers were affected by the diversion of flights, according to Munich airport officials.
... contd.

event_or_fact.property: disrupts rail; train services were severely disrupted
the airport was shut down for more than three hours

description.hltext_display: Neuer Weltrat gegen Artensterben nimmt Arbeit auf
description.content:
UNO Nach dem Vorbild des Weltklimarates wurde nun auch ein entsprechendes Gremium gegen das Artensterben eingerichtet. Mit dem offiziellen Startschuss der UNO-Vollversammlung kann die Internationale Plattform für Artenvielfalt und Ökosysteme (IPBES) ihre Arbeit aufnehmen. Neu in Agrarpolitik: Der Expertenrat, der Daten zum Artensterben zusammenträgt und analysiert, soll in drei Jahren einen ersten Bericht vorlegen, wie die IPBES am Dienstag in New York mitteilte. Den Sitz wird die Kommission in der kenianischen Hauptstadt Nairobi haben, wo auch die UNO-Umweltbehörde UNEP angesiedelt ist.Im Oktober hatten die UNO-Staaten auf der Artenschutzkonferenz im japanischen Nagoya beschlossen, den Verlust von Tier- und Pflanzenarten bis 2020 stoppen zu wollen.Die Genehmigung des Expertenrates durch die Generalversammlung ist der Abschluss des von den Vereinten Nationen für 2010 ausgerufenen «Jahres der Artenvielfalt». Gleichzeitig beginnt die «Dekade der Artenvielfalt». Das Jahr 2011 ist zudem das «Jahr des Waldes».
sda/dpa/blu [21.12.2010 15:07] In Zusammenarbeit mit: Die Bilder zum Thema

description.hltext_display: "Slučaj Begović" na arbitraži
description.content:
Tottenham želi svojih milion funti
Piše: E. Škorić
U novoj godini Portsmouth će ići na arbitražu kako bi se riješio "slučaj Asmir Begović", odnosno spor sa Tottenhamom zbog milion funti kojeg Spursi žele nakon što je naš golman odbio otići na White Hart Lane i potpisao za Stoke City.
Iako je transfer u Tottenham već bio dogovoren, Asmir Begović u posljednjim minutama prošlog zimskog prelaznog roka potpisao je za Stoke City. Kasnije je Begović kazao kako je iz sportskih razloga odlučio odbiti ponudu jednog velikog kluba kao što je Tottenham, te kako je odlaskom u Stoke napravio najbolji potez.
Na White Hart Laneu sebe smatraju oštećenim, pa inzistiraju da im Portsmouth, inače klub u velikim dugovima, isplati milion funti. Treba naglasiti da je do kontroveznog spora došlo kada je stečajni upravnik popularnih Mornara bio Andrew Andronikou, a danas tu ulogu obnaša David Lampitt.
Za rješavanje ovog slučaja na Fratton Parku sve će prepustiti arbitražnom sudu, a datum za sastanak još uvijek nije potvrđen, ali je izgledno da će se dogoditi početkom naredne godine.
"Situacija oko Asmira Begovića ide na arbitražu u novoj godini. Ovo pitanje se 'vuče' već duže vrijeme i mislim da je konačno vrijeme da se okonča", rekao je Lampitt.

description.hltext_display: Groupism in TNCC Surfaces During Rahul's Visit
description.content:
Groupism in the Tamil Nadu Congress surfaced once again today in the presence of AICC General Secretary Rahul Gandhi when several Congressmen voiced their views on the party's tie up with DMK at the airport here.
It all started when 'Karate' 'Thiagararjan, a prominent Congressman owing allegiance to Home minister P Chidambaram told Gandhi that the party should not have any truck with AIADMK and nothing should be done to disturb the party's relationship with DMK.
TNCC President K V Thangkabalu snubbed him, saying airport was not the place to discuss sensitive issues like alliances.
Thiagarajan told him that if the cadre's views are to be ably conveyed to the party high command, it could be done only by Rahul.
Rahul Gandhi, who is said to be disinclined with Congress having any truck with any one of the two major Dravidian parties, however, did not respond to Thiagarajan's plea.

event_or_fact.property: if the cadre's views are to be ably conveyed to the party high command, it could be done only by Rahul.

description.hltext_display: Huge South Korea drill likely to infuriate North
description.content:
SEOUL (Reuters) - South Korea announced land and sea military exercises on Wednesday including its largest-ever live-fire drill near North Korea in a big show of force just as tension on the peninsula was easing after Pyongyang's attack on a southern island.
The land drill, involving artillery, fighter jets and the largest number of personnel in a peace-time exercise, will take place on Thursday, after the South's live-fire artillery exercise on Monday on the island of Yeonpyeong, and is bound to infuriate the North.
South Korea is also holding three days of live-firing drills off the peninsula's east coast starting on Wednesday, a media official at the Defense Ministry said.
He would not provide details. Yonhap news agency said the drills were taking place 100 km (60 miles) south of the maritime border with North Korea and involved at least six naval boats.
North Korea this week offered to re-admit U.N. inspectors concerned about its nuclear-weapon program, leading to speculation of a resumption of six-party disarmament talks and a general sigh of relief around the world that the crisis had passed.
"Yes, it will be a show of force against that," an army officer said when asked if the shelling of Yeonpyeong island last month was a factor in the land drill's planning.
He said similar drills had been staged previously on more than 50 occasions, but the scale this time was unprecedented.
"The scale of mechanized assets taking place is enormous. When we would normally have 6 K-9 mechanized artillery, we'll have 36. We'll have the F-15 jets firing. We'll have choppers. You can say most of the mechanized assets taking part will be firing live ammunition."
It will take place in Pocheon region, less than 50 km (30 miles) north of downtown Seoul.
The latest crisis peaked when North Korea shelled Yeonpyeong, just south of the disputed maritime border, killing four people -- including two civilians -- in the worst attack on South Korean territory since the end of the civil war in 1953.
The South carried out live-fire drills on Yeonpyeong on Monday, which provoked only a verbal reaction from the North.
It had vowed to strike back if the South went ahead with the drills, prompting fears of all-out war.
China, North Korea's only major ally, has urged dialogue to resolve the crisis and urged the North to follow through on its offer to allow U.N. inspectors into the country.
The Chinese Foreign Ministry had no immediate comment on the planned drill.
FAMILY RULE
Analysts say the North is unlikely to undertake another act of aggression like this year's attack on South Korea's Cheonan warship, blamed on the North by the United States and the South, and the Yeonpyeong shelling, at least in the near term.
Its most likely next move would be to conduct live-fire artillery drills or possibly a short-range missile test into its waters off the west coast.
Analysts have said its recent militaristic acts have served to bolster family rule as ailing leader Kim Jong-il grooms his youngest son, Kim Jong-un, as his successor.
"North Korea likes to step toward the brink and then away from it again," said Brian Myers, an expert on North Korea at South Korea's Dongseo University.
"The news from Pyongyang in the past few days indicates that the Kim Jong-il regime is now in the backing-off part of its usual cycle."
He said the North probably did not expect the South to carry through with live-fire exercises on Monday.
"If it had, it would not have made such loud threats of reprisal in its domestic media. After the exercises took place, the Kim regime had to tell its own people that the South's 'provocation' was not worth responding to, a flip-flop it cannot afford to repeat in just a few days. I don't expect the North to be quite as vocal about the next round of exercises."
Finance Minister Yoon Jeung-hyun, speaking before the announcement of the drill, said domestic financial markets had weathered the crisis and the South Korean economy, Asia's fourth-largest, stayed on a growth track.
But he warned that the tension could still dent consumer spending with a key sentiment measure due on Friday.
The won edged down slightly while stocks and bonds were stable as traders shrugged off the North Korea risk.
Traders said earlier that the currency was generally being affected more by concern over the euro zone.
Consumers and businesses in South Korea say they have lived with tension on the divided peninsula for decades and markets do not always react although the recent crisis had rattled global markets and remained an underlying risk.
(Writing by Nick Macfie; Editing by Robert Birsel)

location.location_name: 50 km (30 miles) north of downtown Seoul

the North probably did not expect the South to carry through with live-fire exercises on Monday
the tension could still dent consumer spending with a key sentiment measure due on Friday.

description.hltext_display: Geschenke für 500 Kinder
description.content:
ESSLINGEN: Sterneaktion wird zum großen Erfolg
Maria Sarikaya freut sich sehr über die Geschenke, die sie von Anne Burkhardt bekommt. Links Nadine Töpler, im Hintergrund Dorothea und Helmut Stickel.Foto: Bulgrin (bes) - Maria Sarikaya strahlt übers ganze Gesicht: An Weihnachten werden ihre drei Jungs und ihre Tochter nicht leer ausgehen. Für alle gibt's ein Geschenk. Die Aktion Weihnachtsstern, von karitativen Einrichtungen in Esslingen zum ersten Mal organisiert, macht's möglich.
Die Idee zur Sterneaktion für Kinder aus wenig begüterten Familien hatte der in der Region aktive Verein Lillebror mit seiner rührige Initiatorin Nicole Müllerschön. Dabei werden Geschenkpaten gesucht, die Kindern einen Wunsch bis zu 25 Euro erfüllen. Beim Caritas-Zentrum Esslingen, den beiden Gesamtkirchengemeinden und der Diakonischen Beratungsstelle fand das Vorhaben viel Unterstützung. Und so fertigte Lillebror, benannt übrigens nach dem kleinen Jungen in Astrid Lindgrens Buch „Karlsson vom Dach", 500 Sterne.„Dass wir die alle losbekommen haben, ist doch toll", sagt Anne Burkhardt von der Diakonischen Bezirksstelle Esslingen. Zahlreiche Ehrenamtliche aus verschiedenen Kirchengemeinden engagierten sich im Rahmen der Aktion. Es galt, die Sterne an einkommensschwache Familien zu bringen, die den Kindern zu Weihnachten sonst nichts schenken könnten. Ihre Wünsche schrieben die Kinder dann auf die Sterne.
Wir informieren Sie, sobald es zu diesem Thema Neues gibt!
Informieren| Einloggen| Registrieren
Das Ergebnis der Sterneaktion stapelte sich nun im Antonius-Zimmer im Salemer Pfleghof. 500 Gaben in vielerlei Größen und Formen lagen auf Tischen und in Regalen. Weihnachtliches Geschenkpapier und viele Verzierungen zeigten, dass sich die Spender unheimlich viel Mühe gemacht hatten und wollten, dass die Kinder an Weihnachten wirklich leuchtende Augen bekommen. Ganz wie von den Organisatoren erhofft.
Ob ein Fußball, diverse Legospiele, eine Maltafel mit Zebrastreifen, eine Umhängetasche, Bücher oder ein Puzzle - die Kinder hatten die unterschiedlichsten Wünsche geäußert. Als Mütter, Omas und manchmal auch die Kinder selbst die sorgfältig durchnummerierten Päckchen abholten - schließlich sollte unterm Weihnachtsbaum ja kein falsches Geschenk liegen - war das Hallo groß. Anne Burkhardt und Nadine Töpler, die sich als Praktikantin bei der Caritas engagiert um das Projekt kümmerte, und Dorothea und Helmut Stickel gaben die Geschenke aus. Das Ehepaar zählte zu den vielen Ehrenamtlichen, die der Sterneaktion eine erfolgreiche Premiere in Esslingen ermöglichten: „Ohne sie hätten wir das alles nicht stemmen können", lobt Diakon Peter Maile die freiwilligen Helfer.
Artikel vom 22.12

description.hltext_display: El 75.869, agraciado con uno de los quintos premios

description.hltext_display: John Yerburgh calls time after 63 years with Thwaites
description.content:
BLACKBURN-based brewer Daniel Thwaites has announced that the company's president, John Yerburgh, is to retire as a director from the company.The family-owned firm which is listed on the Plus Market, said that Mr Yerburgh would still represent the company as Life President but after a 63-year spell as a director he had decided to step down. Yerburgh is the great-great grandson of the company's eponymous founder.

description.hltext_display: Lobag setzt sich für den Schutz des Bodens ein
description.content:
Die Berner Bauernorganisation Lobag wehrt sich gegen den von der Regierung vorgeschlagenen Sachplan Fruchtfolgeflächen. Dieser sieht vor, einen Anteil von 84'000 Hektaren sicherzustellen. Neu in Agrarpolitik: Gemäss Inventar 2009 gibt es jedoch bloss noch 78'150 Hektaren, der Kanton Bern erfüllt deshalb die Vorgaben des Bundesrates nicht. In der Vernehmlassung wird vorgeschlagen, die Fruchtfolgeflächen in der voralpinen Hügelzone um 6'000 Hektaren zu erweitern, um die 84'000 Hektaren sicherzustellen. Landwirtschaft benötigt genügend hochwertige FruchfolgeflächenDies als Kompensation zu den Verlusten in der Talzone. Die Lobag lehnt dies in einer Medienmitteilung ab. Bereits liege rund ein Drittel der ausgewiesenen Fruchtfolgeflächen in der Übergangszone, es sei weder realistisch noch sinnvoll, diesen Anteil zu erhöhen. Der Richtplan müsse so angepasst werden, dass die Landwirtschaft weiterhin genügend qualitativ hochwertige Fruchtfolgeflächen zu wirtschaftlich vernünftigen Bedingungen bearbeiten könne.
Renaturierungen dürfen nicht hunderete Hektaren vernichtenFerner müssten die Fruchtfolgeflächen auch im Umfeld von Fliessgewässern als gleichwertig betrachtet werden. Es dürfe nicht sein, dass durch Renaturierungen zusätzlich Hunderte Hektaren an Fruchtfolgeflächen vernichtet würden.

description.hltext_display: Konstanz bereits schneefrei
description.content:
Offenbach/Konstanz (dpa) - Konstanz am Bodensee ist der einzige Ort ohne Schnee in den bundesweiten Messungen des Deutschen Wetterdienstes DWD.
Die Stadt im äußersten Süden Deutschlands war mit Stand vom Dienstagabend schneefrei und verzeichnete in der Nacht zum Mittwoch mit plus drei Grad eine in diesen Tagen milde Temperatur.
Alle übrigen über ganz Deutschland verteilten 64 Orte, von denen die DWD-Zentrale in Offenbach Schneehöhen abruft, waren eingeschneit. An der Spitze lag der Brocken im Harz, wo sich die Flocken auf 155 Zentimetern Höhe stapelten. Auf der Zugspitze waren es nur fünf Zentimeter weniger. Selbst auf den Nordseeinseln Norderney, Sylt und Helgoland blieb die weiße Pracht liegen - was dort selten ist.
Allerdings sagten die Meteorologen in ihrer ersten Prognose am frühen Mittwochmorgen Tauwetter für den ganzen Süden voraus. Im Laufe des Tages könnte der Schnee dort also an vielen Orten fortschmelzen.

description.hltext_display: "Bội thực" ảnh nóng, lộ hàng và "thời trang xuyên thấu"
description.author: Việt Báo
description.content:
Tags: Trang Nhung, Hà Anh, Hà Nội, Thanh Hằng, đầu ngón tay, kiểu sự cố, thời trang, xuyên thấu, người đẹp, một năm, bội thực, chương trình, ảnh, lộ, cô
Nếu như năm 2009 số vụ "lộ hàng" chỉ đếm trên đầu ngón tay mà đã bị coi là một năm "gặt hái", "no nê" với kiểu sự cố này thì năm 2010 phải gọi là năm bùng nổ ảnh bỏng mắt của showbiz Việt.
Cứ theo đà này, nhiều người nói một cách mỉa mai rằng các sao Việt đang "tập" cho người hâm mộ và khán giả phải quen với các kiểu thời trang xuyên thấu và "có cũng như không" của họ, nhưng tập với tốc độ hơi bị... chóng mặt!
Thanh Hằng tại buổi ra mắt showroom mới của một dòng sản phẩm thời trang tại Hà Nội tối 9/9. Không kèm áo lót, vòng một tuyệt đẹp của Thanh Hằng nửa kín nửa hở khi nhìn trực diện và hở 3/4 khi nhìn nghiêng đã khiến không ít người trầm trồ.
Đó là nhờ chiếc áo cổ V xẻ xâu tới tận bụng của cô.
Xuất hiện cũng trong buổi tối hôm đó với Thanh Hằng, Kim Tuyến diện chiếc váy để trần một bờ vai thon, trông cô vô cùng gợi cảm. Nhưng chiếc váy quá ngắn đã bị lệch khi người đẹp ngồi xuống, phơi ra gần như trọn vẹn vòng 3 của cô trên ghế sofa.
Hà Anh để lộ nội y vì chiếc váy quá ngắn và một phần vì những động tác biểu diễn có phần "sung" tại chương trình Diamond Night tối 4/9 tại KS Sheraton TP.HCM.
Cũng trong đêm Diamond Night, Bebe Phạm đã đen đủi hơn Hà Anh khi cô bị tụt hẳn một bên áo, lộ nguyên một bên gò bồng đảo.
Ngay sau khi phát hiện cô đã đưa tay lên che nhưng những tấm ảnh "lộ hàng" vẫn bị chộp.
Vì sự cố của Hà Anh và Bebe, BTC chương trình đã bị Sở VHTTDL TP.HCM xử phạt 11 triệu đồng. Hai người mẫu may mắn thoát nạn vì nhà chức trách coi đó chỉ là tai nạn nghề nghiệp chứ không cố ý "show hàng" gây chú ý.
Thủy Tiên và Công Vinh nuy bán thân trên một tạp chí dành cho tuổi teen, để lộ hình xăm trên cánh tay chàng và trên phần lưng của nàng. Hai người nói họ bị bẫy khi tòa soạn tờ báo kia và nhiếp ảnh gia nói cứ nuy thoải mái, sau đó sẽ cắt cup ảnh đến sát cổ. Tuy nhiên trông bố cục bức ảnh chẳng mấy ai tin vào lời giải thích đó.
Hàng trăm comment trên các trang báo điện tử đều bày tỏ sự khó chịu và thất vọng đối với việc làm của hai ngôi sao, họ cho rằng hai người dựa vào nhau cùng bày scandal để gây chú ý. Sự việc càng bị phê phán hơn khi Thủy Tiên trước đây từng phát ngôn rằng cô "khoe chân nhưng không khoe ngực".
Tháng 3/2010, Sợi xích của Lê Kiều Như ra mắt sau nhiều hứa hẹn, lập tức bị dư luận mỉa mai gọi là dâm thư...
... càng tệ hại hơn khi tác giả tặng kèm độc giả một vài hình ảnh tươi mát như để... khuyến mãi.
Trong ngày ra mắt sách, trang phục của cô cũng không kém phần nóng bỏng, như để khẳng định thương hiệu sexy của mình.
Trong đêm khai mạc LHP Quốc tế VN lần thứ nhất, giữa một rừng sao ta lẫn sao ngoại, Quách An An vẫn gây chú ý bởi chiếc váy trong suốt.
Nhất là nhìn từ phía sau!
Ngày 9/11 Jennifer Phạm làm MC đêm thi Người đẹp Tài năng của HH Trái đất 2010 bên cạnh người mẫu, diễn viên Bình Minh. Người đẹp đã gây ấn tượng bởi trang phục nóng bỏng.
Ít ngày sau đó, Thứ trưởng Bộ Văn hóa Thể thao và Du lịch, ông Lê Tiến Thọ đã phải chỉ đạo BTC cuộc thi phải nhắc nhở MC đêm chung kết ăn mặc phù hợp với thuần phong mỹ tục của người Việt. Kết quả, Jennifer Phạm vẫn được chọn dẫn chương trình đêm chung kết cùng 2MC nước ngoài song cô đã chú ý ăn mặc kín đáo hơn.
Hồng Quế với chiếc váy mỏng tang và không mặc nội y tại một đêm diễn thời trang hôm 18/12 vừa qua tại Hà Nội.
Là gương mặt trẻ đắt show ở miền Bắc, Hồng Quế cũng chọn cho mình phong cách sexy.
Hiền Thục làm lộ 2/3 chiếc áo ngực sau mỗi lần cô đưa tay lên múa theo nhịp bài hát trong một chương trình ca nhạc thời trang diễn ra vào ngày 8/10.
Trước đó vài tháng người đẹp này cũng đã có màn khoe khéo nội y tương tự.
Xuân Mai vô tình bị lộ hàng trong đêm diễn của Khánh Phương vào cuối tháng 8 tại Hà Nội. Cô đã hớ hênh khi ở tư thế ngồi trên sân khấu (để nhận hoa của khán giả), chiếc váy quá ngắn đã phản chủ.
Trang Nhung đã mở đầu thật "đắt hàng" cho một năm tràn ngập sự cố lộ hàng và ảnh nóng của các ngôi sao nữ. Ngay đầu tháng 1 năm nay, trên một diễn đàn mạng xuất hiện những bức ảnh của cô với một bên dây áo ngực tuột để lộ hoàn toàn bầu ngực bên trái. Trang Nhung giải thích , tấm ảnh bị chộp trong lúc đang thay đồ giữa một buổi chụp hình thời trang trong công viên vào cuối năm trước.

description.hltext_display: Greeks go on strike before austerity budget vote
description.content:
ATHENS (Reuters) - Greek unions called a general strike on Wednesday and Athens was paralysed by a 24-hour public transport stoppage in protest against the government's 2011 budget, set to pass later as part of an EU/IMF bailout.
The budget, meant to help stem a debt crisis that has shaken the euro zone, includes further tax hikes and wage cuts in state-run enterprises, especially in public transport.
Fitch said on Tuesday it may cut Greece's credit rating next month to junk as both other major rating agencies have done.
"Even though this news was expected, it will go down badly with the markets, there is widespread fear about downgrades coming," said Ioanna Telioudi, analyst at HSBC in Athens.
Greece's main public and private sector labour unions have called a 3-hour strike from 10 a.m. to 1 p.m. British time in Athens. Thousands are expected to rally outside parliament.
Athens bus and subway drivers have been holding on and off strikes for two weeks, keeping Christmas shoppers from the city centre, adding to the strain of recession-hit retailers.
The government threatened on Wednesday to break the public transport strikes, invoking emergency legislation it used earlier this year to dissolve labour action by truck drivers and other transport workers.
"Everyone has to show responsibility ... the state has all the powers it needs to protect the public interest," government spokesman George Petalotis said in a television interview.
Analysts have warned the additional measures will hurt the economy even more without providing guarantees that the country will avoid a debt restructuring to cope with ballooning debt.
The government has a comfortable majority of 156 seats out of 300 in parliament and the budget is expected to be approved despite growing discontent among the ruling PASOK party ranks.
"I am giving the government a last chance," said PASOK deputy Thomas Robopoulos during the budget debate on Tuesday. Since the EU/IMF bailout agreement was signed in May, Prime Minister George Papandreou has expelled four deputies for disagreeing publicly with his austerity policies
The socialists, who revealed a gaping budget deficit after coming to power last year, have braved public discontent and taken draconian measures to meet the bailout terms.
The government has cut public sector wages by about 15 percent, increased the retirement age, frozen pensions, cut public spending but has failed to boost tax collection as much as targeted, despite a hefty VAT increase.
Greece's lenders have said that the country was broadly on track with its fiscal program but needed to step up reforms and spending cuts next year.
Partly as a result of the measures, the economy is seen shrinking by 3 percent next year after a 4.2 percent drop in 2010, with unemployment jumping to a record 14.6 percent from an estimated 12.1 percent this year.
Greece targets a deficit of 7.4 percent of GDP next year, from about 9.4 percent this year.
Greek protesters clashed with police last week and set fire to cars and a hotel in central Athens earlier this month, as some 50,000 marched against austerity in the biggest and most violent march since three died in protests in May.
(Editing by Louise Ireland)

description.hltext_display: Aargauer Landwirtschaftsamt reorgansiert sich neu
description.content:
Die Abteilung Landwirtschaft im Kanton Aargau erhält aufs neue Jahr einen neuen Namen und eine neue Strategie. Sie wird künftig Landwirtschaft Aargau heissen. Neu in Agrarpolitik: Schwerpunkt der Neuausrichtung ist die nachhaltige Förderung der Nahrungsmittelproduktion. In Anlehnung an die Kernpunkte des neuen Landwirtschaftsgesetzes, das sich in der parlamentarischen Beratung befindet, sieht sich das Amt als Entwickler, Gestalter und Förderer einer auf die Kundenbedürfnisse ausgerichteten, intelligenten Produktion. Landwirtschaft Aargau soll laut einer Medienmitteilung Denkfabrik und Umsetzungspartner der Agrarpolitik von Bund und Kanton sein. Man wolle vermehrt Brücken bauen zwischen den Akteuren entlang der landwirtschaftlichen Wertschöpfungskette.
Auch die Strukturen werden angepasst. Statt vier gibt es neben den Stabsstellen Strategie und Planung und Zentrale Dienste nur noch drei Führungsbereiche.

description.hltext_display: McCarthy Creates Non-toxic Baby Bedding
description.content:
Model-turned-actress Jenny McCarthy is helping to put new mums at ease - by launching her own range of eco-friendly crib bedding. The star's Too Good line features all-cotton sheets, blankets, rugs and hampers and all materials used are non-toxic.
McCarthy admits she was inspired to create the collection because she was well aware of the fears she faced as she brought up her son Evan, eight.
She tells Us Weekly, "I was psychotic about keeping my house clean, so I wanted items without harsh chemicals."

event_or_fact.property: I was psychotic about keeping my house clean, so I wanted items without harsh chemicals.
she was inspired to create the collection because she was well aware of the fears she faced as she brought up her son Evan, eight

description.hltext_display: Tuvalu Parliament Dissolved
description.content:
THE parliament of Tuvalu has been dissolved just three months after elections in the tiny Pacific nation.
Outgoing prime minister Maatia Toafa lost a motion of no-confidence in the 15-seat parliament yesterday, the spokesman said.
"There are negotiations to select a new prime minister. We're hoping they will be complete by the end of the week," he told Agence France-Presse today, declining to reveal the reasons for the no-confidence vote.
"It will be up to the new government when parliament reconvenes."
Tuvalu, one of the world's smallest independent nations, with just 12,000 residents, held elections in September.
The former British colony does not have political parties and instead forms a government from alliances of MPs from the country's eight inhabited islands.
Former government secretary Panapasi Nelesoni told Radio New Zealand International that MPs had raised concerns about financial issues before the vote to topple Toafa.

event_or_fact.property: We're hoping they will be complete by the end of the week
MPs had raised concerns about financial issues before the vote to topple Toafa.

description.hltext_display: Promoter Offers Charity Millions If Smith & Wahlberg Fight
description.content:
A top boxing promoter has offered to hand over $2 million (£1.3 million) to charity if Mark Wahlberg and Will Smith agree to step into the ring for a celebrity boxing bout.
Both stars have played champions on the big screen and now Hollywood Boxing Federation boss Damon Feldman is keen to see what the two actors have learned from their research for films Ali and The Fighter.
Feldman tells U.S. news show Access Hollywood, "It would be a good show, a good, fast, easy way to make money."

event_or_fact.property: "It would be a good show, a good, fast, easy way to make money.

description.hltext_display: Larsson's Girlfriend Plans Tell-all Book
description.content:
The grieving girlfriend of late author Stieg Larsson has written her own account of the months following the writer's death in 2004 - in an effort to stop journalists hounding her for secrets about her life with the Swedish author.
Eva Gabrielsson dated author for 32 years and has been at war with the writer's father and brother over his post-death fortune since Larsson's mysterious death.
Tired of talking about her dispute with Joakim and Erland Larsson, she has decided to put her thoughts into words - and her book about the saga will hit stores next year.
She tells Rolling Stone magazine, "I am done with refuting things about Stieg, about me and what happened after he died. Therefore, I have written a book about it, and I hope that will be the end of all (the) lies and speculation." Larsson died virtually penniless months before his Millennium trilogy of books turned him into one of the world's bestselling author. The Larsson's offered Gabrielsson $2.6 million (£1.73 million) from her late boyfriend's estate but she refused the cash. The writer's brother, Joakim, tells the publication he has no idea what Gabrielsson wants.

description.hltext_display: Portman's Big Cover Up As Thong Scene Is Doctored
description.content:
Natalie Portman's bottom has been covered up in the trailer for her new movie Your Highness - so the teaser can screen for under-18s.
The actress appears in a thong in the R-rated trailer but studio bosses feared the butt-baring scene would be too much for censors, so they've toned it down - and painted on panties.
Editors at EW.com have exposed the truth by airing both scenes online.
A source close to the production tells the website, "The scene was altered so the MPAA would approve the trailer for screening for appropriate audiences in theatres." The thong scene will be replaced for the actual film.

description.hltext_display: European travel disruption continues
description.author: Agencies
description.content:
Airline and international train services were limping back towards normal in parts of Europe today, but the lingering effects of ice and snow that caused widespread chaos still weighed on schedules.
The disruptions to airlines and high-speed trains in continental Europe, and linking Britain to the continent, created a nightmare before Christmas scenario for tens of thousands of travellers since the weekend, when heavy snow fell.
They also brought calls for legislation to force airports to deal more effectively with snow and other bad weather.
European Union transport chief Siim Kallas said he was considering forcing airports to provide a minimum level of infrastructure support during severe weather.
London's Heathrow, the world's busiest international airport, and Frankfurt Airport, the biggest on the continent, which both had severe disruptions earlier in the week, said on their websites that operations were returning to normal.
Heathrow said it had reopened its second runway yesterday, offering a ray of hope for thousands of passengers stranded in departure halls, some for days in scenes that British newspapers said resembled refugee camps.
"The southern runway at Heathrow is now open. Airlines are currently operating a significantly reduced schedule while they move diverted aircraft and crew back into position," airport operator BAA, owned by Spain's Ferrovial, said on its website.
British Airways said that in line with a directive from BAA, it would operate only a third of its normal flight schedule at Heathrow until 6am tomorrow.
"It will take some time to rebuild an operation of our size and complexity at our hub airport, Heathrow," the airline said on its website.
"We ask you not to travel to the airport unless you have a confirmed booking on one of the flights that is operating."
Flights to and from Frankfurt Airport resumed yesterday morning after the airport was shut for several hours overnight.
German airline Lufthansa said the situation at Frankfurt "is gradually returning to normal" and that it "sees good prospects for a return to normal flight operations".
While Paris's Charles de Gaulle and Orly airports were open, flight delays remained possible, operator Aeroports de Paris said in an e-mailed statement.
Eurostar, operator of the high-speed train between London and Brussels and Paris, said it would resume normal check-in service, but asked passengers not to show up until an hour before departure "to avoid congestion and an unnecessary wait". Agencies

event_or_fact.property: he was considering forcing airports to provide a minimum level of infrastructure support during severe weather

description.hltext_display: Avatar Is 2010's Most Pirated Film
description.content:
Avatar has been named the most pirated film of 2010. James Cameron's sci-fi epic - the most successful film of all time with gross takings of $2.7 billion - was downloaded illegally 16.6 million times, according to TorrentFreak.com.
Kick-Ass was second with 11.4 million downloads and Leonardo DiCaprio's films Inception and Shutter Island were third and fourth respectively.

description.hltext_display: Spider-man Accident Blamed On 'Human Error'
description.content:
The latest disaster for the Spider-man musical, which saw an actor seriously injured on-stage during a preview performance, has been blamed on "human error". The beleaguered Broadway show Spider-Man: Turn Off The Dark has been blighted by a series of setbacks - previews finally began in November after months of problems and rigorous safety checks, but the opening show was halted throughout as stunts went wrong.
Producers then decided to push back the official opening until February to incorporate "new ideas", but another preview on Monday ended in disaster as the show was cut short following a horrific accident.
Stunt double Christopher Tierney was taken to New York's Bellevue Hospital for treatment after he tumbled from a platform above the stage. It was later revealed he had broken several ribs, with reports blaming the incident on snapped cables.
But following an investigation by the Actors' Equity Association, the real reason behind the accident was revealed to be an error on the stage crew's part. A statement from the organisation reads, "Actors' Equity Association worked today with the Department of Labor, Osha and the production to determine that the cause of the accident at last night's performance of Spiderman (sic) was, in fact, human error." Tierney is the latest person to be injured during the run - actress Natalie Mendoza suffered concussion on the first night of previews when a rope broke and hit her on the head, and another Spider-Man stuntman, Kevin Aubin, broke both wrists during rehearsals in October.

description.hltext_display: 放寬農漁會幹部資格 爭議條文保留協商 (中廣)
description.content:
立法院經濟委員會今天審查「農會法」、「漁會法」修正草案，不過民進黨立委質疑，修法條文放寬了農漁會代表、理監事和總幹事資格，有放生黑金的嫌疑。委員會最後雖然通過初審，不過對於放寬農漁會人員資格的爭議條文，全數保留交付朝野協商。(李人岳報導)
立法院經濟委員會22日審查農會法、漁會法修正草案，不過民進黨立委質疑修法條文放寬了農漁會代表、理監事和總幹事資格，有放生黑金的嫌疑。立委翁金珠質疑，行政院以五都改制和農業金融法配套修法的理由，根本是想偷渡黑金放生條款。
立委李俊毅則質疑，行政部門提案放寬農會幹部、約聘人員的資格，根本是反改革的行為，李俊毅質疑，農漁會修法是馬總統為了的2012連任而拉攏農漁會系統。民進黨一定堅決反對。
委員會雖然通過初審，不過綠營對於行政院版本，放寬規定受緩刑而交付保護管束、5年內沒有不良債權記錄，以及受保安處分者可以競選農漁會會員代表、理監事和總幹事的提案，都提出修正動議。會議主席蕭景田最後裁示，對於綠營有提出修正動議的條文，都保留交付協商。

description.hltext_display: Lohan's Alleged Victim Fired From Betty Ford Clinic
description.content:
A woman who alleges she was assaulted by Lindsay Lohan at California's Betty Ford clinic has been fired for breaking the centre's strict confidentiality rules by speaking out about the incident.
The Mean Girls star was moved from the rehab centre to another unit last week (begs13Dec10) to complete her court ordered treatment for violating her probation stemming from a DUI arrest.
It was revealed on Tuesday that officers in Palm Desert, California are investigating after a female member of the Betty Ford staff was assaulted during an altercation with Lohan and some pals.
Cops reportedly received a call at 1.03am on 12 December for "hand-to-hand battery", but sources close to the actress insisted she simply brushed the staffmember off when she was "unfairly" lectured about arriving at the home after her curfew and ordered to take a drug or alcohol test.
The woman behind the allegations, Dawn Holland, revealed to TMZ.com that Lohan was aggressive and in a "very angry" state when she was caught sneaking back in to the clinic, and goes on to claim the star had been drinking.
In a video interview with TMZ.com, Holland - who is wearing a cast on her wrist to help aid an alleged sprain - says, "She was very angry and out of control... She had alcohol on her breath. I did not touch the woman. I am not willing to risk my job over any patient." However, following her revelations, bosses at the clinic have decided to fire Holland with immediate effect.
A statement from the clinic says, "Regrettably, on December 21, 2010, one of our employees violated strict confidentiality guidelines and laws by publicly identifying patients in a media interview and by disclosing a privileged document. "The employee has been terminated by the Betty Ford Center."

description.hltext_display: Bean Divorces For A Fourth Time
description.content:
Actor Sean Bean has officially ended his fourth marriage - his divorce was granted by a London judge on Tuesday. star wed fourth wife Georgina Sutcliffe in February 2008, but their union was marred within months of the marriage when Bean was arrested over allegations an argument between the pair turned violent.
They enjoyed a short-lived reunion but decided to separate for good over the summer.
Sutcliffe filed for divorce citing the actor's "unreasonable behaviour" and alleged the British hunk is "unbearable" to live with. And on Tuesday a judge agreed to end their marriage after just two years when the pair was handed a decree nisi at the High Court in London.

event_or_fact.property: allegations an argument between the pair

description.content: Munster have confirmed they have lodged an appeal against Paul O'Connell's four-week ban.

description.hltext_display: Naidu's Fast Enters 6th Day; Condition Worsens
description.content:
The condition of Telegu Desam Party President N Chandrababu Naidu worsened further today as he refused to consume even any liquid, on the sixth day of his indefinite hunger strike seeking justice for farmers.
At one point Chandrababu, closed his room door from inside and did not let anyone venture inside. His wife Bhuvaneswari, family members and senior leaders of TDP tried to persuade Chandrababu to take some fluids but to no avail.
A six-member team of expert doctors from NIMS is constantly monitoring the leader of the opposition.
Doctors then wanted to shift the Leader of Opposition to the Intensive Care Unit, but he resisted that attempt as well.
"We are now trying to convert the same room into an ICU," doctors at Nizam's Institute of Medical Sciences said.
Chandrababu's nephews and film stars NTR (Junior) and Kalyan Ram visited him in the hospital today and pleaded with him to give up the fast in view of his health condition.
"But he refused to heed. He looked very weak," they said.
They strongly denounced the Congress government’s indifferent attitude and said it should immediately take steps to resolve the issue.
Meanwhile, TDP and Left parties gathered around the district Collectorates in the state demanding that the government concede the demands raised by Chandrababu and rescue the distressed farmers.
Former Home Minister T Devender Goud and CPI state Secretary K Narayana led the siege at the Ranga Reddy district Collector's office here. They were taken into preventive custody along with scores of party workers.
Information Technology professionals took out a march from KBR Park to NIMS in solidarity with Chandrababu Naidu. Thousands of farmers, people and TDP workers came to NIMS from different districts to see Chandrababu but were prevented from going inside the hospital block.
Naidu is on an indefinite hunger strike in protest against the "inadequate" relief package announced by the state government for farmers who lost their crop in the recent rains.

EU Morning Report - Euro recovers losses but still fragile
description.content:
Latest News in Forex
RATE STORY: Euro recovers losses but still fragile
Euro recovered some of its losses on Wednesday after it slid on Tuesday weighted by rating agencies' decision to put Portugal and Greece's debt rating on review for a possible downgrade. Also, France appeared to face sovereign debt problems as well further weighing on the single currency. On Tuesday, the euro broke below the 1.31 level falling as low as 1.3074 and today recovered to 1.3145 supported by talks that Asian central banks bid on the euro in a thin and choppy end of year trade.
Against the safe haven Swiss franc, the euro hit a fresh record low at 1.2532 on Tuesday after tensions in Korea and euro zone contagion fears raised demand for the safe haven currency. The pair is now trading at 1.2543 threatening to hit a fresh record low. The euro fell versus the Japanese Yen on Tuesday finding support at 109.56 before it recovers some of its losses to trade at 110.11.
Against the Japanese Yen, the greenback rose to 83.90 on Tuesday's currency markets from 83.49. On Wednesday, the dollar surrendered some of its losses to trade at 83.72 yen. The US dollar extends losses against the franc on Wednesday hitting a two month low at 0.9533.
The Canadian dollar fell on Tuesday weighted by data showing inflation declined more than the market expected in November and disappointing retail sales in October. The dollar hit 1.0205 versus the Loonie but today the pair fell to trade at 1.0154.

description.hltext_display: Las ventas del sorteo se mantienen en los mismos niveles que el año anterior, cerca de 2.700 millones
description.content: Las ventas del sorteo de Navidad se han mantenido relativamente estables respecto al año pasado, con una caída del 0,2 por ciento hasta cerca de los 2.700 millones de euros, según ha adelantado el director general de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado (LAE), Gonzalo Fernández.

description.hltext_display: 兩岸醫衛協議文本 呈交陸委會 (中央社)
description.content:
(中央社記者馮昭台北22日電)海峽交流基金會董事長江丙坤今天下午3時率第6次江陳會海基會協商代表團向陸委會報告，並將海峽兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議文本呈交陸委會，由行政院大陸委員會主任委員賴幸媛代表接受。
在海基會協商代表團報告前，賴幸媛致詞表示，兩岸醫藥衛生協議是兩岸15項協議中，條文最多、非常具體可行的協議，充分達到政府設定的3目標：維護國人健康安全、保障消費者權益、兼顧產業發展。
賴幸媛表示，這次來不及簽署的兩岸投資保障協議是因為協商代表團認為需要更充足的時間討論，以爭取最有利的結果，這表示在兩岸協商中，政府堅持「以台灣為主、對人民有利」的承諾，不會為簽署而簽署。
賴幸媛表示，在兩岸協商過程中，政府不僅可主導議題，也可循序漸進促進台灣經濟發展，一步一步落實保障民眾權益的目標。協商團隊用實際行動「顧主權、顧安全、顧生存、顧產業」的成果，在各民調獲得高度支持。
賴幸媛表示，第7次江陳會重點推動議題包括投保協議，還有海峽兩岸經濟合作架構協議 (ECFA)後續協商，有具體進展就會納入海基、海協兩會會談並簽署協議。
財團法人海峽交流基金會 (海基會)和大陸海峽兩岸關係協會 (海協會)的制度性協商，由海基會董事長江丙坤和海協會會長陳雲林主談，通稱「江陳會」。991222

description.hltext_display: Chris Brown Finishes Domestic Violence Course
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content:
Chris BrownChris Brown is now a certified graduate of a domestic violence course.
The 21-year-old dancer-singer announced through Twitter that he had completed a one year domestic violence class that a court ordered him to take as one of his punishments for beating up his then-girlfriend RihannaRihanna in February 2009.

description.hltext_display: Kidman không muốn con sống với Tom
description.author: Việt Báo
description.content:
Tags: Nicole Kidman, Tom Cruise, cha mẹ nuôi, chia tay, quyết định, vợ chồng, cả hai, không muốn, con gái, sống, cô, ngày, mình, tuổi
Tags: Nicole Kidman, Tom Cruise, cha mẹ nuôi, chia tay, quyết định, vợ chồng, cả hai, không muốn, con gái, sống, cô, ngày, mình, tuổi
Trước khi chia tay, Nicole Kidman cùng chồng cũ, tài tử Tom Cruise, cùng nhau nhận nuôi hai con, Isabella và Connor. Tuy nhiên, khi cha mẹ nuôi chia tay, cả hai bé đều quyết định về sống với bố, điều này khiến "thiên nga Australia" buồn phiền. Cô rất mong các con về sống với mình nhưng đành phải tôn trọng quyết định đó.
Đến nay, hai con nuôi của Tom Cruise và Nicole Kidman là Isabella (18 tuổi) và Connor (15 tuổi) đều đã lớn và "bà mẹ đau khổ" này bây giờ mới dám thổ lộ tâm sự của mình. Nicole nói: "Chúng muốn sống với Tom, đó là quyền lựa chọn của chúng. Tôi muốn các con chuyển đến sống với mình nhưng chẳng biết phải làm sao".
Mặc dù buồn phiền về điều này nhưng Nicole cũng rất vui khi được làm mẹ một lần nữa. Tháng 7/2008, nữ diễn viên nổi tiếng đã sinh bé Sunday Rose, kết quả tình yêu với người chồng hiện tại, Keith Urban. "Thật tuyệt vời khi bạn có một đứa con gái nhỏ 2 tuổi rưỡi khi đã bước vào tuổi 43", Nicole hào hứng nói. Người đẹp cũng giải thích lý do đặt cho con một cái tên đặc biệt như vậy là vì cả cô và chồng đều thích nhất ngày chủ nhật trong tuần.
Chia sẻ với tạp chí Hello! của Anh, Nicole Kidman nói: "Khi cả hai còn cô đơn, trước khi tìm thấy nhau, ngày chủ nhật là ngày chúng tôi sợ hãi nhất bởi vì chẳng có ai ở bên trong suốt ngày đó và nỗi cô đơn trở nên thật đáng sợ. Tuy nhiên, khi đã sống bên nhau thì đây lại là ngày yêu thích của vợ chồng tôi. Đó là ngày chẳng ai dám làm phiền bạn, bạn có thể nằm dài trên giường, làm những điều mình muốn. Rồi cả hai cùng nghĩ, đó hẳn sẽ là một cái tên tuyệt vời để đặt cho con của mình".
Kể từ khi sinh con, diễn viên nổi tiếng vẫn tham gia một số bộ phim nhưng cô không còn dành nhiều tâm sức như trước. Với Nicole bây giờ, gia đình và cô con gái nhỏ là ưu tiên hàng đầu. "Tôi không còn muốn làm việc quá nhiều nữa mà muốn ở nhà và chăm lo cho gia đình nhỏ. Công việc giờ đây không còn là ưu tiên số 1 nữa, tôi sẽ vẫn theo đuổi sự nghiệp nhưng tất nhiên gia đình vẫn là trên hết".
Ngôi sao điện ảnh người Australia trong năm nay chỉ tham gia duy nhất một bộ phim, đó là Rabbit Hole. Cô vừa là nhà sản xuất, vừa vào vai chính trong phim. Bộ phim duy nhất trong năm 2010 đã đem về cho "thiên nga Australia" một đề cử giải Quả cầu vàng cho danh hiệu Nữ diễn viên chính xuất sắc nhất. Bộ phim Rabbit Hole đã được công chiếu tại Bắc Mỹ ngày 17/12.

description.hltext_display: $A slightly higher, just below parity
description.author: Jason Cadden
description.content:
The Australian dollar ended the local session slightly higher, trading in a range just below parity with the US dollar.
At 1700 AEDT, the local unit was trading at 99.72 US cents, up from Tuesday's close of 99.63 cents.
Since 0700 AEDT on Wednesday, the local unit has traded between 99.50 US cents and 99.89 cents.
During the local session the Australian dollar continued to hit record highs against the British pound and the Euro.
RBC Capital Markets senior currency strategist Sue Trinh said currency markets were quiet ahead of the holiday period.
"Everything is just moving in very quiet range trading mode at the moment, which is to be expected in the lead up to Christmas," she said.
"So liquidity is thin and there seems to be very little going through really, it's just Christmas markets at the moment."
Ms Trinh said the release of New Zealand's gross domestic product figures on Thursday would be the only data risk for the Australian dollar for the rest of the week.
"Really there is not a lot more that is going to be market moving for the Aussie dollar.
"The expected price action for the rest of the week is likely to be range trading, within the 99.00 US cent to parity with the US dollar," Ms Trinh said.
The Australian dollar closed at 83.46 yen, up from 83.38 on Tuesday and at 75.90 euro cents up from 75.63 previously.
The euro finished at 1.3138 US dollars, down from Tuesday's close of 1.3174 and at 110.02 yen, down from 110.24.
The US dollar was at 83.75 Japanese yen, up from 83.69.
The Australian bond market ended the session slightly softer following weaker US Treasuries.
At 1630 AEDT on the ASX 24, the March 10-year bond futures contract was at 94.340 (implying a yield of 5.660 per cent), down from Tuesday's close of 94.370 (5.630 per cent).
The March three-year bond futures contract was at 94.650 (5.350 per cent), down from 94.680 (5.320 per cent).
UBS interest rate strategist Matthew Johnson said the bond market was slightly weaker in quiet trade ahead of Christmas.
"There was a late softening in US Treasuries but we didn't quite follow and we opened weak and they sold off a touch down to midday and it basically traded flat since," he said.
Mr Johnson said the focus for the bond market over the Christmas-New Year period would be a series of US government bond auctions by the Federal Reserve.
"I personally think rates may trade a little bit heavy over the next few days as we head up for the auctions next week, the Fed will auction about $US100 billion worth of securities in the period between Christmas and New Year."
The 90-day bank bill closed level with Tuesday at 4.980 per cent, while the 180-day bank bill closed at 5.190, up from its previous close of 5.170 per cent.
At 1600 AEDT, the RBA's trade weighted index was at 75.4, its highest end-of-day level since February 12 1985. On Tuesday it was at 75.3.

description.hltext_display: Europe travel chaos eases but pain remains
description.content:
LONDON (Reuters) - Airline and international train services were limping back toward normal in parts of Europe on Wednesday, but the lingering effects of ice and snow that caused widespread chaos still weighed on schedules.
The disruptions to airlines and high-speed trains in continental Europe, and linking Britain to the continent, created a nightmare before Christmas scenario for tens of thousands of travelers since the weekend, when heavy snow fell.
They also brought calls for legislation to force airports to deal more effectively with snow and other bad weather.
European Union transport chief Siim Kallas said he was considering forcing airports to provide a minimum level of infrastructure support during severe weather.
London's Heathrow, the world's busiest international airport, and Frankfurt Airport, the biggest on the continent, which both had severe disruptions earlier in the week, said on their websites that operations were returning to normal.
Heathrow said it had reopened its second runway on Tuesday, offering a ray of hope for thousands of passengers stranded in departure halls, some for days in scenes that British newspapers said resembled refugee camps.
"The southern runway at Heathrow is now open. Airlines are currently operating a significantly reduced schedule while they move diverted aircraft and crew back into position," airport operator BAA, owned by Spain's Ferrovial, said on its website.
British Airways said that in line with a directive from BAA, it would operate only a third of its normal flight schedule at Heathrow until 6 a.m. on Thursday.
"It will take some time to rebuild an operation of our size and complexity at our hub airport, Heathrow," the airline said on its website.
"We ask you not to travel to the airport unless you have a confirmed booking on one of the flights that is operating."
"GOOD PROSPECTS"
Flights to and from Frankfurt Airport resumed on Tuesday morning after the airport was shut for several hours overnight.
German airline Lufthansa said the situation at Frankfurt "is gradually returning to normal" and that it "sees good prospects for a return to normal flight operations."
Eurostar, operator of the high-speed train between London and Brussels and Paris, said it would resume normal check-in service, but asked passengers not to show up until an hour before departure "to avoid congestion and an unnecessary wait."
On Tuesday, thousands of people were forced to queue in frigid temperatures for hours around St. Pancras station in north London as every available Eurostar seat was snapped up by travelers bounced from airlines.
Eurostar said nine of its 52 trains would be canceled on Wednesday but that passengers for those services would be "reallocated onto one of the next available trains."
Although the logjam of travelers was starting to ease, many passengers were irate.
"This was our holiday of a lifetime," a man at Heathrow who'd been planning to travel with his wife told Sky News. "And it's a nightmare."

event_or_fact.property: he was considering forcing airports to provide a minimum level of infrastructure support during severe weather
